GK22vispancu:582: damanaka āha-svāmin etad abhihitaṃ mayā yad etad-vanaṃ caṇḍikā-vāhana-bhūtasya piṅgalakasya viṣayībhūtam /
GK22vispancu:584: tat tasya sakāśaṃ gatvā bhrātṛ-snehenaikatra bhakṣaṇa-pāna-viharaṇa-kriyābhir eka-sthānāśrayeṇa kālo neyaḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:586: uktaṃ ca saharṣaṃ svāminaḥ sakāśād abhaya-dakṣiṇā dāpayitavyā iti /
GK22vispancu:588: tac chrutvā piṅgalaka āha-sādhu sumate sādhu /
GK22vispancu:590: mama hṛdayena saha saṃmantrya bhavaedam abhihitam /
GK22vispancu:592: paraṃ so 'pi mad-arthe'bhaya-dakṣiṇāṃ yācayitvā drutataram ānīyatām iti /
GK22vispancu:595: mantribhir dhāryate rājyaṃ sustambhair iva mandiram //Panc_1.137//

GK22vispancu:599: damanako 'pi taṃ praṇamya saṃjīvaka-sakāśa prasthitaḥ saharṣam acintayat- aho prasāda-saṃmukhī naḥ svāmī vacana-vaśagaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
GK22vispancu:600: tan nāsti dhanyataro mama / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:603: atha saṃjīvaka-sakāśam āsādya sa-praśrayam uvāca-bho mitra prārthito 'sau mayā bhavad-arthe svāmy-abhaya-pradānam /
GK22vispancu:605: paraṃ tvayā rāja-prasādam āsādya mayā saha samaya-dharmeṇa vartitavyam /
GK22vispancu:607: aham api tava saṅketena sarvā rājya-dhuram amātya-padavīm āśrityoddhariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:608: evaṃ kṛte dvayor apy āvayo rāja-lakṣmī-bhāgyā bhaviṣyati / yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:609: ākheṭakasya dharmeṇa vibhavāḥ syur vaśe nṝṇām /
GK22vispancu:610: nṛ-prajāḥ prerayaty eko hanty anyo 'tra mṛgān iva //Panc_1.140 //
GK22vispancu:613: nṛpāsannān sa mānyo 'pi bhraśyate dantilo yathā //Panc_1.141//
GK22vispancu:617: asty atra dharātale vardhamānaṃ nāma nagaram /
GK22vispancu:618: tatra dantilo nāma nānā-bhāṇḍa-patiḥ sakala-pura-nāyakaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:619: tena pura-kāryaṃ nṛpa-kāryaṃ ca kurvatā tuṣṭiṃ nītās tat-pura-vāsino lokā nṛpatiś ca /
GK22vispancu:620: kiṃ bahunā, na ko 'pi tādṛk kenāpi caturo dṛṣṭo śruto vā /
GK22vispancu:626: athaivaṃ gacchati kāle danitlasya kadācid vivāhaḥ sampravṛttaḥ /
GK22vispancu:627: tatra tena sarve pura-nivāsino rāja-saṃnidhi-lokāś ca sammāna-puraḥsaram āmantrya bhojitā vastrādibhiḥ sat-kṛtāś ca /
GK22vispancu:628: tato vivāhānantaraṃ rājā sāntaḥpuraḥ sva-gṛham ānīyābhyarcitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:629: atha tasya nṛpater gṛha-sammārjana-kartā gorambho nāma rāja-sevako gṛhāyāto 'pi tenānucita-sthāna upaviṣṭo 'vajñāyārdha-candraṃ dattvā niḥsāritaḥ
GK22vispancu:630: so 'pi tataḥ prabhṛti niśvasann apamānān na rātrāv apy adhiśete /
GK22vispancu:631: kathaṃ mayā tasya bhāṇḍapate rāja-prasāda-hāniḥ kartavyā iti cintayann āste /

GK22vispancu:640: tac chrutvā rājā sa-sambhramam utthāya tam uvāca-bho bho gorambha /
GK22vispancu:644: rātri-jāgaraṇena dyūtāsaktasya me balān nidrā samāyātā /

GK22vispancu:649: yad vāñchati divā martyo vīkṣate vā karoti vā /
GK22vispancu:650: tat svapne'pi tad-abhyāsād brūte vātha karoti vā //Panc_1.144//
GK22vispancu:652: śubhaṃ vā yadi pāpaṃ yan nṝṇāṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam /
GK22vispancu:653: sugūḍham api taj jñeyaṃ svapna-vākyāt tathā madāt //Panc_1.145//
GK22vispancu:655: jalpanti sārdham anyena paśyanty anyaṃ sa-vibhramāḥ /
GK22vispancu:656: hṛd-gataṃ cintayanty anyaṃ priyaḥ ko nāma yoṣitām //Panc_1.146//
GK22vispancu:658: ekena smita-pāṭalādhara-ruco jalpanty analpākṣaraṃ vīkṣante'nyam itaḥ sphuṭat-kumudinī-phullollasal-locanāḥ /
GK22vispancu:659: dūrodāra-caritra-citra-vibhavaṃ dhyāyanti cānyaṃ dhiyā kenetthaṃ paramārthato 'rthavad iva premāsti vāma-bhruvām //Panc_1.147//
GK22vispancu:663: raho nāsti kṣaṇo nāsti nāsti prārthayitā naraḥ /
GK22vispancu:665: yo mohān manyate mūḍho rakteyaṃ mama kāminī /
GK22vispancu:666: sa tasyā vaśago nityaṃ bhavet krīḍā-śakuntavat //Panc_1.150//
GK22vispancu:667: tāsāṃ vākyāni kṛtyāni svalpāni sugurūṇy api /
GK22vispancu:668: karoti saḥ kṛtair loke laghutvaṃ yāti sarvataḥ //Panc_1.151//
GK22vispancu:669: striyaṃ ca yaḥ prārthayate sannikarṣaṃ ca gacchati /
GK22vispancu:670: īṣac ca kurute sevāṃ tam evecchanti yoṣitaḥ //Panc_1.152//
GK22vispancu:673: nāsāṃ kaścid agamyo 'sti nāsāṃ ca vayasi sthitiḥ /
GK22vispancu:674: virūpaṃ rūpavantaṃ vā pumān ity eva bhujyate //Panc_1.154//
GK22vispancu:675: rakto hi jāyate bhogyo nārīṇāṃ śāṭikā yathā /
GK22vispancu:677: alaktiko yathā rakto niṣpīḍya puruṣas tathā /
GK22vispancu:679: evaṃ sa rājā bahuvidhaṃ vilapya tat-prabhṛti dantilasya prasāda-parāṅmukhaḥ saṃjātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:681: dantilo 'py akasmād eva prasāda-parāṅmukham avanipatim avalokya cintayāmāsa-aho sādhu cedam ucyate-
GK22vispancu:682: ko 'rthān prāpya na garvito viṣayiṇaḥ kasyāpado 'staṃ gatāḥ
GK22vispancu:683: strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāmā rājñāṃ priyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:684: kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntara-gataḥ ko 'rthī gato gauravaṃ
GK22vispancu:685: ko vā durjana-vāgurāsu patitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān //Panc_1.157//
GK22vispancu:687: kāke śaucaṃ dyūta-kāreṣu satyaṃ sarpe kṣāntiḥ strīṣu kāmopaśāntiḥ /
GK22vispancu:688: klībe dhairyaṃ madyape tattva-cintā rājā mitraṃ kena dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā //Panc_1.158//
GK22vispancu:689: aparaṃ mayāsya bhūpater athavānyasyāpi kasyacid rāja-sambandhinaḥ svapne'pi nāniṣṭaṃ kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:690: tat kim etat-parāṅmukho māṃ prati bhūpatiḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:691: evaṃ taṃ dantilaṃ kadācid rāja-dvāre viṣkambhitaṃ vilokya saṃmārjana-kartā gorambho vihasya dvārapālān idam ūce-bho bho dvārapālāḥ /
GK22vispancu:693: tad anena nivāritena yathāhaṃ tathā yūyam apy ardha-candra-bhājino bhaviṣyatha /
GK22vispancu:694: tac chrutvā dantilaś cintayāmāsa-nūnam idam asya gorambhasya ceṣṭitam /
GK22vispancu:698: api kāpuruṣo bhīruḥ syāc cen nṛpati-sevakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:699: tathāpi na parābhūtiṃ janād āpnoti mānavaḥ //Panc_1.160//
GK22vispancu:700: evaṃ sa bahu-vidhaṃ vilapya vilakṣa-manāḥ sodvego gata-prabhāvaḥ sva-gṛhaṃ niśāmukhe gorambham āhūya vastra-yugalena saṃmānyedam uvāca-bhadra
GK22vispancu:701: mayā na tadā tvaṃ rāga-vaśān niḥsāritaḥ /
GK22vispancu:702: yatas tvaṃ brāhmaṇānām agrato 'nucita-sthāne samupaviṣṭo dṛṣṭa ity apamānitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:704: so 'pi svarga-rājyopamaṃ tad-vastra-yugalam āsādya paraṃ paritoṣaṃ gatvā tam uvāca-bhoḥ śreṣṭhin /
GK22vispancu:706: tad asya saṃmānasya kṛte paśya me buddhi-prabhāvaṃ rāja-prasādaṃ ca /
GK22vispancu:710: aho sasadṛśo ceṣṭā tulāyaṣṭeḥ khalasya ca //Panc_1.161//
GK22vispancu:711: tataś cānye-dyuḥ sa gorambho rāja-kule gatvā yoga-nidrāṃ gatasya bhūpateḥ saṃmārjana-kriyāṃ kurvann idam āha-aho aviveko 'smad-bhūpateḥ /
GK22vispancu:713: tac chrutvā rājā sa-vismayaṃ tam uvāca-re re gorambha /
GK22vispancu:716: kiṃ tvayā kadācid aham evaṃvidhaṃ karma samācaran dṛṣṭaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:717: so 'bravīt-dyūtāsaktasya rātri-jāgaraṇena saṃmārjanaṃ kurvāṇasya mama balān nidrā samāyātā /
GK22vispancu:720: tat prasādaṃ karotu svāmī nidrā-paravaśasya iti /
GK22vispancu:721: evaṃ śrutvā rājā cintitavān-yan mayā janmāntare purīṣotsargaṃ kurvatā kadāpi cirbhaṭikā na bhakṣitā /
GK22vispancu:722: tad yathāyaṃ vyatikaro 'sambhāvyo mamānena mūḍhena vyāhṛtaḥ /
GK22vispancu:724: tan mayā na yuktaṃ kṛtaṃ yat sa varākaḥ saṃmānena viyojitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:726: tad-abhāvena rāja-kṛtyāni paura-kṛtyāni na sarvāṇi śithilatāṃ vrajanti /
GK22vispancu:727: evam anekadhā vimṛśya dantilaṃ samāhūya nijāṅga-vastrābharaṇādibhiḥ saṃyojya svādhikāre niyojayāmāsa /
GK22vispancu:728: ato 'haṃ bravīmi yo na pūjayate garvāt iti /
GK22vispancu:730: yad bhavatābhihitaṃ tad eva mayā kartavyam iti /
GK22vispancu:731: evam abhihite damanakas tam ādāya piṅgalaka-sakāśam agamat /
GK22vispancu:732: āha ca-deva eṣa mayānītaḥ sa saṃjīvakaḥ /

GK22vispancu:736: kutas tvam asmin vane vijane samāyāto 'si ?

GK22vispancu:742: yataḥ kāraṇād bahv-apāyaṃ raudra-sattva-niṣevitaṃ vanaṃ gurūṇām api sattvānām asevyam /
GK22vispancu:744: evam uktvā sakala-mṛga-parivṛto yamunā-kaccham avatīryodaka-grahaṇaṃ kṛtvā svecchayā tad eva vanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:745: tataś ca karakaṭa-damanaka-nikṣipta-rājya-bhāraḥ saṃjīvikena saha subhāṣita-goṣṭhīm anubhavann āste /
GK22vispancu:749: saṃjīvakenāpy aneka-śāstrāvagāhanād utpanna-buddhi-prāgalbhyena stokair evāhobhir mūḍha-matiḥ piṅgalako dhīmāṃs tathā kṛto yathāraṇya-dharmād viyojya grāmya-dharmeṣu niyojitaḥ /

GK22vispancu:755: phala-hīnaṃ nṛpaṃ bhṛtyāḥ kulīnam api connatam /

GK22vispancu:759: vṛtti-bhaṅgān mahīpālaṃ tyajanty eva hi sevakāḥ //Panc_1.164//

GK22vispancu:765: vaṇijo grāhakāṇāṃ ca mūrkhāṇām api paṇḍitāḥ //Panc_1.166//
GK22vispancu:769: upajīvanti śaktyā hi jalajā jaladān iva //Panc_1.168//

GK22vispancu:774: taṃ ca krauñca-ripoḥ śikhī giri-sutā-siṃho 'pi nāgāśanam /
GK22vispancu:775: itthaṃ yatra parigrahasya ghaṭanā śambhor api syād gṛhe
GK22vispancu:776: tatrāpy asya kathaṃ na bhāvi jagato yasmāt svarūpaṃ hi tat //Panc_1.170//
GK22vispancu:777: tataḥ svāmi-prasāda-rahitau kṣut-kṣāma-kaṇṭhau parasparaṃ karaṭaka-damanakau mantrayete /

GK22vispancu:789: tat tvayaiṣa śaṣpa-bhojī svāminaḥ sakāśam ānītaḥ /

GK22vispancu:801: tatra deva-śarmā nāma parivrājakaḥ partivasati sma /
GK22vispancu:804: naktaṃ dinaṃ kakṣāntarāt tāṃ mātrāṃ na muñcati /
GK22vispancu:806: arthānām arjane duḥkham arjitānāṃ ca rakṣaṇe /

GK22vispancu:808: athāṣāḍha-bhūtir nāma para-vittāpahārī dhūrtas tām artha-mātrāṃ tasya kakṣāntara-gatāṃ lakṣayitvā vyacintayat-kathaṃ mayāsyeyam artha-mātrā hartavyā iti /

GK22vispancu:811: tad enaṃ māyā-vacanair viśvāsyāhaṃ chātratāṃ vrajāmi yena sa viśvastaḥ kadācid viśvāsam eti / uktaṃ ca-

GK22vispancu:814: evaṃ niścitya tasyāntikam upagamya-oṃ namaḥ śivāya-iti proccārya sāṣṭāṅgaṃ praṇamya ca sa-praśrayam uvāca-bhagavan asāraḥ saṃsāro 'yam /
GK22vispancu:819: tat kiṃ kurvato me saṃsāra-samudrottaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /

GK22vispancu:823: dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate //Panc_1.176//
GK22vispancu:824: ādau citte tataḥ kāye satāṃ saṃjāyate jarā /

GK22vispancu:828: śūdro vā yadi vānyo 'pi caṇḍālo 'pi jaṭādharaḥ /

GK22vispancu:830: ṣaḍ-akṣareṇa mantreṇa puṣpam ekam api svayam /

GK22vispancu:832: tac chrutvāṣāḍha-bhūtis tat-pādau gṛhītvā sa-praśrayam idam āha-bhagavan,
GK22vispancu:835: parantu rātrau tvayā maṭha-madhye na praveṣṭavyam /
GK22vispancu:836: yat-kāraṇaṃ niḥsaṅgatā yatīnāṃ praśasyate tava ca mamāpi ca / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:837: durmantrān nṛpatir vinaśyati yatiḥ saṅgāt suto lālasād
GK22vispancu:839: maitrī cāpraṇayāt samṛddhir anayāt snehaḥ pravāsāśrayāt
GK22vispancu:840: strī garvād anavekṣaṇād api kṛṣis tyāgāt pramādād dhanam //Panc_1.180//
GK22vispancu:841: tat tvayā vrata-grahaṇānantaraṃ maṭha-dvāre tṛṇa-kuṭīrake śayitavyam iti /
GK22vispancu:845: atha kṛta-śayana-samayaṃ devaśarma-nigrahaṃ kṛtvā śāstrokta-vidhinā śiṣyatām anayat /
GK22vispancu:847: punas tathāpi muniḥ kakṣāntarān mātrāṃ na muñcati /
GK22vispancu:849: na kathañcid eṣa me viśvāsam āgacchati /
GK22vispancu:853: evaṃ cintayatas tasya devaśarmaṇo 'pi śiṣya-putraḥ kaścid grāmād āmantraṇārthaṃ samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:856: tac chrutvā devaśarmāṣāḍhabhūtinā saha prahṛṣṭa-manāḥ prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:857: athaivaṃ tasya gacchato 'gre kācin nadī samāyātā /
GK22vispancu:858: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mātrāṃ kakṣāntarād avatārya kanthā-madhye suguptāṃ nidhāya snātvā devārcanaṃ vidhāya tad-anantaram āṣāḍhabhūtim idam āha-bho āṣāḍhabhūte
GK22vispancu:860: tāvad eṣā kanthā yogeśvarasya svāvadhānatayā rakṣaṇīyā /
GK22vispancu:862: āṣāḍhabhūtir api tasminn adarśanī-bhūte mātrām ādāya satvaraṃ prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:863: devaśarmāpi chātra-guṇānurañjita-manāḥ suviśvasto yāvad upaviṣṭas tiṣṭhati tāvat suvarṇa-roma-deha-yūtha-madhye huḍu-yuddham apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:864: atha roṣa-vaśād dhuḍu-yugalasya dūram apasaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhūyo 'pi samupetya lālaṭa-paṭṭābhyāṃ praharato bhūri rudhiraṃ patati /
GK22vispancu:865: tac ca jambūko jihvā-laulyena raṅga-bhūmiṃ prāveśyāsvādayati /
GK22vispancu:866: devaśarmāpi tad ālokya vyacintayat-aho manda-matir ayaṃ jambūkaḥ /
GK22vispancu:867: yadi katham apy anayoḥ saṅghaṭṭe patiṣyati tan nūnaṃ mṛtyum avāpsyatīti vitarkayāmi /
GK22vispancu:868: kṣaṇāntare ca tathaiva raktāsvādana-laulyān madhye praviśaṃs tayoḥ śiraḥ-sampāte patiot mṛtaś ca śṛgālaḥ /
GK22vispancu:869: devaśarmāpi taṃ śocamāno mātrām uddiśya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ prasthito yāvad āṣāḍhabhūtiṃ na paśyati tataś cautsukyena śaucaṃ vidhāya yāvat kanthām ālokayati tāvan mātrāṃ na paśyati /
GK22vispancu:870: tataś ca-hā hā muṣito 'smi iti jalpan pṛthivī-tale mūrcchayā nipapāta /
GK22vispancu:871: tataḥ kṣaṇāc cetanāṃ labdhvā bhūyo 'pi samutthāya phūtkartum ārabdhaḥ-bho āṣāḍhabhūte /
GK22vispancu:874: evaṃ bahu vilapya tasya pada-paddhatim anveṣayan śanaiḥ śanaiḥ prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:875: athaiva gacchan sāyantana-samaye kañcid grāmam āsasāda /
GK22vispancu:876: atha tasmād grāmāt kaścit kaulikaḥ sabhārhyo madya-pāna-kṛte samīpa-vartini nagare prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:877: devaśarmāpi tam ālokya provāca-bho bhadra vayaṃ sūryoḍhā atithayas tavāntikaṃ prāptāḥ /
GK22vispancu:878: na kam apy atra grāme jānīmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:883: tṛṇāni bhūmir udakaṃ vāk-caturthī ca sūnṛtā /
GK22vispancu:888: gaccha tv atithim ādāya gṛhaṃ prati pāda-śauca-bhojana-śayanādibhiḥ satkṛtya tvaṃ tatraiva tiṣṭha /
GK22vispancu:891: sāpi bhāryā puṃścalī tam ādāya prahasita-vadanā devadattaṃ manasi dhyāyantī gṛhaṃ prati pratasthe /
GK22vispancu:896: paryaṅkeṣv āstaraṇaṃ patim anukūlaṃ manoharaṃ śayanam /
GK22vispancu:897: tṛṇam iva laghu manyante kāminyaś caurya-rata-lubdhāḥ //Panc_1.185//
GK22vispancu:899: keliṃ pradahati lajjā śṛṅgāro 'sthīni cāṭavaḥ kaṭavaḥ /
GK22vispancu:900: vandha-trayāḥ paritoṣo na kiṃcid iṣṭaṃ bhavet patyau //Panc_1.186//
GK22vispancu:903: atha kaulika-bhāryā gṛhaṃ gatvā deva-śarmaṇe gatāstaraṇaṃ bhagnāṃ ca khaṭvāṃ samarpyedam āha-bho bhagavan /
GK22vispancu:904: yāvad ahaṃ sva-sakhīṃ grāmād abhyāgatāṃ sambhāvya drutam āgacchāmi tāvat tvayā mad-gṛhe'pramattena bhāvyam /
GK22vispancu:905: evam abhidhāya śṛṅgāra-vidhiṃ vidhāya yāvad-devadattam uddiśya vrajati tāvat tad-bhartā saṃmukho mada-vihvalāṅgo mukta-keśaḥ pade pade praskhalan gṛhīta-madya-bhāṇḍaḥ samabhyeti /
GK22vispancu:906: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sā drutataraṃ vyāghuṭya sva-gṛhaṃ praviśya nukta-śṛṅgāra-veśā yathā-pūrvam abhavat /
GK22vispancu:907: kauliko 'pi tāṃ palāyamānāṃ kṛtādbhuta-śṛṅgārāṃ vilokya prāg eva karṇa-paramparayā tasyāḥ śrutāvapavāda-kṣubhita-hṛdayaḥ svākāraṃ nigūhamānaḥ sadaivāste /
GK22vispancu:908: tataś ca tathāvidhaṃ ceṣṭitam avalokya dṛṣṭa-pratyayaḥ krodha-vaśago gṛhaṃ praviśya tām uvāca-āḥ pāpe puṃścali /
GK22vispancu:910: sā provāca-ahaṃ tvat-sakāśād āgatā na kutracid api nirgatā /
GK22vispancu:917: so 'pi tac chrutvā pratikūla-vacanaṃ veśa-viparyayaṃ cāvalokya tam āha-puṃścali /
GK22vispancu:919: tad adya svayaṃ sañjāta-pratyayas tava yathocitaṃ nigrahaṃ karomi /
GK22vispancu:920: ity abhidhāya laguḍa-prahārais tāṃ jarjarita-dehāṃ vidhāya sthūṇayā saha dṛḍha-bandhanena baddhvā so 'pi mada-vihvalo vijñāya tāṃ gatvedam āha-sakhi
GK22vispancu:921: sa devadattas tasmin sthāne tvāṃ pratīkṣate /
GK22vispancu:925: tad gatvā brūhi taṃ kāminaṃ yad asyāṃ rātrau na tvayā saha samāgamaḥ /
GK22vispancu:930: uṣṭrāṇām iva teṣāṃ manye'haṃ śaṃsitaṃ janma //Panc_1.190//
GK22vispancu:932: sandigdhe para-loke janāpavāde ca jagati bahu-citre /
GK22vispancu:935: yadi bhavati deva-yogāt pumān virūpo 'pi bandhako rahasi /
GK22vispancu:936: na tu kṛcchrād api bhadraṃ nija-kāntaṃ sā bhajaty eva //Panc_1.192//
GK22vispancu:937: sābravīt-yady evaṃ tarhi kathaya kathaṃ dṛḍha-bandhana-baddhā satī tatra gacchāmi /
GK22vispancu:942: mām ātma-sthāne baddhvā drutataraṃ deva-dattaṃ sambhāvyāgaccha /
GK22vispancu:944: tad anu sā nāpitī tāṃ sva-sakhīṃ bandhanād vimocya tasyāḥ sthāne yathā-pūrvam ātmānaṃ baddhvā tāṃ devadatta-sakāśe saṅketa-sthānaṃ preṣitavatī
GK22vispancu:945: tathānuṣṭhite kaulikaḥ kasmiṃścit kṣaṇe samutthāya kiṃcid gata-kopo vimadas tām āha-he paruṣa-vādini /
GK22vispancu:946: yad adya-prabhṛti gṛhān niṣkramaṇaṃ na karoṣi,
GK22vispancu:949: nāpity api svara-bheda-bhayād yāvan na kiṃcid ūce,
GK22vispancu:950: tāvat so 'pi bhūyo bhūyas tāṃ tad evāha /
GK22vispancu:951: atha sā yāvat pratyuttaraṃ kim api na dadau,
GK22vispancu:952: tāvat sa prakupitas tīkṣṇa-śastram ādāya nāsikām acchinat /
GK22vispancu:956: iti jalpan punar api nidrā-vaśam agāt /
GK22vispancu:957: devaśarmāpi vitta-nāśāt kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭho naṣṭa-nidras tat sarvaṃ strī-caritram apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:958: sāpi kaulika-bhāryā yathecchayā devadattena saha surata-sukham anubhūya kasmiṃścit kṣaṇe sva-gṛham āgataya tāṃ nāpitīm idam āha-ayi /
GK22vispancu:961: nāpity āha-śivaṃ nāsikayā vinā śeṣasya śarīrasya /
GK22vispancu:962: tad drutaṃ tāṃ mocaya bandhanād yāvan nāyaṃ māṃ paśyati,
GK22vispancu:964: tathānuṣṭhite bhūyo 'pi kaulika utthāya tām āha-puṃścali /
GK22vispancu:966: kiṃ bhūyo 'py ato duṣṭataraṃ nigrahaṃ karṇa-cchedena karomi ?
GK22vispancu:967: atha sā sa-kopaṃ sādhikṣepam idam āha-dhiṅ mahā-mūḍha /
GK22vispancu:968: ko māṃ mahā-satīṃ dharṣayituṃ vyaṅgayituṃ vā samarthaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:973: ye nirjayanti bhuvane balinas ta eke //Panc_1.193//
GK22vispancu:976: tato devā bhūyo 'pi me nāsikāṃ tādṛg-rūpākṣatāṃ kurvantu /
GK22vispancu:977: athavā yadi mama citte para-puruṣasya bhrāntir api bhavati,
GK22vispancu:979: evam uktvā bhūyo 'pi tam āha-bho durātman /
GK22vispancu:980: paśya me satītva-prabhāveṇa tādṛśy eva nāsikā saṃvṛttā /
GK22vispancu:982: tāvat tad-rūpāṃ nāsikāṃ ca bhūtale rakta-pravāhaṃ ca mahāntam apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:983: atha sa vismita-manās tāṃ bandhanād vimucya śayyāyām āropya ca cāṭu-śataiḥ paryatoṣayat /
GK22vispancu:984: devaśarmāpi taṃ sarva-vṛttāntam ālokya vismita-manā idam āha-
GK22vispancu:985: śambarasya ca yā māyā yā māyā namucer api /
GK22vispancu:986: baleḥ kumbhīnasaś caiva sarvās tā yoṣito viduḥ //Panc_1.194//
GK22vispancu:987: hasantaṃ prahasanty etā rudantaṃ prarudanty api /
GK22vispancu:989: uśanā veda yac chāstraṃ yac ca veda bṛhaspatiḥ /
GK22vispancu:990: strī-buddhyā na viśiṣyete tāḥ sma rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ naraiḥ //Panc_1.196//
GK22vispancu:991: anṛtaṃ satyam ity āhuḥ satyaṃ cāpi tathānṛtam /
GK22vispancu:992: iti yās tāḥ kathaṃ vīra saṃrakṣyāḥ puruṣair iha //Panc_1.197//
GK22vispancu:998: sumukhena vadanti vagunā praharanty eva śitena cetasā /
GK22vispancu:999: madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālāhalaṃ mahad-viṣam //Panc_1.199//
GK22vispancu:1000: ata eva nipīyate'dharo hṛdayaṃ muṣṭibhir eva tāḍyate /
GK22vispancu:1003: āvartaḥ saṃśayānām avinaya-bhavanaṃ pattanaṃ sāhasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ saṃnidhānaṃ kapaṭa-śata-mayaṃ kṣetram apratyayānām /
GK22vispancu:1004: svarga-dvārasya vighnaṃ naraka-pura-mukhaṃ sarva-māyā-karaṇḍaṃ strī-yantraṃ kena sṛṣṭaṃ viṣam amṛta-mayaṃ prāṇi-lokasya pāśaḥ //Panc_1.201//
GK22vispancu:1005: kārkaśyaṃ stanayor dṛśos taralatālīkaṃ mukhe ślāghyate kauṭilyaṃ kaca-saṃcaye ca vacane māndyaṃ trike sthūlatā /
GK22vispancu:1006: bhīrutvaṃ hṛdaye sadaiva kathitaṃ māyā-prayogaḥ priye yāsāṃ doṣa-gaṇo guṇo mṛga-dṛśāṃ tāḥ syur narāṇāṃ priyāḥ //Panc_1.202//
GK22vispancu:1007: etā hasanti ca rudanti ca kārya-hetor
GK22vispancu:1008: viśvāsayanti ca paraṃ na ca viśvasanti /
GK22vispancu:1009: tasmān nareṇa kula-śīla-samanvitena nāryaḥ śmaśāna-ghaṭikā iva varjanīyāḥ //Panc_1.203//
GK22vispancu:1023: aśaucaṃ nirdayatvaṃ ca strīṇāṃ doṣāḥ svabhāvajāḥ //Panc_1.207//
GK22vispancu:1027: kiṃ vā na vāma-nayanā na samācaranti //Panc_1.208//
GK22vispancu:1028: antar-viṣa-mayā hy etā bahiś caiva manoramāḥ /
GK22vispancu:1030: evaṃ cintayatas tasya parivrājakasya sā niśā mahatā kṛcchreṇāticakrāma /
GK22vispancu:1031: sā ca dūtikā chinna-nāsikā sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā cintayāmāsa-kim idānīṃ kartavyam ?
GK22vispancu:1033: atha tasyā evaṃ vicintayantyā bhartā kārya-vaśād rāja-kule paryuṣitaḥ pratyūṣe ca
GK22vispancu:1034: sva-gṛham abhyupetya dvāra-deśa-stho vividha-paura-kṛtyotsukatayā tām āha-bhadre
GK22vispancu:1035: śīghram ānīyatāṃ kṣura-bhāṇḍaṃ yena kṣaura-karma-karaṇāya gacchāmi /
GK22vispancu:1036: sāpi chinnanāsikā gṛha-madhya-sthitaiva kārya-karaṇāpekṣayā kṣura-bhāṇḍāt kṣuram ekaṃ samākṛṣya tasyābhimukhaṃ preṣayāmāsa /
GK22vispancu:1037: nāpito 'py utsukatayā tam ekaṃ kṣuram avalokya kopāviṣṭaḥ san tad-abhimukham eva taṃ kṣuraṃ prāhiṇot /
GK22vispancu:1038: etasminn antare sā duṣṭordhva-bāhū vidhāya phutakartu-manā gṛhān niścakrāma /
GK22vispancu:1039: aho paśyata pāpenānena mama sad-ācāra-vartinyāḥ nāsikā-cchedo vihitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1041: atrāntare rāja-puruṣāḥ samabhyetya taṃ nāpitaṃ laguḍa-prahārair jarjarīkṛtya dṛḍha-bandhanair
GK22vispancu:1042: baddhvā tayā chinnanāsikayā saha dharmādhikaraṇa-sthānaṃ nītvā sabhyān ūcuḥ-śṛṇvantu
GK22vispancu:1044: anena nāpitenāparādhaṃ vinā strī-ratnam etad vyaṅgitam /
GK22vispancu:1045: tad asya yad yujyate tat kriyatām /
GK22vispancu:1053: atha taṃ tūṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar ūcuḥ-aho,
GK22vispancu:1056: aneneyaṃ nirdoṣā varākī dūṣitā / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1058: bhavati hi pāpaṃ kṛtvā sva-karma-santrāsitaḥ puruṣaḥ //Panc_1.210//
GK22vispancu:1062: adho-dṛṣṭir vadet kṛtvā pāpaṃ prāptaḥ sabhāṃ naraḥ /
GK22vispancu:1063: tasmād yatnāt parijñeyāś cihnair etair vicakṣaṇaiḥ //Panc_1.212//
GK22vispancu:1066: sabhāyāṃ vakti sāmarṣaṃ sāvaṣṭambho naraḥ śuciḥ //Panc_1.213//
GK22vispancu:1070: atha vadhya-sthāne nīyamānaṃ tam avalokya deva-śarmā tān dharmādhikṛtān gatvā provāca-bho bhoḥ,
GK22vispancu:1073: tac chrūyatāṃ me vākyam-jambūko huḍu-yuddhena iti /
GK22vispancu:1076: tato devaśarmā teṣāṃ trayāṇām api vṛttāntaṃ vistareṇākathayat /
GK22vispancu:1077: tad ākarṇya suvismita-manasas te nāpitaṃ vimocya mithaḥ procuḥ-aho /
GK22vispancu:1078: avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvo striyo bālāś ca jñātayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1079: yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuñjīta ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ //Panc_1.214//
GK22vispancu:1080: tad asyā nāsikā-cchedaḥ sva-karmaṇā hi saṃvṛttaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1082: tathānuṣṭhite devaśarmāpi vitta-nāśa-samudbhūta-śoka-rahitaḥ punar api svakīyaṃ maṭhāyatanaṃ jagāma /
GK22vispancu:1084: karaṭaka āha-evaṃ-vidhe vyatikare kiṃ kartavyam āvayoḥ ?
GK22vispancu:1088: ekaṃ hanyān na vā hanyād iṣuḥ kṣipto dhanuṣmatā /
GK22vispancu:1089: prājñena tu matiḥ kṣiptā hanyād garbha-gatān api //Panc_1.215//
GK22vispancu:1090: tad ahaṃ māyā-prapañcena guptam āśritya taṃ sphoṭayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:1092: yadi katham api tava māyā-praveśaṃ piṅgalako jñāsyati,
GK22vispancu:1093: sañjīvako vā tadā nūnaṃ vighāta eva /
GK22vispancu:1096: gūḍha-buddhibhir āpat-kāle vidhure'pi daive buddhiḥ prayoktavyā /
GK22vispancu:1098: kadācid ghuṇākṣara-nyāyena buddheḥ sāmrājyaṃ bhavati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1105: daivaṃ hi daivam iti kāpuruṣā vadanti /
GK22vispancu:1106: daivaṃ nihatya kuru pauruṣam ātma-śaktyā yatne kṛte yadi na sidhyati ko 'tra doṣaḥ //Panc_1.217//
GK22vispancu:1107: tad evaṃ jñātvā sugūḍha-buddhi-prabhāveṇa yathā tau dvāv api na jñāsyataḥ,
GK22vispancu:1109: suprayuktasya dambhasya brahmāpy antaṃ na gacchati /
GK22vispancu:1115: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kaulika-rathakārau mitre prativasataḥ sma /
GK22vispancu:1116: tatra ca bālyāt-prabhṛti sahacāriṇau parasparam atīva sneha-parau sadaika-sthāna-vihāriṇau kālaṃ nayataḥ /
GK22vispancu:1117: atha kadācit tatrādhiṣṭhāne kasmiṃścid devāyatane yātrā-mahotsavaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1118: tatra ca naṭa-nartaka-cāraṇa-saṅkule nānā-deśāgata-janāvṛte tau sahacarau bhramantau
GK22vispancu:1121: athāsau kaulikas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣārdita iva duṣṭa-graha-gṛhīta iiva kāma-śarair hanyamānaḥ sahasā bhūtale nipapāta /
GK22vispancu:1122: atha taṃ tad-avastham avalokya rathakāras tad-duḥkha-duḥkhita āpta-puruṣais taṃ samutkṣipya sva-gṛham ānāyayat / tatra
GK22vispancu:1123: ca vividhaiḥ śītopacāraiś cikitsakopadiṣṭair mantra-vādibhir upacaryamāṇaiś cirāt kathaṃcit sa-cetano babhūva /
GK22vispancu:1125: kim evaṃ tvam akasmād vicetanaḥ sañjātaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:1128: yady evaṃ tac chṛṇu me rahasyaṃ yena sarvām ātma-vedanāṃ te vadāmi /
GK22vispancu:1129: yadi tvaṃ māṃ suhṛdaṃ manyase tataḥ kāṣṭha-pradānena prasādaḥ kriyatām /
GK22vispancu:1130: kṣamyatāṃ yad vā kiñcit praṇay>atirekād ayuktaṃ tava mayānuṣṭhitam /
GK22vispancu:1131: so 'pi tad ākarṇya bāṣpa-pihita-nayanaḥ sa-gadgadam uvāca-vayasya,
GK22vispancu:1132: yat kiñcid duḥkha-kāraṇaṃ tad vada yena pratīkāraḥ kriyate,
GK22vispancu:1135: asādhyaṃ nāsti loke'tra yad brahmāṇḍasya madhyagam //Panc_1.219//
GK22vispancu:1136: tad eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ yadi sādhyaṃ bhaviṣyati tadāhaṃ sādhayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:1138: eteṣām anyeṣām api sahasrāṇām upāyānām asādhyaṃ tan me duḥkham /
GK22vispancu:1139: tasmān mama maraṇe mā kāla-kṣepaṃ kuru /
GK22vispancu:1141: yadyapy asādhyaṃ tathāpi nivedaya yenāham api tad asādhyaṃ matvā tvayā samaṃ vahnau praviśāmi /
GK22vispancu:1145: yāsau rāja-kanyā kareṇum ārūḍhā tatrotsave dṛṣṭā,
GK22vispancu:1146: tasyā darśanānantaraṃ makara-dhvajena mameyam avasthā vihitā /
GK22vispancu:1155: nīcā nābhiḥ prakṛtyā kuṭilakam alakaṃ svalpakaṃ cāpi madhyam /
GK22vispancu:1156: kurvatv etāni nāma prasabham iha manaś cintitāny āśu khedaṃ
GK22vispancu:1157: yan māṃ tasyāḥ kapolau dahata iti muhuḥ svacchakau tan na yuktam //Panc_1.221//
GK22vispancu:1158: rathakāro 'py evaṃ sa-kāmaṃ tad-vacanam ākarṇya sa-smitam idam āha-vayasya /
GK22vispancu:1159: yady evaṃ tarhi diṣṭyā siddhaṃ naḥ prayojanam /
GK22vispancu:1160: tad adyaiva tayā saha samāgamaḥ kriyatām iti /
GK22vispancu:1162: yatra kanyāntaḥpure vāyuṃ muktvā nānyasya praveśo 'sti tatra rakṣā-puruṣādhiṣṭhite kathaṃ mama tasyā saha samāgamaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:1166: evam abhidhāya tat-kṣaṇāt kīla-sañcāriṇaṃ vainateyaṃ bāhu-yugalaṃ vāyuja-vṛkṣa-dāruṇā śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-padmānvitaṃ sa-kirīṭa-kaustubham aghaṭayan
GK22vispancu:1167: tatas tasmin kaulikaṃ samāropya viṣṇu-cihnitaṃ kṛtvā kīla-sañcaraṇa-vijñānaṃ ca darśayitvā provāca-vayasya,
GK22vispancu:1168: anena viṣṇu-rūpeṇa gatvā kanyāntaḥpure niśīthe tāṃ rājakanyām ekākinīṃ sapta-bhūmika-prāsāda-prānta-gatāṃ
GK22vispancu:1169: mugdha-svabhāvāṃ tvāṃ vāsudevaṃ manyamānāṃ svakīya-mithyā-vakroktibhī rañjayitvā
GK22vispancu:1171: kauliko 'pi tad ākarṇya tathā-rūpas tatra gatvā tām āha-rāja-putri,
GK22vispancu:1173: ahaṃ tava kṛte samudrāt sānurāgo lakṣmīṃ vihāyaivāgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:1174: tat kriyatāṃ mayā saha samāgamaḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:1175: sāpi garuḍārūḍhaṃ caturbhujaṃ sāyudhaṃ kaustubhopetam avalokya sa-vismayā śayanād utthāya provāca-bhagavan /
GK22vispancu:1181: paraṃ kiṃ tu rādhā nāma me bhāryā gopa-kula-prasūtā prathama āsīt /
GK22vispancu:1185: yady evaṃ tan me tātaṃ prārthaya /
GK22vispancu:1191: no cec chāpaṃ dattvā sānvayaṃ te pitaraṃ bhasmasāt kariṣyāmi iti /
GK22vispancu:1192: evam abhidhāya garuḍād avatīrya savye pāṇau gṛhītvā tāṃ sabhayāṃ salajjāṃ vepamānāṃ śayyāyām ānayat /
GK22vispancu:1193: tataś ca rātri-śeṣaṃ yāvad vātsyāyanokta-vidhinā niṣevya pratyūṣe sva-gṛham alakṣito jagāma /
GK22vispancu:1194: evaṃ tasya tāṃ nityaṃ sevamānasya kālo yāti /
GK22vispancu:1195: atha kadācit kañcukinas tasyā adharoṣṭha-pravāla-khaṇḍanaṃ dṛṣṭvā mithaḥ procuḥ-aho /
GK22vispancu:1196: paśyatāsyā rāja-kanyāyāḥ puruṣopabhuktāyā iva śarīrāvayavā vibhāvyante /
GK22vispancu:1197: tat katham ayaṃ surakṣite'py asmin gṛha evaṃvidho vyavahāraḥ /
GK22vispancu:1199: evaṃ niścitya sarve sametya rājānaṃ procuḥ-deva /
GK22vispancu:1206: dattvā sukhaṃ prāpsyati vā na veti
GK22vispancu:1216: evaṃ bahu-vidhaṃ vicintya devīṃ rahaḥ-sthāṃ provāca-devi,
GK22vispancu:1218: tasya kṛtāntaḥ kupito yenaitad evaṃ kriyate /
GK22vispancu:1219: devy api tad ākarṇya vyākulī-bhūtā satvaraṃ kanyāntaḥpure gatvā tāṃ khaṇḍitādharāṃ nakha-vilikhita-śarīrāvayavāṃ duhitaram apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:1225: iti kopāṭopa-visaṅkaṭaṃ vadatyāṃ mātari rāja-putrī bhaya-lajjānatānanaṃ provāca-amba,
GK22vispancu:1226: sākṣān nārāyaṇaḥ pratyahaṃ garuḍārūḍho niśi samāyāti /
GK22vispancu:1228: tat sva-cakṣuṣā vilokayatu niguḍhatarā niśīthe bhagavantaṃ ramā-kāntam /
GK22vispancu:1229: tac chrutvā sāpi prahasita-vadanā pulakāṅkita-sarvāṅgī satvaraṃ rājānam ūce-deva,
GK22vispancu:1231: nityam eva niśīthe bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ kanyakā-pārśve'bhyeti /
GK22vispancu:1233: tad adya tvayā mayā ca rātrau vātāyana-gatābhyāṃ niśīthe draṣṭavyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1234: yato na sa mānuṣaiḥ sahālāpaṃ karoti /
GK22vispancu:1235: tac chrutvā harṣitasya rājñas tad dinaṃ varṣa-śata-prāyam iva kathañcij jagāma /
GK22vispancu:1236: tatas tu rātrau nibhṛto bhūtvā rājñī-sahito rājā vātāyanas-stho gaganāsakta-dṛṣṭir yāvat tiṣṭhati,
GK22vispancu:1237: tāvat tasmin samaye garuḍārūḍhaṃ taṃ śaṅka-cakra-gadā-padma-hastaṃ yathokta-cihnāṅkitaṃ vyomno 'vatarantaṃ nārāyaṇam apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:1238: tataḥ sudhā-pūra-plāvitam ivātmānaṃ manyamānas tām uvāca-priye /
GK22vispancu:1239: nāsty anyo dhanyataro loke mattas tvattaś ca /
GK22vispancu:1242: adhunā jāmātṛ-prabhāveṇa sakalām api vasumatīṃ vaśyāṃ kariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:1243: evaṃ niścitya sarvaiḥ sīmādhipaiḥ saha maryādā-vyatikramam akarot /
GK22vispancu:1244: te ca taṃ maryādā-vyatikrameṇa vartamānam ālokya sarve sametya tena saha vigrahaṃ cakruḥ /
GK22vispancu:1245: atrāntare sa rājā devī-mukhena tāṃ duhitaram uvāca-putri,
GK22vispancu:1246: tvayi duhitari vartamānāyāṃ nārāyaṇe bhagavati jāmātari sthite tat kim evaṃ yujyate yat sarve pārthivā mayā saha vigrahaṃ kurvanti /
GK22vispancu:1249: tatas tayā sa kauliko rātrau sa-vinayam abhihitaḥ-bhagavan,
GK22vispancu:1250: tvayi jāmātari sthite mama tāto yac chatrubhiḥ paribhūyate tan na yuktam /
GK22vispancu:1251: tat prasādaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṃs tān śatrūn vyāpādaya /
GK22vispancu:1253: kiyan-mātrās tv ete tava pituḥ śatravaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1256: atha gacchatā kālena sarva-deśaṃ śatrubhir udvāsya sa rājā prākāra-śeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1257: tathāpi vāsudeva-rūpa-dharaṃ kaulikam ajānan rāja nityam eva viśeṣataḥ karpūrāguru-kastūrikādi-parimala-viśeṣān
GK22vispancu:1258: nānā-prakāra-vastra-puṣpa-bhakṣya-peyāṃś ca preṣayan duhitṛ-mukhena tam ūce-bhagavan,
GK22vispancu:1260: yato yavasendhana-kṣayaḥ sañjātas tathā sarvo 'pi janaḥ prahārair jarjarita-dehaḥ saṃvṛtto yoddhum akṣamaḥ pracuro mṛtaś ca /
GK22vispancu:1261: tad evaṃ jñātvātra kāle yad ucitaṃ bhavati tad vidheyam iti /
GK22vispancu:1262: tac chrutvā kauliko 'py acintayat-sthāna-bhaṅge jāte mamānayā saha viyogo bhaviṣyati æ tasmād garuḍam āruhya sāyudham ātmānam ākāśe darśayāmi
GK22vispancu:1263: kadācin māṃ vāsudevaṃ manyamānās te sāśaṅkā rājño yoddhṛbhir hanyate / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1265: viṣaṃ bhavatu vā mābhūt phaṇāṭopo bhayaṅkaraḥ //Panc_1.225//
GK22vispancu:1266: atha yadi mama sthānārtham udyatasya mṛtyur bhaviṣyati tad api sundarataram / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:1268: sthānārthe yas tyajet prāṇāṃs tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ //Panc_1.226//
GK22vispancu:1270: śaraṇāgatena sārdhaṃ vipad api tejasvinā ślāghyā //Panc_1.227//
GK22vispancu:1271: evaṃ niścitya pratyūṣe danta-dhāvanaṃ kṛtvā tāṃ provāca-subhage /
GK22vispancu:1272: samastaiḥ śatrubhir hatair annaṃ pānaṃ cāsvādayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:1273: kiṃ bahunā, tvayāpi saha saṅgamaṃ tataḥ kariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:1274: paraṃ vācyas tvayātma-pitā yat prabhāte prabhūtena sainyena saha nagarān niṣkramya yoddhavyam /
GK22vispancu:1275: ahaṃ cākāśa-sthita eva sarvāṃs tān nistejasaḥ kariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:1276: paścāt sukhena bhavatā hantavyāḥ yadi punar ahaṃ tān svayam eva sūdayāmi tat teṣāṃ pāpātmanāṃ vaikuṇṭhīyā gatiḥ syāt /
GK22vispancu:1277: tasmāt te tathā kartavyā yathā palāyanto hanyamānāḥ svargaṃ na gacchanti /
GK22vispancu:1278: sāpi tad ākarṇya pituḥ samīpaṃ gatvā sarvaṃ vṛttāntaṃ nyavedayat /
GK22vispancu:1279: rājāpi tasyā vākyaṃ śraddadhānaḥ pratyūṣe samutthāya samunnaddha-sainyo yuddhārthaṃ niścakrāma /
GK22vispancu:1280: kauliko 'pi maraṇe kṛta-niścayaś cāpa-pāṇir gagana-gatir garuḍārūḍho yuddhāya prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1282: smṛta-mātro vainateyaḥ samprāpto vihasya proktaḥ-bho garutman /
GK22vispancu:1283: jānāsi tvaṃ yan mama rūpeṇa kauliko dāru-maya-garuḍe samārūḍho rāja-kanyāṃ kāmayate /
GK22vispancu:1287: śrī-bhagavān āha-adya kauliko maraṇe kṛta-niścayo vihita-niyamo yuddhārthe vinirgataḥ sa nūnaṃ pradhāna-kṣatriyair militvā vāsudevo garuḍaś ca nipātitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1288: tataḥ paraṃ loko 'yam āvayoḥ pūjāṃ na kariṣyati /
GK22vispancu:1289: tatas tvaṃ drutataraṃ tatra dāru-maya-garuḍe saṅkramaṇaṃ kuru /
GK22vispancu:1292: tataś ca śatru-vadhād āvayor māhātmya-vṛddhiḥ syāt /
GK22vispancu:1293: atha garuḍe tatheti pratipanne śrī-bhagavan-nārāyaṇas tac-charīre saṅkramaṇam akarot /
GK22vispancu:1294: tato bhagavan-māhātmyena gagana-sthaḥ sa kaulikaḥ śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-cāpa-cihnitaḥ kṣaṇād eva līlayaiva samastān api pradhāna-kṣatriyān nistejasaś cakārar /
GK22vispancu:1295: tatas tena rājñā sva-sainya-parivṛtena saṅgrāme jitā nihatāś ca te sarve'pi śatravaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1297: yathā-anena viṣṇu-jāmātṛ-prabhāveṇa sarve śatravo nihatā iti /
GK22vispancu:1298: kauliko 'pi tān hatān dṛṣṭvā pramudita-manā gaganād avatīrṇaḥ san,
GK22vispancu:1299: yāvad rājāmātya-paura-lokās taṃ nagara-vāstavyaṃ kaulikaṃ paśyanti tataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kim etad iti /
GK22vispancu:1300: tataḥ so 'pi mūlād ārabhya sarvaṃ prāg-vṛttāntaṃ nyavedayat /
GK22vispancu:1301: tataś ca kaulika-sāhasānurañjita-manasā śatru-vadhād avāpta-tejasā rājñā sā rāja-kanyā sakala-jana-pratyakṣaṃ vivāha-vidhinā tasmai samarpitā deśaś ca pradattaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1302: kauliko 'pi tayā sārdhaṃ pañca-prakāraṃ jīva-loka-sāraṃ viṣaya-sukham anubhavan kālaṃ nināya /
GK22vispancu:1304: tac chrutvā karaṭaka āha-bhadra, asty evam /
GK22vispancu:1306: yato buddhimān sañjīvako raudraś ca siṃhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1307: yadyapi te buddhi-prāgalbhyaṃ tathāpi tvaṃ piṅgalakāt taṃ viyojayitum asamartha eva /
GK22vispancu:1310: upāyena hi yac chakyaṃ na tac chakyaṃ parākramaiḥ /
GK22vispancu:1318: atha tayoḥ prasava-kāle vṛkṣa-vivarān niṣkramya kṛṣṇa-sarpaḥ sadaiva tad-apatyāni bhakṣayati /
GK22vispancu:1319: tatas tau nirvedād anya-vṛkṣa-mūla-nivāsinaṃ priya-suhṛdaṃ śṛgālaṃ gatvocatuḥ-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:1320: kim evaṃvidhe sañjāta āvayoḥ kartavyaṃ bhavati /
GK22vispancu:1321: evaṃ tāvad duṣṭātmā kṛṣṇa-sarpo vṛkṣa-vivarān nirgatyāvayor bālakān bhakṣayati /
GK22vispancu:1323: yasya kṣetraṃ nadī-tīre bhāryā ca para-saṅgatā /
GK22vispancu:1324: sa-sarpe ca gṛhe vāsaḥ kathaṃ syāt tasya nirvṛtiḥ //Panc_1.229//
GK22vispancu:1326: sarpa-yukte gṛhe vāso mṛtyur eva na saṃśayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1327: yad grāmānte vaset sarpas tasya syāt prāṇa-saṃśayaḥ //Panc_1.230//
GK22vispancu:1329: sa āha-nātra viṣaye svalpo 'pi viṣādaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1330: nūnaṃ sa lubdho nopāyam antareṇa vadhyaḥ syāt /
GK22vispancu:1331: upāyena jayo yādṛg ripos tādṛṅ na hetibhiḥ /
GK22vispancu:1340: asti kasmiṃścid vana-pradeśe nānā-jala-cara-sanāthaṃ mahat saraḥ /
GK22vispancu:1341: tatra ca kṛtāśrayo baka eko vṛddha-bhāvam upāgato matsyān vyāpādayitum asamarthaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1342: tataś ca kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭhaḥ saras-tīre upaviṣṭo muktā-phala-prakara-sadṛśair aśru-pravāhair dharā-talam abhiṣiñcan ruroda /
GK22vispancu:1343: ekaḥ kulīrako nānā-jala-cara-sametaḥ sametya tasya duḥkhena duḥkhitaḥ sādaram idam ūce-māma /
GK22vispancu:1348: mayā hi matsyādanaṃ prati parama-vairāgyatayā sāmprataṃ prāyopaveśanaṃ kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:1349: tenāhaṃ samīpāgatān api matsyān na bhakṣayāmi /
GK22vispancu:1353: aham asmin sarasi jāto vṛddhiṃ gataś ca /
GK22vispancu:1354: tan mayaitac chrutaṃ yad dvādaśa-varṣikyānāvṛṣṭiḥ sampadyate lagnā /
GK22vispancu:1356: baka āha-daivajña-mukhād eṣa śanaiścaro hi rohiṇī-śakaṭaṃ bhittvā bhaumaṃ śakraṃ ca prayāsyati /
GK22vispancu:1358: yadi bhinte sūrya-suto rohiṇyāḥ śakaṭam iha loke /
GK22vispancu:1359: dvādaśa varṣāṇi tadā nahi varṣati vāsavau bhūmau //Panc_1.233//
GK22vispancu:1361: prājāpatye śakaṭe bhinne kṛtvaiva pātakaṃ vasudhā /
GK22vispancu:1374: asmin śuṣke yaiḥ sahāhaṃ vṛddhiṃ gataḥ,
GK22vispancu:1377: tat teṣāṃ viyogaṃ draṣṭum aham asamarthaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1379: sāmprataṃ sarveṣāṃ svalpa-jalāśayānāṃ jalacarā guru-jalāśayeṣu sva-svajanair nīyante /
GK22vispancu:1381: atra punaḥ sarasi ye jalacarās te niścintāḥ santi,
GK22vispancu:1382: tenāhaṃ viśeṣād rodimi yad bīja-śesa-mātram apy atra noddhariṣyati /
GK22vispancu:1383: tataḥ sa tad ākarṇyānyeṣām api jalacarāṇāṃ tat tasya vacanaṃ nivedayāmāsa /
GK22vispancu:1384: atha te sarve bhaya-trasta-manaso matsya-kacchapa-prabhṛtayas tam abhyupetya papracchuḥ-māma /
GK22vispancu:1385: asti kaścid upāyo yenāsmākaṃ rakṣā bhavati ?
GK22vispancu:1386: baka āha-asty asya jalāśayasya nātidūre prabhūta-jala-sanāthaṃ saraḥ padminī-khaṇḍa-maṇḍitaṃ yac caturviṃśaty api varṣāṇām avṛṣṭyā na śoṣam eṣyati /
GK22vispancu:1387: tad yadi mama pṛṣṭhaṃ kaścid ārohati,
GK22vispancu:1390: tāta mātula bhrātaḥ iti bruvāṇāḥ ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti samantāt paritasthuḥ /
GK22vispancu:1391: so 'pi duṣṭāśayaḥ krameṇa tān pṛṣṭha āropya jalāśayasya nātidūre śilāṃ samāsādya
GK22vispancu:1392: tasyām ākṣipya svecchayā bhakṣayitvā bhūyo 'pi jalāśayaṃ samāsādya jalacarṇāṇāṃ mithyā-vārtā-sandeśakair
GK22vispancu:1395: mayā saha te prathamaḥ sneha-sambhāṣaḥ sañjātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1398: tad ākarṇya so 'pi duṣṭāśayaś cintitavān-nirviṇṇo 'haṃ matsya-māṃsādanena tad adyainaṃ kulīrakaṃ vyañjana-sthāne karomi /
GK22vispancu:1399: iti vicintya taṃ pṛṣṭe samāropya tāṃ vadhya-śilām uddiśya prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:1400: kulīrako 'pi dūrād evāsthi-parvataṃ śilāśrayam avalokya mastyāsthīni parijñāya tam apṛcchat-māma,
GK22vispancu:1404: so 'pi manda-dhīr jalacaro 'yam iti matvā sthale na prabhavatīti sa-smitam idam āha-kulīraka,
GK22vispancu:1408: tvām apy anyāṃ śilāyāṃ nikṣipya bhakṣayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:1409: ity uktavati tasmin sva-vadana-daṃśa-dvayena mṛṇāla-nāla-dhavalāyāṃ mṛdu-grīvāyāṃ gṛhīto mṛtaś ca /
GK22vispancu:1410: atha sa tāṃ baka-grīvāṃ samādāya śanaiḥ śanais taj jalāśayam āsasāda /
GK22vispancu:1411: tataḥ sarvair eva jalacaraiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ-bhoḥ kulīraka /
GK22vispancu:1417: sarve jalacarās tena mithyā-vādinā vañcayitvā nātidūre śilā-tale prakṣipya bhakṣitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:1418: tan mamāyuḥ-śeṣatayā tasya viśvāsa-ghātakasyābhiprāyaṃ jñātvā grīveyam ānītā /

GK22vispancu:2304: phalārthī pārthivo lokān pālayed yatnam āsthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2307: phala-prado bhavet kāle tadval lokaḥ surakṣitaḥ //Panc_1.379//
GK22vispancu:2309: tathānyad api yat kiñcit prajābhyaḥ syān nṛpasya tat //Panc_1.380//
GK22vispancu:2310: athaivaṃ garuḍaḥ samākarṇya tad-duḥkha-duḥkhitaḥ kopāviṣṭaś ca vyacintayat-aho /
GK22vispancu:2312: tad adya gatvā taṃ samudraṃ śoṣayāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2313: evaṃ cintayatas tasya viṣṇu-dūtaḥ samāgatyāha-bho garutman /
GK22vispancu:2317: tac chrutvā garuḍaḥ sābhimānaṃ prāha-bho dūta /
GK22vispancu:2319: tad gatvā taṃ vada yad anyo bhṛtyo vāhanāysamat-sthāne kriyatām /
GK22vispancu:2320: madīyo namaskāro vācyo bhagavataḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2321: yo na vetti guṇān yasya na taṃ seveta paṇḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2322: na hi tasmāt phalaṃ kiñcit sukṛṣṭād ūṣarād iva //Panc_1.381//
GK22vispancu:2324: kadācid api bhagavantaṃ prati tvayā naitad abhihitam īdṛk /
GK22vispancu:2328: tad yadi nigrahaṃ na karoti tad ahaṃ bhagavato na bhṛtya ity eṣa niścayas tvayā vācyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2329: tad drutataraṃ gatvā bhavatā bhagavataḥ samīpe vaktavyam /
GK22vispancu:2330: atha dūta-mukhena praṇaya-kupitaṃ vainateyaṃ vijñāya sammāna-puraḥsaraṃ tam ānayāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2331: bhaktaṃ śaktaṃ kulīnaṃ ca na bhṛtyam avamānayet /
GK22vispancu:2332: putraval lālayen nityaṃ ya icchec chriyam ātmanaḥ //Panc_1.382//
GK22vispancu:2335: te tu sammānitās tasya prāṇair apy upakurvate //Panc_1.383//
GK22vispancu:2336: ity evaṃ sampradhārya rukma-pure vainateya-sakāśaṃ satvaram agamat /
GK22vispancu:2337: vainateyo 'pi gṛhāgataṃ bhagavantam avalokya trapādhomukhaḥ praṇamyovāca-bhagavan /
GK22vispancu:2338: tvad-āśrayonmattena samudreṇa mama bhṛtyāsyāṇḍāny apahṛtya mamāpamāno vihitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2340: no ced enam ahaṃ sthalāntaram adyaiva nayāmi /
GK22vispancu:2341: yataḥ svāmi-bhayāc chravaṇo 'pi prahāro na dīyate / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2342: yena syāl laghutā vātha pīḍā citte prabhoḥ kvacit /
GK22vispancu:2343: prāṇa-tyāge'pi tat karma na kuryāt kula-sevakaḥ //Panc_1.384//
GK22vispancu:2347: tena lajjāpi tasyotthā na bhṛtyasya tathā punaḥ //Panc_1.385//
GK22vispancu:2348: tad āgaccha yenāṇḍāni samudrād ādāya ṭiṭṭibhaṃ sambhāvayāvaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2350: tathānuṣṭhite samudro bhagavatā nirbharsyāgneyaṃ śaraṃ sandhyāyābhihitaḥ-bho durātman /
GK22vispancu:2353: tataḥ samudreṇa sa-bhayena ṭiṭṭibhāṇḍāni tāni pradattāni /
GK22vispancu:2357: tad ākarṇya sañjīvakas tam eva bhūyo 'pi papraccha-bho mitra /
GK22vispancu:2359: iyantaṃ kālaṃ yāvad uttarottara-snehena prasādena cāhaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2361: tat kathyatāṃ yenāham ātma-rakṣārthaṃ tad-vadhāyodyamaṃ karomi /
GK22vispancu:2365: yadi rakta-netras triśikhāṃ bhrūkuṭiṃ dadhānaḥ sṛkkaṇī parilelihan tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavati,
GK22vispancu:2370: tvayā ca yathāyaṃ mantra-bhedo na bhavati tathā kāryam /
GK22vispancu:2371: yadi niśāmukhaṃ prāpya gantuṃ śaknoṣi tad-deśa-tyāgaḥ kāryaḥ / yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:2372: tyajed ekaṃ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet /
GK22vispancu:2374: āpad-arthe dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanair api /
GK22vispancu:2375: ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārair api dhanair api //Panc_1.387//
GK22vispancu:2378: athavātmā sāmādibhir upāyair ābharakṣaṇīyaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2379: api putra-kalatrair vā prāṇān rakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2380: vidyamānair yatas taiḥ syāt sarvaṃ bhūyo 'pi dehinām //Panc_1.388//
GK22vispancu:2382: yena kenāpy upāyena śubhenāpy aśubhena vā /
GK22vispancu:2383: uddhared dīnam ātmānaṃ samartho dharmam ācaret //Panc_1.389//
GK22vispancu:2384: yo māyāṃ kurute mūḍhaḥ prāṇa-tyāge dhanādiṣu /
GK22vispancu:2385: tasya prāṇāḥ praṇaśyanti tair naṣṭair naṣṭam eva tat //Panc_1.390//
GK22vispancu:2396: daivaṃ nihatya kuru pauruṣam ātma-śaktyā yatne kṛte yadi na sidhyati ko 'tra doṣaḥ //Panc_1.392//
GK22vispancu:2397: karaṭaka āha-tat kathaya kīdṛk tvayā nīti-bījaṃ nirvāpitam /
GK22vispancu:2398: so 'bravīt-mayānyonyaṃ tābhyāṃ mithyā-prajalpena bhedas tathā vihito yathā bhūyo 'pi mantrayantāv eka-sthāna-sthitau na drakṣyasi /
GK22vispancu:2400: na yuktaṃ bhavatā vihitaṃ yat parasparaṃ tau snehārdra-hṛdayau sukhāśrayau kopa-sāgare prakṣiptau / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2402: janma-janmāntare duḥkhī sa naraḥ syād asaṃśayam //Panc_1.393//
GK22vispancu:2403: aparaṃ tvaṃ yad bheda-mātreṇāpi hṛṣṭas tad apy ayuktam,
GK22vispancu:2404: yataḥ sarvato 'pi jano virūpa-karaṇe samartho bhavati nopakartum / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2405: ghātayitum eva nīcaḥ para-kāryaṃ vetti na prasādayitum /
GK22vispancu:2406: pātayitum asti śaktir vāyor vṛkṣaṃ na connamitum //Panc_1.394//
GK22vispancu:2410: jāta-mātraṃ na yaḥ śatruṃ vyādhiṃ ca praśamaṃ nayet /
GK22vispancu:2411: mahā-balo 'pi tenaiva vṛddhiṃ prāpya sa hanyate //Panc_1.395//
GK22vispancu:2414: sa tasya sahajaḥ śatrur ucchedyo 'pi priye sthitaḥ //Panc_1.396//
GK22vispancu:2415: tan mayā sa udāsīnatayā samānīto 'bhaya-pradānena yāvat tāvad aham api tena sācivyāt pracyāvitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2417: dadyāt sādhur yadi nija-pade durjanāya praveśaṃ
GK22vispancu:2418: tan-nāśāya prabhavati tato vāñchamānaḥ svayaṃ saḥ /
GK22vispancu:2420: jārāpi syād gṛha-patir iti śrūyate vākyato 'tra //Panc_1.397//
GK22vispancu:2421: tena mayā tasyopari vadhopāya eva viracyate /
GK22vispancu:2423: tac ca tvāṃ muktvānyo na jñāsyati /
GK22vispancu:2424: tad uktam etat te svārthāyānuṣṭhitam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2429: aparaṃ sācivyaṃ ca bhaviṣyati tṛptiś ceti /
GK22vispancu:2430: tad-guṇa-traye'sminn upasthite kasmān māṃ dūṣayasi tvaṃ jāḍya-bhāvāt / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2431: parasya pīḍanaṃ kurvan svārtha-siddhiṃ ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2432: mūḍha-buddhir na bhakṣeta vane caturako yathā //Panc_1.399//
GK22vispancu:2437: asti kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe vajra-daṃṣṭro nāma siṃhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2438: tasya caturaka-kravyamukha-nāmānau śṛgāla-vṛkau bhṛtya-bhūtau sadaivānugatau tatraiva vane prativasataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2439: athānya-dine siṃhena kadācid āsanna-prasavā prasava-vedanayā sva-yūthād bhraṣṭoṣṭry upaviṣṭā kasmiṃścid vana-gahane samāsāditā /
GK22vispancu:2440: atha tāṃ vyāpādya yāvad udaraṃ sphoṭayati,
GK22vispancu:2442: siṃho 'pi dāserakyāḥ piśitena saparivāraḥ parāṃ tṛptim upāgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2443: paraṃ snehād bāla-dāsekaṃ tyaktaṃ gṛham ānīyedam uvāca-bhadra,
GK22vispancu:2444: na te'sti mṛtyor bhayaṃ matto nānyasmād api /
GK22vispancu:2448: evam anuṣṭhite catvāro 'pi na eka-sthāne vihāriṇaḥ parasparam aneka-prakāra-goṣṭhī-sukham anubhavantas tiṣṭhanti /
GK22vispancu:2449: śaṅkukarṇo 'pi yauvana-padavīm ārūḍhaḥ kṣaṇam api na taṃ siṃhaṃ muñcati /
GK22vispancu:2450: atha kadācid vajra-daṃṣṭrasya kenacid vanyena matta-gajena saha yuddham abhavat /
GK22vispancu:2451: tena mada-vīryāt sa danta-prahārais tathā kṣata-śarīro vihito yathā pracalituṃ na śaknoti /
GK22vispancu:2453: anviṣyatāṃ kiñcit sattvaṃ yenāham evaṃ sthito 'pi taṃ vyāpādyātmano yuṣmākaṃ ca kṣut-praṇāśaṃ karomi /
GK22vispancu:2454: tac chrutvā te trayo 'pi vane sandhyā-kālaṃ yāvad bhrāntāḥ,
GK22vispancu:2456: atha caturakaś cintayāmāsa-yadi śaṅkukarṇo 'yaṃ vyāpādyeta tataḥ sarveṣāṃ katicid dināni tṛptir bhavati /
GK22vispancu:2457: paraṃ nainaṃ svāmī mitratvād āśraya-samāśritatvāc ca vināśayiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:2458: athavā buddhi-prabhāveṇa svāminaṃ pratibodhya tathā kariṣye yathā vyāpādayiṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2460: loke buddhimatām atra tasmāt tāṃ yojayāmy aham //Panc_1.400//
GK22vispancu:2461: evaṃ vicintya śaṅkukarṇam idam āha-bhoḥ śaṅkukarṇa /
GK22vispancu:2462: svāmī tāvat pathyaṃ vinā kṣudhayā paripīḍyate /
GK22vispancu:2463: svāmya-bhāvād asmākam api dhruvaṃ vināśa eva /
GK22vispancu:2467: yena te vacanaṃ śīghraṃ nirvikalpaṃ karomi /
GK22vispancu:2468: aparaṃ svāminohite kṛte mayā sukṛta-śataṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:2474: yady evaṃ tan madīya-prayojanam etad ucyatām /
GK22vispancu:2481: tad yadi svāmī dviguṇaṃ śarīraṃ prayacchati /
GK22vispancu:2482: tataḥ śaṅkukarṇo 'yaṃ dviguṇa-vṛddhyā sva-śarīraṃ prayacchati dharma-pratibhuvā /
GK22vispancu:2486: atha siṃha-vacanānantaraṃ vṛka-śṛgālābhyāṃ vidāritobhaya-kukṣiḥ śaṅkukarṇaḥ pañcatvam upāgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2488: yāvad ahaṃ nadīṃ gatvā snānaṃ devatārcana-vidhiṃ kṛtvāgacchāmi,
GK22vispancu:2489: tāvat tvayātrāpamattena bhāvyam ity uktvā nadyāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2490: atha tasmin gate caturakaś cintayāmāsa-kathaṃ mamaikākino bhojyo 'yam uṣṭro bhaviṣyati iti vicintya kravyamukham āha-bhoḥ kravyamukha /
GK22vispancu:2495: so 'pi tac chrutvā yāvat kiñcin māṃsam āsvādayati tāvac caturakeṇoktam-bhoḥ kravyamukha /
GK22vispancu:2499: tathānuṣṭhite siṃhaḥ samāyāto yāvad uṣṭraṃ paśyati tāvad riktīkṛta-hṛdayo dāserakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2500: tato bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā paruṣataram āha-aho kenaiṣa uṣṭra ucchiṣṭatāṃ nīto,
GK22vispancu:2504: mām anādṛtya piśitaṃ bhakṣayitvādhunā man-mukham avalokayasi /
GK22vispancu:2506: tad ākarṇya kravyamukho jīva-nāśa-bhayād dūra-deśaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2507: etasminn antare tena mārgeṇa dāseraka-sārtho bhārākrāntaḥ samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2509: tasyāḥ śabdaṃ durato 'py ākarṇya siṃho jambukam āha-bhadra,
GK22vispancu:2510: jñāyatāṃ kim eṣa raudraḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate'śruta-pūrvaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:2512: caturakaḥ kiñcid vanāntaraṃ gatvā satvaram abhyupetya provāca-svāmin /
GK22vispancu:2520: tat sahasra-guṇam uṣṭram asya sakāśād grahīṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:2521: iti niścitya bṛhan-mānam ādāyāgresarasyoṣṭrasya grīvāyāṃ ghaṇṭāṃ baddhvā badhya-dāseraka-saktān api pitṛ-pitāmahān ādāya vaira-niryātanārtham āyāta eva /
GK22vispancu:2522: siṃho 'pi tac chrutvā sarvato dūrād evāvalokya mṛtam uṣṭraṃ parityajya prāṇa-bhayāt praṇaṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2523: caturako 'pi śanaiḥ śanais tasyoṣṭrasya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayāmāsa /
GK22vispancu:2525: atha damanake gate sañjīvakaś cintayāmāsa-aho kim etan mayā kṛtam ?
GK22vispancu:2528: agamyāni pumān yāti yo 'sevyāṃś ca niṣevate /
GK22vispancu:2529: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā //Panc_1.401//
GK22vispancu:2537: dharmārthaṃ yatatām apīha vipado devād yadi syuḥ kvacit
GK22vispancu:2538: tat tāsām upaśāntaye sumatibhiḥ kāryo viśeṣān nayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2539: loke khyātim upāgatātra sakale lokoktir eṣā yato
GK22vispancu:2540: dagdhānāṃ kila vahninā hita-karaḥ seko 'pi tasyodbhavaḥ //Panc_1.402//
GK22vispancu:2545: yad bhāvi tad bhavati nātra vicāra-hetuḥ //Panc_1.403//
GK22vispancu:2546: aparaṃ cānyatra gatasyāpi me kasyacid duṣṭa-sattvasya māṃsāśinaḥ sakāśān mṛtyur bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:2551: mahato 'pi kṣayaṃ labdhvā ślāghyaṃ nīco 'pi gacchati /
GK22vispancu:2553: evaṃ niścitya sa sthalita-gatiṃ mandaṃ gatvā siṃhāśrayaṃ paśyann apaṭhat-aho,
GK22vispancu:2558: duḥkhena pravigāhyate sa-cakitaṃ rājñāṃ manaḥ sāmayam //Panc_1.406//
GK22vispancu:2559: evaṃ paṭhan damanakoktākāraṃ piṅgalakaṃ dṛṣṭvā pracakitaḥ saṃvṛta-śarīro dūrataraṃ praṇāma-kṛtiṃ vināpy upaviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2560: piṅgalako 'pi tathāvidhaṃ taṃ vilokya damanaka-vākyaṃ śraddadhānaḥ kopāt tasyopari papāta /
GK22vispancu:2561: atha sañjīvakaḥ khara-nakha-vikartita-pṛṣṭhaḥ śṛṅgābhyāṃ tad-udaram ullikhya katham api tasmād apetaḥ śṛṅgābhyāṃ hantum icchan yuddhāyāvasthitaḥ
GK22vispancu:2562: atha dvāv api tau puṣpita-palāśa-pratimau paraspara-vadha-kāṅkṣiṇau dṛṣṭvā karaṭako damanakam āha-bho mūḍha-mate /
GK22vispancu:2563: anayor virodhaṃ vitanvatā tvayā sādhu na kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:2566: kāryāṇy uttama-daṇḍa-sāhasa-phalāny āyāsa-sādhyāni ye prītyā saṃśamayanti nīti-kuśalāḥ sāmnaiva te mantriṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2567: niḥsārālpa-phalāni ye tv avidhinā vāñchanti daṇḍodyamais
GK22vispancu:2568: teṣāṃ durnaya-ceṣṭitair narapater āropyate śrīs tulām //Panc_1.407//
GK22vispancu:2569: tad yadi svāmy-abhighāto bhaviṣyati tat kiṃ tavdīya-mantra-buddhyā kriyate /
GK22vispancu:2570: atha sañjīvako na badhyate tathāpy abhavyam /
GK22vispancu:2575: tad vṛthā manoratho 'yaṃ te daṇḍaruceḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2577: teṣāṃ daṇḍas tu pāpīyāṃs taṃ paścād viniyojayet //Panc_1.408//
GK22vispancu:2579: sāmnaiva yatra siddhir na tatra daṇḍo budhena viniyojyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2580: pittaṃ yadi śarkarayā śāmyati ko 'rthaḥ paṭolena //Panc_1.409//
GK22vispancu:2583: sāma-sādhyāni kāryāṇi vikriyāṃ yānti na kvacit //Panc_1.410//
GK22vispancu:2584: na candreṇa na cāuṣadhyā na sūryeṇa na vahninā /
GK22vispancu:2595: so 'yaṃ svāmy-amātyayor ekatamasya kiṃ vā dvayor api vinipātaḥ samutpadyate lagnaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2596: tad yadi kācic chaktir asti tad vicintyatāṃ vinipāta-pratīkāraḥ /
GK22vispancu:2599: tat kartum asamarthatvaṃ yato viparīta-buddhir asi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2601: karmaṇi vyajyate prajñā susthe ko vā na paṇḍitaḥ //Panc_1.412//
GK22vispancu:2603: ghātayitum eva nīcaḥ para-kāryaṃ vetti na prasādhayitum /
GK22vispancu:2607: yas te vākyaṃ śraddadhāti / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2612: tad yadi tvam asya mantrī bhaviṣyasi tadānyo 'pi kaścin nāsya samīpe sādhu-janaḥ sameṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2615: tathā ca śiṣṭa-jana-rahitasya svāmino 'pi nāśo bhaviṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2617: ye ramante nṛpās teṣāṃ ramante ripavaḥ śriyā //Panc_1.416//
GK22vispancu:2619: kevalaṃ doṣo na guṇaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2620: nānāmyaṃ namate dāru nāśmani syāt kṣura-kriyā /
GK22vispancu:2627: tac ca kadācid dhemanta-samaye'tikaṭhora-vāta-saṃsparśa-vepamāna-kalevaraṃ tuṣāra-varṣoddhata-pravarṣa-ghana-dhārā-nipāta-samāhataṃ na kathañcic chāntim agamat /
GK22vispancu:2628: atha kecid vānarā vahni-kaṇa-sadṛśāni guñjā-phalāny avacitya vahni-vāñchayā phūtkurvantaḥ samantāt tasthuḥ /
GK22vispancu:2629: atha sucīmukho nāma pakṣī teṣāṃ taṃ vṛthāyāsamavalokya provāca-bhoḥ,

GK22vispancu:2697: atha kadācit pāpabuddhinā cintitaṃ yad-ahaṃ tāvan mūrkho dāridryopetaś ca /
GK22vispancu:2698: tad enaṃ dharmabuddhim ādāya deśāntaraṃ gatvā asyāśrayeṇārthopārjanāṃ kṛtvainam api vañcayitvā sukhībhavāmi /
GK22vispancu:2699: athānyasminn ahani pāpabuddhir dharmabuddhiṃ prāha-bho mitra /

GK22vispancu:2705: vidyāṃ vittaṃ śilpaṃ tāvan nāpnoti mānavaḥ samyak /

GK22vispancu:2707: atha tasya tad-vacanam ākarṇya prahṛṣṭa-manās tenaiva saha guru-janānujñātaḥ śubhe'hani deśāntaraṃ prasthitaḥ /

GK22vispancu:2725: athānyedyur dharmabuddhiṃ sametya provāca-sakhe bahu-kuṭumbā vayaṃ vittābhāvāt sīdāmaḥ /

GK22vispancu:2730: atrāntare pāpabuddhiḥ śiras tāḍayan provāca-bho dharmabuddhe /

GK22vispancu:2752: tad asmākam apy atra viṣaye mahat kautūhalam vartate /

GK22vispancu:2772: āvayor madhye yaś caura tat kathayata /

GK22vispancu:2783: upāyaṃ cintayet prājñas tathāpāyam api cintayet /

GK22vispancu:2850: tathānuṣṭhite vaṇik snātvā taṃ śiśuṃ nadī-guhāyāṃ prakṣipya tad-dvāraṃ bṛhac-chilayācchādya satvaraṃ gṛham āgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:2851: pṛṣṭaś ca tena vaṇijā-bho 'bhyāgata tat kathyatāṃ kutra me śiśur yas tvayā saha nadīṃ gataḥ iti /

GK22vispancu:2875: tan mūrkha / sañjīvaka-prasādam asahamānena tvayaitat kṛtam /

GK22vispancu:2890: kasyacid rājño nityaṃ vānaro 'tibhakti-paro 'ṅga-sevako 'ntaḥ-pure apy apratiṣiddha-prasaro 'tiviśvāsa-sthānam abhūt /

GK22vispancu:2895: paraṃ tena śita-dhāreṇāsinā rājño vakṣo dvidhā jātaṃ rājā mṛtaś ca /
GK22vispancu:2896: tasmāc cirāyur icchatā nṛpeṇa mūrkho 'nucaro na rakṣaṇīyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2897: aparam ekasmin nagare ko 'pi vipro mahā-vidvān paraṃ pūrva-janma-yogena cauro vartate /
GK22vispancu:2898: tasmin pure'nya-deśād āgatāṃś caturo viprān bahūni vastūni vikrīṇato dṛṣṭvā cintitavān-aho kenopāyenaiṣāṃ dhanaṃ labhe /
GK22vispancu:2899: iti vicintya teṣāṃ puro 'nekāni śāstroktāni subhāṣitāni cātipriyāṇi madhurāṇi vacanāni jalpatā teṣāṃ manasi viśvāsam utpādya sevā kartum ārabdhā
GK22vispancu:2901: asatī bhavati salajjā kṣāraṃ nīraṃ ca śītalaṃ bhavati /
GK22vispancu:2902: dambhī bhavati vivekī priyavaktā bhavati dhūrtajanaḥ //Panc_1.451//
GK22vispancu:2903: atha tasmin sevāṃ kurvati tair vipraiḥ sarva-vastūni vikrīya bahu-mūlyāni ratnāni krītāni /
GK22vispancu:2904: tatas tāni jaṅghā-madhye tat-samakṣaṃ prakṣipya sva-deśaṃ prati gantum udyamo vihitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2905: tataḥ sa dhūrta-vipras tān viprān gantum udyatān prekṣya cintā-vyākulita-manāḥ saṃjātaḥ-
GK22vispancu:2906: aho dhanam etan na kiṃcin mama caṭitam /
GK22vispancu:2908: pathi kvāpi viṣaṃ dattvaitān nihatya sarva-ratnāni gṛhṇāmi /
GK22vispancu:2909: iti vicintya teṣām agre sa-karuṇaṃ vilapyedam āha-bho mitrāṇi /
GK22vispancu:2910: yūyaṃ mām ekākinaṃ muktvā gantum udyatāḥ /
GK22vispancu:2911: tan me mano bhavadbhiḥ saha sneha-pāśena baddhaṃ bhavad-viraha-nāmnaivākulaṃ sañjātaṃ yathā dhṛtiṃ kvāpi na dhatte /
GK22vispancu:2912: yūyam anugrahaṃ vidhāya sahāya-bhūtaṃ mām api sahaiva nayata /
GK22vispancu:2913: tad-vacaḥ śrutvā te karuṇārdra-cittās tena samam eva sva-deśaṃ prati prasthitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:2914: athādhvani teṣāṃ pañcānām api pallī-pura-madhye vrajatāṃ dhvāṅkṣāḥ kathayitum ārabdhāḥ-re re kirātāḥ /
GK22vispancu:2918: tataḥ kirātair dhvāṅkṣa-vacanam ākarṇya satvaraṃ gatvā te viprā laguḍa-prahārair jarjarī-kṛtya vastrāṇi mocayitvā vilokitāḥ,
GK22vispancu:2922: tato bhavatāṃ saṃnidhau kvāpi dhanaṃ vidyate tad arpayata /
GK22vispancu:2923: anyathā sarveṣām api vadhaṃ vidhāya carma vidārya pratyaṅgaṃ prekṣya dhanaṃ neṣyāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2924: tadā teṣām īdṛśaṃ vacanam ākarṇya caura-vipreṇa manasi cintitam-yadaiṣāṃ viprāṇāṃ vadhaṃ vidhāyāṅgaṃ vilokya ratnāni neṣyanti,
GK22vispancu:2925: tadāpi māṃ vadhiṣyanti tato 'haṃ pūrvam evātmānam aratnaṃ samarpyaitān muñcāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2926: mṛtyor bibheṣi kiṃ bāla na sa bhītaṃ vimuñcati /
GK22vispancu:2927: adya vābda-śatānte vā mṛtyur vai prāṇināṃ dhruvaḥ //Panc_1.452//
GK22vispancu:2929: gavārthe brāhmaṇārthe ca prāṇa-tyāgaṃ karoti yaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2930: sūryasya maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim //Panc_1.453//
GK22vispancu:2932: yady evaṃ tato māṃ pūrvaṃ nihatya vilokayata /
GK22vispancu:2933: tatas tais tathānuṣṭhite taṃ dhana-rahitam avalokyāpare catvāro 'pi muktāḥ / ***********************************************************************
GK22vispancu:2935: athaivaṃ saṃvadatoḥ sañjīvakaḥ kṣaṇam ekaṃ pīṅgalakena saha yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tasya khara-nakhara-prahārābhihito gatāsur vasundharā-pīṭhe nipapāta
GK22vispancu:2936: atha taṃ gatāsum avalokya piṅgalakas tad-guṇa-smaraṇārdra-hṛdayaḥ provāca-bhoḥ,
GK22vispancu:2937: ayuktaṃ mayā pāpena kṛtaṃ sañjīvakaṃ vyāpādayatā /
GK22vispancu:2938: yato viśvāsa-ghātād anyan nāsti pāpataraṃ karma / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2939: mitra-drohī kṛtaghnaś ca yaś ca viśvāsa-ghātakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2940: te narā narakaṃ yānti yāvac candra-divākarau //Panc_1.454//
GK22vispancu:2943: no yuktam uktaṃ hy anayoḥ samatvaṃ
GK22vispancu:2945: tathā mayā sabhā-madhye sa sadaiva praśaṃsitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:2946: tat kiṃ kathayiṣyāmi teṣām agrataḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2947: ukto bhavati yaḥ pūrvaṃ guṇavān iti saṃsadi /
GK22vispancu:2949: evaṃ-vidhaṃ pralapantaṃ damanakaḥ sametya saharṣam idam āha-deva,
GK22vispancu:2950: kātaratamas tavaiṣa nyāyo yad droha-kāriṇaṃ śaṣpa-bhujaṃ hatvetthaṃ śocasi /
GK22vispancu:2951: tan naitad upapannaṃ bhūbhujām / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:2952: pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro bhāryāthavā suhṛt /
GK22vispancu:2953: prāṇa-drohaṃ yadā gacched dhantavyo nāsti pātakam //Panc_1.457//
GK22vispancu:2958: tyājyā amī yaś ca kṛtaṃ na vetti //Panc_1.458//
GK22vispancu:2965: akṛtopadravaḥ kaścin mahān api na pūjyate /
GK22vispancu:2966: pūjayanti narā nāgān na tārkṣyaṃ nāga-ghātinam //Panc_1.460//
GK22vispancu:2968: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñā-vādāṃś ca bhāṣase /
GK22vispancu:2970: evaṃ tena sambodhitaḥ piṅgalakaḥ sañjīvaka-śokaṃ tyaktvā damanaka-sācivyena rājyam akarot /
GK22vispancu:2975: athedam ārabhyate mitra-samprāptir nāma dvitīyaṃ tantram /
GK22vispancu:2982: asti dākṣiṇātye janapade mahilāropyaṃ nāma nagaram /
GK22vispancu:2983: tasya nātidūrastho mahocchrāyavān nānā-vihaṅgopabhukta-phalaḥ kīṭair āvṛta-koṭaraś chāyāśvāsita-pathika-jana-samūho nyagrodha-pādapo mahān /
GK22vispancu:2987: viśrabdhaṃ madhupair nipīta-kusumaḥ ślāghyaḥ sa eva drumaḥ
GK22vispancu:2989: tatra ca laghupatanako nāma vāyasaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:2990: sa kadācit prāṇa-yātrārthaṃ puram uddiśya pracalito yāvat paśyati,
GK22vispancu:2991: tāvaj jāla-hasto 'tikṛṣṇa-tanuḥ sphuṭita-caraṇa ūrdhva-keśo yama-kiṅkarākāro naraḥ saṃmukho babhūva /
GK22vispancu:2992: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṅkita-manā vyacintayat-yad ayaṃ durātmādya mamāśraya-vaṭa-pādapa-sammukho 'bhyeti /
GK22vispancu:2993: tan na jñāyate kim adya vaṭa-vāsināṃ vihaṅgamānāṃ saṅkṣayo bhaviṣyati na vā /
GK22vispancu:2994: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vicintya tat-kṣaṇān nivṛtya tam eva baṭa-pādapaṃ gatvā sarvān vihaṅgamān provāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:2998: te taṇḍulā bhavadbhiḥ sarvair api kālakūṭa-sadṛśā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GK22vispancu:2999: evaṃ vadatas tasya sa lubdhakas tatra baṭa-tala āgatya jālaṃ prasārya sindu-vāra-sadṛśāṃs taṇḍulān prakṣipya nātidūraṃ gatvā nibhṛtaḥ sthitaḥ
GK22vispancu:3000: atha ye pakṣiṇas tatra sthitās te laghu-patanaka-vākyārgalayā nivāritās tāṃs taṇḍulān hālāhālāṅkurān iva vīkṣamāṇā nibhṛtās tasthuḥ /
GK22vispancu:3001: atrāntare citragrīvo nāma kapotarājaḥ sahasra-parivāraḥ prāṇa-yātrārtha-paribhramaṃs
GK22vispancu:3002: tāṃs taṇḍulān dūrato 'pi paśyan laghupatanakena nivāryamāṇo 'pi jihvā-laulyād bhakṣaṇārtham apatat /
GK22vispancu:3009: paulastyaḥ katham anya-dāra-haraṇe doṣaṃ na vijñātavān
GK22vispancu:3011: akṣaiś cāpi yudhiṣṭhireṇa sahasā prāpto hy anarthaḥ kathaṃ
GK22vispancu:3016: atrāntare lubdhakas tān baddhān vijñāya prahṛṣṭa-manāḥ prodyata-yaṣṭis tad-vadhārthaṃ pradhāvitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3017: citragrīvo 'py ātmānaṃ sa-parivāraṃ baddhaṃ matvā lubdhakam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān kapotān ūce-aho,
GK22vispancu:3019: vyasaneṣv eva sarveṣu yasya buddhir na hīyate /
GK22vispancu:3020: sa teṣāṃ pāram abhyeti tat-prabhāvād asaṃśayam //Panc_2.6//
GK22vispancu:3021: sampattau ca vipattau ca mahatām eka-rūpatā /
GK22vispancu:3022: udaye savitā rakto raktaś cāsta-maye tathā //Panc_2.7//
GK22vispancu:3023: tat sarve vayaṃ helayoḍḍīya sa-pāśa-jālā asyādarśanaṃ gatvā muktiṃ prāpnumaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3024: no ced bhaya-viklavāḥ santo helayā samutpātaṃ na kariṣyatha /
GK22vispancu:3026: tantavo 'py āyatā nityaṃ tantavo bahulāḥ samāḥ /
GK22vispancu:3027: bahūn bahutvād āyāsān sahantīty upamā satām //Panc_2.8//
GK22vispancu:3028: tathānuṣṭhite lubdhako jālam ādāyākāśe gacchatāṃ teṣāṃ pṛṣṭhato bhūmistho 'pi paryadhāvat /
GK22vispancu:3030: jālam ādāya gacchanti saṃhatāḥ pakṣiṇo 'py amī /
GK22vispancu:3031: yāvac ca vivadiṣyante patiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ //Panc_2.9//
GK22vispancu:3032: laghupatanako 'pi prāṇa-yātrā-kriyāṃ tyaktvā kim atra bhaviṣyantīti kutūhalāt tat-pṛṣṭhato 'nusarati /
GK22vispancu:3033: atha dṛṣṭer agocaratāṃ gatān vijñāya lubdhako nirāśaḥ ślokam apaṭhan nivṛttaś ca-
GK22vispancu:3034: nahi bhavati yan na bhāvyaṃ bhavati ca bhāvyaṃ vināpi yatnena /
GK22vispancu:3035: karatala-gatam api naśyati yasya hi bhavitavyatā nāsti //Panc_2.10//
GK22vispancu:3037: parāṅmukhe vidhau cet syāt kathañcid draviṇodayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3038: tat so 'nyad api saṅgṛhya yāti śaṅkha-nidhir yathā //Panc_2.11//
GK22vispancu:3039: tad āstāṃ tāvad vihaṅgāmiṣa-lobho yāvat kuṭumba-vartanopāya-bhūtaṃ jālam api me naṣṭam /
GK22vispancu:3040: citragrīvo 'pi lubdhakam adarśanībhūtaṃ jñātvā tān uvāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:3042: tat sarvair api svasthair gamyatāṃ mahilāropyasya prāg-uttara-dig-bhāge /
GK22vispancu:3043: tatra mama suhṛd dhiraṇyako nāma mūṣakaḥ sarveṣāṃ pāśa-cchedaṃ kariṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3045: vāṅ-mātreṇāpi sāhāyyaṃ mitrād anyo na sandadhe //Panc_2.12//
GK22vispancu:3046: evaṃ te kapotāś citragrīveṇa sambodhitā mahilāropye nagare hiraṇyaka-bila-durgaṃ prāpuḥ /
GK22vispancu:3047: hiraṇyako 'pi sahasra-mukha-bila-durgaṃ praviṣṭaḥ sann akutobhayaḥ sukhenāsta /
GK22vispancu:3050: sarveṣāṃ jāyate vaśyo durga-hīnas tathā nṛpaḥ //Panc_2.13//
GK22vispancu:3052: na gajānāṃ sahasreṇa na ca lakṣeṇa vājinām /
GK22vispancu:3053: tat karma sidhyate rājñāṃ dureṇaikena yad raṇe //Panc_2.14//
GK22vispancu:3056: atha citragrīvo bilam āsādya tāra-svareṇa provāca-bho bho mitra hiraṇyaka /
GK22vispancu:3059: tac chrutvā hiraṇyako 'pi bila-durgāntargataḥ san provāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:3068: tad ākarṇya pulakita-tanuḥ prahṛṣṭātmā sthira-manās tvaramāṇo niṣkrāntaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3073: iṣṭā bhāryā sumitraṃ ca apūrvāṇi dine dine //Panc_2.17//
GK22vispancu:3075: citte ca tasya saukhyasya na kiñcit pratimaṃ sukham //Panc_2.18//
GK22vispancu:3076: atha citraṃ grīvaṃ saparivāraṃ pāśa-baddham ālokya hiraṇyakaḥ sa-viṣādam idam āha-bhoḥ, kim etat ?
GK22vispancu:3077: sa āha-bhoḥ, jānann api kiṃ pṛcchasi ?
GK22vispancu:3079: yasmāc ca yena ca yadā ca yathā ca yac ca
GK22vispancu:3080: yāvac ca yatra ca śubhāśubham ātma-karma /
GK22vispancu:3081: tasmāc ca tena ca tadā ca tathā ca tac ca
GK22vispancu:3082: tāvac ca tatra ca kṛtānta-vaśād upaiti //Panc_2.19//
GK22vispancu:3087: so 'pi pārśva-sthitaṃ daivād bandhanaṃ na ca paśyati //Panc_2.20//
GK22vispancu:3092: vidhir aho balavān iti me matiḥ //Panc_2.21//
GK22vispancu:3095: badhyante nipuṇair agādha-salilān mīnāḥ samudrād api /
GK22vispancu:3096: durnītaṃ kim ihāsti kiṃ ca sukṛtaṃ kaḥ sthāna-lābhe guṇaḥ
GK22vispancu:3097: kālaḥ sarva-janān prasārita-karo gṛhṇāti dūrād api //Panc_2.22//
GK22vispancu:3098: evam uktvā citragrīvasya pāśaṃ chettum udyataṃ sa tam āha-bhadra,
GK22vispancu:3109: tat katham etāvan-mātram api saṃmānaṃ na karomi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3110: yaḥ saṃmānaṃ sadā dhatte bhṛtyānāṃ kṣitipo 'dhikam /
GK22vispancu:3111: vittābhāve'pi taṃ dṛṣṭvā te tyajanti na karhicit //Panc_2.23//
GK22vispancu:3113: viśvāsaḥ sampadāṃ mūlaṃ tena yūthapatir gajaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3115: aparaṃ mama kadācit pāśa-cchede kurvatas te danta-bhaṅgo bhavati /
GK22vispancu:3117: tan nūnaṃ naraka-pāta eva / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3118: sadācāreṣu bhṛtyeṣu saṃsīdatsu ca yaḥ prabhuḥ /
GK22vispancu:3119: sukhī syān narakaṃ yāti paratreha ca sīdati //Panc_2.25//
GK22vispancu:3124: bhavān apy anena bahu-kapota-parivāreṇa bhaviṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3125: kāruṇyaṃ saṃvibhāgaś ca yathā bhṛtyeṣu lakṣyate /
GK22vispancu:3127: evam uktvā sarveṣāṃ pāśa-cchedaṃ kṛtvā hiraṇyakaś citragrīvam āha-mitra,
GK22vispancu:3130: tān sampreṣya punar api durgaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3133: mitravān sādhayaty arthān duḥsādhyān api vai yataḥ /
GK22vispancu:3134: tasmān mitrāṇi kurvīta samānāny eva cātmanaḥ //Panc_2.27//
GK22vispancu:3135: laghupatanako 'pi vāyasaḥ sarvaṃ taṃ citragrīva-bandhu-mokṣam avalokya vismitamanā vyacintayat-aho buddhir asya hiraṇyakasya śaktiś ca durga-sāmagrī ca /
GK22vispancu:3137: ahaṃ ca na kasyacid viśvasimi cala-prakṛtiś ca /
GK22vispancu:3138: tadāpy enaṃ mitraṃ karomi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3141: evaṃ sampradhārya pādapād avatīrya bila-dvāram āśritya citragrīvavac chabdena hiraṇyakaṃ samāhūtavān-ehy ehi bho hiraṇyaka, ehi /
GK22vispancu:3142: tac chabdaṃ śrutvā hiraṇyako vyacintayat-kim anyo 'pi kaścit kapoto bandhana-śeṣas tiṣṭhati yena māṃ vyāharati /
GK22vispancu:3145: tac chrutvā viśeṣād antarlīno hiraṇyaka āha-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:3147: vāyasa āha-ahaṃ tava pārśve guru-kāryeṇa samāgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:3148: tat kiṃ na kriyate mayā saha darśanam ?
GK22vispancu:3149: hiraṇyaka āha-na me'sti tvayā saha saṅgamena prayojanam iti /
GK22vispancu:3150: sa āha-bhoḥ / citragrīvasya mayā tava sakāśāt pāśa-mokṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GK22vispancu:3152: tat kadācin mamāpi bandhane jāte tava pārśvān muktair bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:3156: tat kā tvayā saha mama maitrī ?
GK22vispancu:3159: yayor eva samaṃ vittaṃ yayor eva samaṃ kulam /
GK22vispancu:3160: tayor maitrī vivāhaś ca na tu puṣṭa-vipuṣṭayoḥ //Panc_2.29//
GK22vispancu:3162: yo mitraṃ kurute mūḍha ātmano 'sadṛśaṃ kudhīḥ /
GK22vispancu:3163: hīnaṃ vāpy adhikaṃ vāpi hāsyatāṃ yāty asau janaḥ //Panc_2.30//
GK22vispancu:3167: yadi tvaṃ maitrī na karoṣi tato 'haṃ prāṇa-mokṣaṇaṃ tavāgre kariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:3170: tvayā vairiṇā saha kathaṃ maitrīṃ karomi ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3171: vairiṇā na hi sandadhyāt suśliṣṭenāpi sandhinā /
GK22vispancu:3172: sutaptam api pānīyaṃ śamayaty eva pāvakam //Panc_2.31//
GK22vispancu:3179: tat sahaja-vairī tvam asmākam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3180: kṛtrimaṃ nāśam abhyeti vairaṃ drāk kṛtrimair guṇaiḥ /
GK22vispancu:3181: prāṇa-dānaṃ vinā vairaṃ sahajaṃ yāti na kṣayam //Panc_2.32//
GK22vispancu:3188: svābhāvikaṃ punaḥ katham api na gacchati /
GK22vispancu:3207: kāraṇān mitratām eti kāraṇād yāti śatrutām /
GK22vispancu:3208: tasmān mitratvam evātra yojyaṃ vairaṃ na dhīmatā //Panc_2.33//
GK22vispancu:3209: tasmāt kuru mayā saha samāgamaṃ mitra-dharmārtham /
GK22vispancu:3212: sakṛd duṣṭam apīṣṭaṃ yaḥ punaḥ sandhātum icchati /
GK22vispancu:3213: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā //Panc_2.34//
GK22vispancu:3216: etad api na sambhāvyam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3217: siṃho vyākaraṇasya kartur aharat prāṇān piryān pāṇiner
GK22vispancu:3218: mīmāṃsā-kṛtam unmamātha sahasā hastī muniṃ jaiminim /
GK22vispancu:3224: bhayāl lobhāc ca mūrkhāṇāṃ maitrī syād darśanāt satām //Panc_2.36//
GK22vispancu:3225: mṛd-ghaṭa iva sukha-bhedyo duḥsandhānaś ca durjano bhavati /
GK22vispancu:3226: sujanas tu kanaka-ghaṭa iva durbhedaḥ sukara-sandhiś ca //Panc_2.37//
GK22vispancu:3227: ikṣor agrāt kramaśaḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi yathā rasa-viśeṣaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3230: ārambha-gurvī kṣayiṇī krameṇa laghvī purā vṛddhimatī ca paścāt /
GK22vispancu:3234: sa āha-na me'sti te śapathaiḥ pratyayaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3235: śapathaiḥ sandhitasyāpi na viśvāsaṃ vrajed ripoḥ /
GK22vispancu:3236: śrūyate śapathaṃ kṛtvā vṛtraḥ śakreṇa sūditaḥ //Panc_2.40//
GK22vispancu:3237: na viśvāsaṃ vinā śatrur devānām api sidhyati /
GK22vispancu:3240: bṛhaspater api prājñas tasmān naivātra viśvaset /
GK22vispancu:3241: ya icched ātmano buddhim āyuṣyaṃ ca sukhāni ca //Panc_2.42//
GK22vispancu:3244: nāśayec ca śanaiḥ paścāt plavaṃ salila-pūravat //Panc_2.43//
GK22vispancu:3245: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste'pi na viśvaset /
GK22vispancu:3246: viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati //Panc_2.44//
GK22vispancu:3247: na badhyate hy aviśvasto durbalo 'pi balotkaṭaiḥ /
GK22vispancu:3258: satāṃ sāptapadaṃ maitram ity āhur vibudhā janāḥ /

GK22vispancu:3656: tatraiva ca kaścid rāja-putro 'tīva-rūpa-sampanno manoramaś ca katham api tasyā dṛṣṭi-gocare gataḥ /

GK22vispancu:3830: tatraika āha-bhoḥ kartaḥ tvaṃ kiṃ samyaṅ na vetsi yad asya somilakasya bhojanācchādanād ṛte'dhikā samṛddhir nāsti /
GK22vispancu:3832: sa āha-bhoḥ karman mayāvaśyaṃ dātavyaṃ vyavasāyināṃ tatra ca tasya pariṇatis tvad āyatteti /

GK22vispancu:3839: tatra ca varṣa-mātreṇāpi suvarṇa-śata-pañcakam upārjya bhūyo 'pi sva-sthānaṃ prati prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3840: yāvad ardha-pathe bhūyo 'ṭavī-gatasya bhagavān bhānur astaṃjagāmātha suvarṇa-nāśa-bhayāt suśrānto 'pi na viśrāmyati kevalaṃ kṛta-gṛhotkaṇṭhaḥ satvaraṃ vrajati /
GK22vispancu:3841: atrāntare dvau puruṣau tādṛṣau dṛṣṭi-deśe samāgacchantau jalpantau ca śṛṇoti /
GK22vispancu:3844: tat kiṃ na vetsi yad bhojanācchādanābhyadhikam asya kiṃcin nāsti /
GK22vispancu:3849: tac chrutvā somilako yāvad granthim avalokayati tāvat suvarṇaṃ nāsti /
GK22vispancu:3850: tataḥ paraṃ duḥkham āpanno vyacintayat-aho kiṃ mama dhana-rahitasya jīvitena ?
GK22vispancu:3851: tad atra vaṭa-vṛkṣa ātmānam udbadhya prāṇāṃs tyajāmi /
GK22vispancu:3852: evaṃ niścitya darbha-mayīṃ rajjuṃ vidhāya sva-kaṇṭhe pāśaṃ niyojya śākhāyām ātmānaṃ nibadhya yāvat prakṣipati tāvad ekaḥ pumān ākāśa-stha evedam āha-bho bhoḥ somilaka /
GK22vispancu:3854: ahaṃ te vittāpahārako na te bhojanācchādanābhyadhikaṃ varāṭikām api sahāmi /
GK22vispancu:3857: tathā me na syād vyarthaṃ darśanam /
GK22vispancu:3859: somilaka āha-yady evaṃ tad dehi me prabhūtaṃ dhanam /
GK22vispancu:3860: sa āha-bhoḥ / kiṃ kariṣyasi bhoga-rahitena dhanena yatas tava bhojanācchādanābhyadhikā prāptir api nāsti ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:3861: kiṃ tayā kriyate lakṣmyā yā vadhūr iva kevalā /
GK22vispancu:3862: yā na veśyeva sāmānyā pathikair upabhujyate //Panc_2.139//
GK22vispancu:3863: somilaka āha-yady api bhogo nāsti tathāpi bhavatu me dhanam / uktaṃ ca-

GK22vispancu:3867: śithilau ca subaddhau ca patataḥ patato na vā /
GK22vispancu:3868: nirīkṣitau mayā bhadre daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca //Panc_2.141//
GK22vispancu:3873: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne tīkṣṇaviṣāṇo nāma mahā-vṛṣabho vasati /

GK22vispancu:3875: atha tatraiva vane pralobhako nāma śṛgālaḥ prativasati sma /

GK22vispancu:3877: atrāntare sa tīkṣṇaviṣāṇo jalārthaṃ tad eva pulinam avatīrṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3878: tataś ca tasya lambamānau vṛṣaṇāv ālokya śṛgālyā śṛgālo 'bhihitaḥ-svāmin /
GK22vispancu:3879: paśyāsya vṛṣabhasya māṃsa-piṇḍau lambamānau yathā sthitau /

GK22vispancu:3912: tāvat syāt sarva-kṛtyeṣu puruṣo 'tra svayaṃ prabhuḥ /

GK22vispancu:3919: tayos tat-paścād api pāto na bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:3922: puruṣa āha-yady evaṃ tad gaccha bhūyo 'pi vardhamāna-puram /
GK22vispancu:3926: tatas tayoḥ svarūpaṃ buddhvaikasya varaḥ prārthanīyaḥ /

GK22vispancu:3932: athāsau bhāryā-putra-sametena guptadhanena nirbhartsyamāno haṭhād gṛhaṃ praviśyopaviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:3933: tataś ca bhojana-velāyāṃ tasyāpi bhakti-varjitaṃ kiṃcid aśanaṃ dattam /

GK22vispancu:3970: upārjitānām arthānāṃ tyāga eva hi rakṣaṇam /

GK22vispancu:4049: atha mantharako vāyasam āha-bho laghupatanakāhaṃ hiraṇyakaś ca tāvad dvāv apy aśaktau tasyānveṣaṇaṃ kartuṃ mandagatitvāt /
