GK22vispancu:4123: tāvad askhalitaṃ yāvat sukhaṃ yāti same pathi /
GK22vispancu:4124: skhalite ca samutpanne viṣame ca pade pade //Panc_2.184//
GK22vispancu:4125: yan namraṃ saralaṃ cāpi yac cāpatsu na sīdati /
GK22vispancu:4126: dhanur mitraṃ kalatraṃ ca durlabhaṃ śuddha-vaṃśajam //Panc_2.185//
GK22vispancu:4127: na mātari na dāreṣu na sodarye na cātmaje /
GK22vispancu:4128: viśrambhas tādṛśaḥ puṃsāṃ yādṛṅ mitre nirantare //Panc_2.186//
GK22vispancu:4129: yadi tāvat kṛtāntena me dhana-nāśo vihitas tan-mārga-śrāntasya me viśrāma-bhūtaṃ mitraṃ kasmād apahṛtaṃ /
GK22vispancu:4130: aparam api mitraṃ paraṃ mantharaka-samaṃ na syāt / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4131: asampattau paro lābho guhyasya kathanaṃ tathā /
GK22vispancu:4133: tad asya paścān nānyaḥ suhṛn me /
GK22vispancu:4134: tat kiṃ mamopary anavarataṃ vyasana-śarair varṣati hanta vidhiḥ /
GK22vispancu:4135: yata ādau tāvad vitta-nāśas tataḥ parivāra-bhraṃśas tato deśa-tyāgas tato mitra-viyoga iti /
GK22vispancu:4136: athavā svarūpam etat sarveṣām eva jantūnāṃ jīvita-dharmasya / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4146: kena ratnam idaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mitram ity akṣara-dvayaṃ //Panc_2.190//
GK22vispancu:4149: tad yāvad eṣa mantharako dṛṣṭi-gocarān na nīyate tāvad asya mokṣopāyaś cintyatām iti / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4150: vyasanaṃ prāpya yo mohāt kevalaṃ paridevayet /
GK22vispancu:4159: tac chrutvā vāyasa āha-bho yady evaṃ tat kriyatāṃ mad-vacaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4160: eṣa citrāṅgo 'sya mārge gatvā kiṃcit palvalam āsādya tasya tīre niścetano bhūtvā patatu /
GK22vispancu:4161: aham apy asya śirasi samāruhya mandaiś cañcu-prahāraiḥ śira ullekhiṣyāmi yenāsau
GK22vispancu:4162: lubdhako 'muṃ mṛtaṃ matvā mama cañcu-prahāra-pratyayena mantharakaṃ bhūmau kṣiptvā mṛgārthe dhāvati /
GK22vispancu:4163: atrāntare tvayā darbha-maya-bandhana-veṣṭanāni khaṇḍanīyāni yenāsau mantharako drutataraṃ palvalaṃ praviśati /
GK22vispancu:4164: citrāṅgaḥ prāha-bho bhadro 'yaṃ dṛṣṭo mantras tvayā /
GK22vispancu:4165: nūnaṃ mantharako mukto mantavyaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4166: siddhiṃ vā yadi vāsiddhiṃ cittotsāho nivedayet /
GK22vispancu:4167: prathamaṃ sarva-jantūnāṃ prājño vetti na cetaraḥ //Panc_2.194//
GK22vispancu:4169: tathānuṣṭhite sa lubdhakas tathaiva mārgāsanna-palvala-tīrasthaṃ citrāṅgaṃ vāyasa-sanātham adrākṣīt /
GK22vispancu:4171: nūnaṃ pāśa-vedanayā varāko 'yaṃ mṛgo gatvāyuḥ-śeṣa-jīvitaḥ pāśaṃ troṭayitvā katham apy etad vanāntaraṃ praviṣṭo yāvan mṛtaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4173: tad enam api tāvad gṛhṇāmīty avardhāya kacchapaṃ bhū-tale prakṣipya mṛgam upādravat /
GK22vispancu:4174: atrāntare hiraṇyakena vajropama-daṃṣṭrā-prahāreṇa tad darbha-veṣṭanaṃ tat-kṣaṇāt khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtaṃ /
GK22vispancu:4176: citrāṅgo 'py aprāptasyāpi tasyotthāya vāyasena saha drutaṃ pranaṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4177: atrāntare vilakṣo viṣāda-paro nivṛtto lubdhako yāvat paśyati tāvat kacchapo 'pi gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:4179: prāpto bandhanam apy ayaṃ guru-mṛgas tāvat tvayā me hṛtaḥ
GK22vispancu:4180: samprāptaḥ kamaṭhaḥ sa cāpi niyataṃ naṣṭas tavādeśataḥ /
GK22vispancu:4181: kṣut-kṣāmo 'tra vane bhramāmi śiśukais tyaktaḥ samaṃ bhāryayā
GK22vispancu:4182: yac cānyan na kṛtaṃ kṛtānta kurute tac cāpi sahyaṃ mayā //Panc_2.195//
GK22vispancu:4184: atha tasmin dūrī-bhūte sarve'pi te kāka-kūrma-mṛgākhavaḥ paramānanda-bhājo militvā
GK22vispancu:4185: parasparam āliṅgya punar jātān ivātmano manyamānas tad eva saraḥ prāpya mahā-sukhena
GK22vispancu:4188: tathā mitreṇa sahāvyājena vartitavyam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4189: yo mitrāṇi karoty atra na kauṭilyena vartate /
GK22vispancu:4190: taiḥ samaṃ na parābhūtiṃ samprāpnoti kathañcana //Panc_2.196//
GK22vispancu:4197: athedam ārabhyate kākolūkīyaṃ nāma tṛtīyaṃ tantram /
GK22vispancu:4203: tad yathānuśruyate-asti dakṣiṇātye janapade mahilāropyaṃ nāma nagaram /
GK22vispancu:4205: tatra ca megha-varṇo nāma vāyasa-rājo 'neka-kāka-parivāraḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:4206: sa tatra vihita-durga-racanaḥ saparijanaḥ kālaṃ nayati /
GK22vispancu:4208: sa ca rātrāv abhyetya sadaiva tasya nyagrodhasya samantāt paribhramati /
GK22vispancu:4211: evaṃ nityābhigamanāc chanaiḥ śanais tan nyagrodha-pādapad-durgaṃ tena samantān nirvāyasaṃ kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:4213: ya upekṣeta śatruṃ svaṃ prasarantaṃ yadṛcchayā /
GK22vispancu:4214: rogaṃ cālasya-saṃyuktaḥ sa śanais tena hanyate //Panc_3.2//
GK22vispancu:4216: jāta-mātraṃ na yaḥ śatruṃ vyādhiṃ ca praśamaṃ nayet /
GK22vispancu:4217: mahābalo 'pi tenaiva vṛddhiṃ prāpya sa hanyate //Panc_3.3//
GK22vispancu:4218: athānyedyuḥ sa vāyasa-rājaḥ sarvān sacivān āhūya provāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:4219: utkaṭas tāvad asmākaṃ śatrur udyama-sampannaś ca kālavic ca nityam eva niśāgame sametyāsmat-pakṣa-kadanaṃ karoti /
GK22vispancu:4222: na ca divā durgaṃ vijānīmo yena gatvā praharāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4224: atha te procuḥ-yuktam abhihitaṃ devena yad eṣa praśnaḥ kṛtaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4226: pṛṣṭena tu viśeṣeṇa vācyaṃ pathyaṃ mahīpateḥ //Panc_3.4//
GK22vispancu:4227: yo na pṛṣṭo hitaṃ brūte pariṇāme sukhāvaham /
GK22vispancu:4228: mantro na priya-vaktā ca kevalaṃ sa ripuḥ smṛtam //Panc_3.5//
GK22vispancu:4229: tasmād ekāntam āsādya kāryo mantro mahīpate /
GK22vispancu:4230: yena tasya vayaṃ kurmo niyamaṃ kāraṇaṃ tathā //Panc_3.6//
GK22vispancu:4235: aneka-vijayī caiva sandheyaḥ sa ripur bhavet //Panc_3.8//
GK22vispancu:4237: prāṇaiḥ saṃrakṣitaiḥ sarvaṃ yato bhavati rakṣitam //Panc_3.9//
GK22vispancu:4240: sandhim icchet samenāpi sandigdho vijayī yudhi /
GK22vispancu:4241: na hi sāṃśayikaṃ kuryād ity uvāca bṛhaspatiḥ //Panc_3.11//
GK22vispancu:4242: sandigdho vijayo yuddhe janānām iha yuddhyatām /
GK22vispancu:4246: samaṃ śaktimatā yuddham aśaktasya hi mṛtyave /
GK22vispancu:4247: vṛṣatkumbhaṃ yathā bhittvā tāvat tiṣṭhati śaktimān //Panc_3.14//
GK22vispancu:4249: bhūmir mitraṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā vigrahasya phala-trayam /
GK22vispancu:4250: nāsty ekam api yady eṣāṃ vigrahaṃ na samācaret //Panc_3.15//
GK22vispancu:4252: prāpnoti nakha-bhaṅgaṃ hi phalaṃ vā mūṣako bhavet //Panc_3.16//
GK22vispancu:4253: tasmān na syāt phalaṃ yatra puṣṭaṃ yuddhaṃ tu kevalam /
GK22vispancu:4254: na hi tat svayam utpādyaṃ kartavyaṃ na kathañcana //Panc_3.17//
GK22vispancu:4256: vāñchann abhraṃśinīṃ lakṣmīṃ na bhaujaṅgī kadācana //Panc_3.18//
GK22vispancu:4257: kurvan hi vaitasīṃ vṛttiṃ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam /
GK22vispancu:4259: kaurmaṃ saṅkocam āsthāya prahārān api marṣayet /
GK22vispancu:4260: kāle kāle ca matimān uttiṣṭhet kṛṣṇa-sarpavat //Panc_3.20//
GK22vispancu:4261: āgataṃ vigrahaṃ vidvān upāyaiḥ praśamaṃ nayet /
GK22vispancu:4262: vijayasya hy anityatvād rabhasena na sampatet //Panc_3.21//
GK22vispancu:4263: balinā saha yoddhavyam iti nāsti nidarśanam /
GK22vispancu:4264: prativātaṃ na hi ghanaḥ kadācid upasarpati //Panc_3.22//
GK22vispancu:4265: śatruṇā na hi sandadhyāt suśliṣṭenāpi sandhinā /
GK22vispancu:4266: sutaptam api pānīyaṃ śamayaty eva pāvakam //Panc_3.23//
GK22vispancu:4270: tasmāt tena yoddhavyam iti me matiḥ /
GK22vispancu:4273: mūḍho yodhāvamantā ca sukhocchedyo bhaved ripuḥ //Panc_3.25//
GK22vispancu:4275: tad yadi sandhāna-kīrtanaṃ kariṣyāmas tad bhūyo 'tyantaṃ kopaṃ kariṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4284: māyayā śatravo vadhyā avadhyāḥ syur balena ye /
GK22vispancu:4285: yathā strī-rūpam āsthāya hato bhīmena kīcakaḥ //Panc_3.30//
GK22vispancu:4287: mṛtyor ivogra-daṇḍasya rājño yānti vaśaṃ dviṣaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4288: sarvaṃsahaṃ tu manyante tṛṇāya ripavaś ca tam //Panc_3.31//
GK22vispancu:4289: na jātu śamanaṃ yasya tejas tejasvi-tejasām /
GK22vispancu:4290: vṛthā jātena kiṃ tena mātur yauvana-hāriṇā //Panc_3.32//
GK22vispancu:4292: kāntāpi manasaḥ prītiṃ na sā dhatte manasvinām //Panc_3.33//
GK22vispancu:4294: na bhūmir yasya bhūpasya kā ślāghā tasya jīvite //Panc_3.34//
GK22vispancu:4296: na sandhi-vigrahau naiva vinā yānaṃ praśasyate //Panc_3.35//
GK22vispancu:4298: ekam anyaj jigīṣoś ca yātrālakṣaṇam ucyate //Panc_3.36//
GK22vispancu:4299: kārttike vātha caitre vā vijigīṣoḥ praśasyate /
GK22vispancu:4303: svasthānaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ kṛtvā śūraiś cātair mahābalaiḥ /
GK22vispancu:4306: para-rāṣṭraṃ na bhūyaḥ sa sva-rāṣṭram adhigacchati //Panc_3.40//
GK22vispancu:4307: tat te yuktaṃ kartum apasaraṇam / anyac ca-
GK22vispancu:4308: tan na yuktaṃ prabho kartuṃ dvitīyaṃ yānam eva ca /
GK22vispancu:4309: na vigraho na sandhānaṃ balinā tena pāpinā //Panc_3.41//
GK22vispancu:4310: aparaṃ kāraṇāpekṣayāpasaraṇaṃ kriyate budhaiḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4311: yad apasarati meṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ tat prahartuṃ
GK22vispancu:4316: balavantaṃ ripuṃ dṛṣṭvā deśa-tyāgaṃ karoti yaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4317: yudhiṣṭhira ivāpnoti punar jīvan sa medinīm //Panc_3.43//
GK22vispancu:4319: sa tasya vāñchitaṃ kuryād ātmanaś ca kula-kṣayam //Panc_3.44//
GK22vispancu:4320: tad balavatābhiyuktsyāpasaraṇa-samayo 'yaṃ na sandher vigrahasya ca /
GK22vispancu:4322: atha tasya vacanam ākarṇya prajīvanam āha-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:4325: mama sandhi-vigraha-yānāni trīṇy api na pratibhānti /
GK22vispancu:4327: nakraḥ sva-sthānam āsādya gajendram api karṣati /
GK22vispancu:4328: sa eva pracyutaḥ sthānāc chunāpi paribhūyate //Panc_3.45//
GK22vispancu:4333: sva-sthānaṃ hi tyajet tatra na tu bhūyo viśec ca saḥ //Panc_3.47//
GK22vispancu:4335: sthāna-hīnas tathā rājā gamyaḥ syāt sarva-jantuṣu //Panc_3.48//
GK22vispancu:4336: nija-sthāna-sthito 'py ekaḥ śataṃ yoddhuṃ sahen naraḥ /
GK22vispancu:4337: śaktānām api śatrūṇāṃ tasmāt sthānaṃ na santyajet //Panc_3.49//
GK22vispancu:4341: jīvan samprāptsyati rājyaṃ mṛto vā svargam eṣyati //
GK22vispancu:4346: mahān apy ekajo vṛkṣaḥ balavān supratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4347: prasahya iva vātena śakyo dharṣayituṃ yataḥ //Panc_3.53//
GK22vispancu:4348: atha ye saṃhatā vṛkṣā sarvataḥ supratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:4349: te na raudrānilenāpi hanyante hy eka-saṃśrayāt //Panc_3.54//
GK22vispancu:4350: evaṃ manuṣyam apy ekaṃ śauryeṇāpi samanvitam /
GK22vispancu:4351: śakyaṃ dviṣanto manyante hiṃsanti ca tataḥ param //Panc_3.55//
GK22vispancu:4360: nirvāte jvalito vahniḥ svayam eva praśāmyati //Panc_3.56//
GK22vispancu:4361: saṅgatiḥ śreyasī puṃsāṃ sva-pakṣe ca viśeṣataḥ /
GK22vispancu:4362: tuṣair api paribhraṣṭā na prarohanti taṇḍulāḥ //Panc_3.57//
GK22vispancu:4363: tad atraiva sthitena tvayā kaścit samarthaḥ samāśrayaṇīyaḥ,
GK22vispancu:4365: yadi punas tvaṃ sva-sthānaṃ tyaktvānyatra yāsyasi /
GK22vispancu:4366: tat ko 'pi te vāṅ-mātreṇāpi sahāyatvaṃ na kariṣyati /
GK22vispancu:4368: vanāni dahato vahneḥ sakhī bhavati mārutaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4369: sa eva dīpa-nāśāya kṛśe kasyāsti sauhṛdam //Panc_3.58//
GK22vispancu:4370: athavā naitad ekāntaṃ yad balinam ekaṃ samāśrayet /
GK22vispancu:4371: laghūnām api saṃśrayo rakṣāyai eva bhavati /
GK22vispancu:4373: saṅghātavān yathā veṇur niviḍair veṇubhir vṛtaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4374: na śakyeta samucchettuṃ durbalo 'pi yathā nṛpaḥ //Panc_3.59//
GK22vispancu:4375: yadi punar uttama-saṃśrayo bhavati tat kim ucyate ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4378: tad evaṃ saṃśrayaṃ vinā na kaścit pratīkāro bhavati iti me'bhiprāyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4380: athaivam abhihite sa meghavarṇo rājā cirantanaṃ pitṛ-sacivaṃ dīrghāyuṣaṃ sakala-nīti-śāstra-pāraṅgataṃ sthirajīvi-nāmānaṃ praṇamya provāca-tāta
GK22vispancu:4381: yad ete mayā pṛṣṭāḥ sacivās tāvad atra-sthitasyāpi tava tat-parīkṣārtham,
GK22vispancu:4382: yena tvaṃ sakalaṃ śrutvā yad ucitaṃ tan me samādiśasi /
GK22vispancu:4383: tad yady uktaṃ bhavati tas samādeśyam /
GK22vispancu:4385: sarvair apy etair nīti-śāstrāśrayam uktaṃ sacivaiḥ /
GK22vispancu:4387: param eṣa dvaidhībhāvasya kālaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4388: aviśvāsaṃ sadā tiṣṭhet sandhinā vigraheṇa ca /
GK22vispancu:4390: tac chatruṃ viśvāsyāviśvastair lobhaṃ darśayadbhiḥ sukhenocchidyate ripuḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4391: ucchedyam api vidvāṃso vardhayanty arim ekadā /
GK22vispancu:4392: guḍena vardhitaḥ śleṣmā yato niḥśeṣatāṃ vrajet //Panc_3.62//
GK22vispancu:4395: yo bhaved eka-bhāvo 'tra na sa jīvati mānavaḥ //Panc_3.63//
GK22vispancu:4396: kṛtyaṃ deva-dvijātīnām ātmanaś ca guros tathā /
GK22vispancu:4398: eko bhāvaḥ sadā śasto yatīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām /
GK22vispancu:4400: tad dvaidhībhāvaṃ saṃśritasya tava sva-sthāne vāso bhaviṣyati,
GK22vispancu:4401: lobhāśrayāc ca śatrum uccāṭayiṣyasi aparaṃ-yadi kiñcic chidraṃ tasya paśyasi,
GK22vispancu:4407: chidrāṇy api tasya prakaṭīkariṣyāmi praṇadhibhiḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4408: gāvo gandhena paśyanti vedaiḥ paśyanti vai dvijāḥ /
GK22vispancu:4409: cārai paśyanti rājānaś cakṣurbhyām itare janāḥ //Panc_3.66//
GK22vispancu:4411: yas tīrthāni nije pakṣe para-pakṣe viśeṣataḥ /
GK22vispancu:4412: guptaiś cārair nṛpo vetti na sa durgatim āpnuyāt //Panc_3.67//
GK22vispancu:4418: sa āha-atra viṣaye bhagavatā nāradena yudhiṣṭhiraḥ proktaḥ /
GK22vispancu:4422: tair jñātaiḥ sva-pakṣaḥ para-pakṣaś ca vaśyo bhavati /
GK22vispancu:4424: kaccid aṣṭadaśāny eṣu sva-pakṣe daśa pañca ca /
GK22vispancu:4425: tribhis tribhir avijñātair vetsi tīrthāni cārakaiḥ //Panc_3.68//
GK22vispancu:4427: tad yadi teṣāṃ kutsitaṃ bhavati tat svāmino 'bhighātāya,
GK22vispancu:4428: yadi pradhānaṃ bhavati tad-vṛddhaye syād iti /
GK22vispancu:4455: eṣāṃ vaira-dvāreṇa sva-pakṣe vighātaḥ / tathā ca-
GK22vispancu:4459: kṛtvā kṛtya-vidas tīrtheṣv antaḥ praṇidhayaḥ padam /
GK22vispancu:4462: atha kiṃ nimittam evaṃvidhaṃ prāṇāntikaṃ sadaiva vāyasolūkānāṃ vairam ?
GK22vispancu:4464: kadācid dhaṃsa-śuka-kokila-cātaka-ulūka-mayūra-kapāta-pārāvata-viṣkira-prabhṛtayaḥ sarve'pi pakṣiṇaḥ sametya sodvegaṃ mantrayitum ārabdhāḥ /
GK22vispancu:4466: sa ca vāsudeva-bhakto na kām api cintām asmākaṃ karoti /
GK22vispancu:4468: yo lubdhaka-pāśair nityaṃ nibadhyamānānāṃ na rakṣāṃ vidhatte / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:4469: yo na rakṣati vitrastān pīḍyamānān paraiḥ sadā /
GK22vispancu:4470: jantūn pārthiva-rūpeṇa sa kṛtānto na saṃśayaḥ //Panc_3.71//

GK22vispancu:5153: atha kadācit sā tena sahaikaśayane parāṅmukhī yāvat tiṣṭhati tāvad gṛhe cauraḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5154: sāpi taṃ cauraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaya-vyākulitā vṛddham api taṃ patiṃ gāḍhaṃ samāliliṅga /
GK22vispancu:5155: so 'pi vismayāt pulakāñcita-sarva-gātraś cintayāmāsa-aho kim eṣā mām adyāvagūhate ?
GK22vispancu:5156: yāvan nipuṇatayā paśyati tāvat gṛha-koṇaika-deśe cauraṃ dṛṣṭvā vyacintayat-nūnam eṣāsya bhayān mām āliṅgati iti jñātvā taṃ cauram āha-yā mamodvijate (186) ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:5157: tac chrutvā cauro 'py āha-hartavyaṃ te na paśyāmi (187) ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:5158: tasmāc caurasyāpy upakāraḥ śreyaś cintyate kiṃ punaḥ śaraṇāgatasya /
GK22vispancu:5159: api cāyaṃ tair viprakṛto 'smākam eva puṣṭaye bhaviṣyati tadīya-randhra-darśanāya ceti anena kāraṇenāyam avadhya iti /
GK22vispancu:5161: sāmpratam evaṃ sthite kiṃ karaṇīyam iti ?
GK22vispancu:5165: caureṇa jīvitaṃ dattaṃ rākṣasena tu go-yugam //Panc_3.190//
GK22vispancu:5170: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne daridro droṇa-nāmā brāhmaṇaḥ,
GK22vispancu:5174: tasya ca kenāpi yajamānenānukampayā śiśu-go-yugaṃ dattam /
GK22vispancu:5175: brāhmaṇena ca bāla-bhāvād ārabhya yācita-ghṛta-taila-yavasādibhiḥ saṃvardhya supuṣṭaṃ kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:5176: tac ca dṛṣṭvā sahasaiva kaścic cauraś cintitavān-aham asya brāhmaṇasya go-yugam idam apahariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5178: yāvat prasthitas tāvad ardha-mārge pravirala-tīkṣṇa-danta-paṅktir unnata-nāsā-vaṃśaḥ,
GK22vispancu:5181: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ tīvra-bhaya-trasto cauro 'bravīt-ko bhavān ? iti /
GK22vispancu:5182: so 'bravīt-ahaṃ krūra-karmā cauro daridra-brāhmaṇasya go-yugaṃ hartuṃ prasthito 'smi /
GK22vispancu:5185: atas tam eva brāhmaṇam adya bhakṣayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5186: atha tau tatra gatvaikānte kānlam anveṣayantau sthitau /
GK22vispancu:5187: prasupte ca brāhmaṇe tad-bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prasthitaṃ rākṣasaṃ dṛṣṭvā cauro 'bravīt-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:5188: naiṣanyāyo yato go-yuge mayāpahṛte paścāt tvam enaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhakṣaya /
GK22vispancu:5189: so 'bravīt-kadācid ayaṃ brāhmaṇo go-śabdena budhyeta tadānarthako 'yaṃ mamārambhaḥ syāt /
GK22vispancu:5190: cauro 'py abravīt-tavāpi yadi bhakṣaṇāyopasthitasya eko 'py antarāyaḥ syāt /
GK22vispancu:5191: tadāham api na śaknomi go-yugam apahartum /
GK22vispancu:5192: ataḥ prathamaṃ mayāpahṛte go-yuge paścāt tvayā brāhmaṇo bhakṣitavyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5193: itthaṃ cāham ahamikayā tayor vivadatoḥ samutpanne dvaidhe pratirava-vaśād brāhmaṇo jajāgāra /
GK22vispancu:5195: tvām evāyaṃ rākṣaso bhakṣayitum icchati iti /
GK22vispancu:5198: evaṃ śrutvotthāya brāhmaṇaḥ sāvadhāno bhūtveṣṭa-devatā-mantra-dhyānenātmānaṃ rākṣasād udgūrṇa-laguḍena caurād go-yugaṃ rarakṣa / ***********************************************************************
GK22vispancu:5200: atha tasya vacanam avadhāryārimardanaḥ punar api prākārakarṇam apṛcchat-kathaya,
GK22vispancu:5204: yato rakṣitenānena kadācit paraspara-prītyā kālaḥ sukhena gacchati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5205: parasparasya marmāṇi ye na rakṣanti jantavaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5211: asti kasmiṃścin nagare devaśaktir nāma rājā /
GK22vispancu:5212: tasya ca putro jaṭhara-valmīkāśrayeṇorageṇa pratidinaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ kṣīyate /
GK22vispancu:5213: anekopacāraiḥ sad-vaidyaiḥ sac-chāstropadiṣṭauṣadha-yuktyāpi cikitsyamāno na svāsthyam eti /
GK22vispancu:5215: kasmiṃścin nagare bhikṣāṭanaṃ kṛtvā mahati devālaye kālaṃ yāpayati /
GK22vispancu:5216: atha tatra nagare balir nāma rājāste /
GK22vispancu:5217: tasya ca dve duhitarau yauvana-sthe tiṣṭhataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5218: te ca pratidivasam ādityodaye pituḥ pādāntikam āgatya namaskāraṃ cakratuḥ /
GK22vispancu:5224: enāṃ duṣṭa-bhāṣiṇīṃ kumārikāṃ kasyacid vaideśikasya prayacchata tena nija-vihitam iyam eva bhuṅkte /
GK22vispancu:5225: atha tatheti pratipadyālpa-parivārā sā kumārikā mantribhis tasya deva-kulāśrita-rāja-putrasya pratipāditā /
GK22vispancu:5226: sāpi prahṛṣṭa-manasā taṃ patiṃ devavat pratipadyādāya cānya-viṣayaṃ gatā /
GK22vispancu:5227: tataḥ kasmiṃścid dūratara-nagara-pradeśe taḍāga-taṭe rāja-putram āvāsa-rakṣāyai nirūpya svayaṃ ca ghṛta-taila-lavaṇa-taṇḍulādi-kraya-nimittaṃ sa-parivārā gatā /
GK22vispancu:5228: kṛtvā ca kraya-vikrayaṃ yāvad āgacchati tāvat sa rāja-putro valmīkopari kṛta-mūrdhā prasuptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5229: tasya ca mukhād bhujagaḥ phaṇāṃ niṣkāsya vāyum aśnāti /
GK22vispancu:5230: tatraiva ca valmīke'paraḥ sarpo niṣkramya tathaivāsīt /
GK22vispancu:5231: atha tayoḥ paraspara-darśanena krodha-saṃrakta-locanayor madhyād valmīkasthena sarpeṇoktam-bho bho durātman /
GK22vispancu:5234: tvayāpi durātmanāsya valmīkasya madhye katham idaṃ dūṣitaṃ hāṭaka-pūrṇaṃ kalaśa-yugalam ity evaṃ parasparasya marmāṇy udghāṭitavantau /
GK22vispancu:5236: bheṣajam idaṃ te kiṃ ko 'pi na jānāti yaj jīrṇotkālita-kāñjikā-rājikā-pānena bhavān vināśam upayāti /
GK22vispancu:5237: athodarastho 'hir abravīt-tavāpy etad bheṣajaṃ kiṃ kaścid api na vetti yad uṣṇa-tailena mahoṣṇodakena vā tava vināśaḥ syād iti /
GK22vispancu:5238: evaṃ ca sā rāja-kanyā viṭapāntaritā tayoḥ parasparālāpān marma-mayān ākarṇya tathaivānuṣṭhitavatī /
GK22vispancu:5239: vidhāya vyaṅgaṃ nīrogaṃ bhartāraṃ nidhiṃ ca paramam āsādya svadeśābhimukhaṃ prāyāt /
GK22vispancu:5242: tac ca śrutvā svayam arirdano 'py evaṃ samarthitavān /
GK22vispancu:5245: vināśito 'yaṃ bhavadbhir anyāyena svāmī / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5246: apūjyā yatra pūjyante pūjyānāṃ tu vimānanā /
GK22vispancu:5247: trīṇi tatra pravartante durbhikṣaṃ maraṇaṃ bhayam //Panc_3.192//
GK22vispancu:5249: pratyakṣe'pi kṛte pāpe mūrkhaḥ sāmnā praśāmyati /
GK22vispancu:5255: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne vīravaro nāma rathakāraḥ /
GK22vispancu:5258: so 'pi tasyāḥ parīkṣaṇārthaṃ vyacintayat-atha mayāsyāḥ parīkṣaṇaṃ kartavyam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5259: yadi syāt pāvakaḥ śītaḥ proṣṇī vā śaśa-lāñchanaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5260: strīṇāṃ tadā satītvaṃ syād yadi syād durjano hitaḥ //Panc_3.194//
GK22vispancu:5261: jānāmi caināṃ loka-vacanād asatīm / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5262: yac ca vedeṣu śāstreṣu na dṛṣṭaṃ na ca saṃśrutam /
GK22vispancu:5263: tat sarvaṃ vetti loko 'yaṃ yat syād brahmāṇḍa-madhyagam //Panc_3.195//
GK22vispancu:5267: tat tvayā kim api pātheyaṃ mama yogyaṃ vidheyam /
GK22vispancu:5269: autsukyāt sarva-kāryāṇi santyajya siddham annaṃ ghṛta-śarkarā-prāyam akarot /
GK22vispancu:5273: athāsau pratyūṣe utthāya sva-gṛhān nirgataḥ sāpi taṃ prasthitaṃ vijñāya prahasita-vadanāṅga-saṃskāraṃ kurvāṇā kathañcit taṃ divasam atyavāhayat
GK22vispancu:5274: atha pūrva-paricita-viṭa-gṛhe gatvā taṃ pratyuktavatī-sa durātmā me patir grāmāntaraṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5276: tathānuṣṭhite sa rathakāro 'raṇye dinam ativāhya pradoṣe sva-gṛhe'padvāreṇa praviśya śayyādhas-tale nibhṛto bhūtvā sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5277: etasminn antare sa devadattaḥ samāgatya tatra śayane upaviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5278: dṛṣṭvā roṣāviṣṭa-citto rathakāro vyacintayat-kim enam utthāya hanmi ?
GK22vispancu:5279: athavā helayaiva prasuptau dvāv apy etau vyāpādayāmi ?
GK22vispancu:5282: atrāntare sā gṛha-dvāraṃ nibhṛtaṃ pidhāya śayana-talam ārūḍhā /
GK22vispancu:5284: tataḥ sā vyacintayat-nūnam etena durātmanā rathakāreṇa mat-parīkṣaṇārthaṃ bhāvyam /
GK22vispancu:5286: evaṃ tasyāś cintayanyā sa devadattaḥ sparśotsuko babhūva /
GK22vispancu:5288: na me śarīraṃ tvayā sparśanīyaṃ yato 'haṃ pativratā mahāsatī ca /
GK22vispancu:5289: no cec chāpaṃ dattvā tvāṃ bahsmasātkariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5290: sa āha-yady evaṃ tarhi tvayā kim aham āhūtaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5292: aham adya pratyūṣe devatā-darśanārthaṃ caṇḍkāyatanaṃ gatā tatrākasmāt khe vāṇī sañjātā-putri kiṃ karomi ?
GK22vispancu:5298: tad asti kaścid upāyo yena me patiḥ śata-saṃvatsara-jīvī bhavati ?
GK22vispancu:5303: yadi tan mama prāṇair bhavati tad ādeśaya yena karomi /
GK22vispancu:5304: atha devyābhihitam-yady adya para-puruṣeṇa sahaikasmin śayane samāruhyāliṅganaṃ karoṣi tat tava bhartṛ-sakto 'pamṛtyus tasya sañcarati /
GK22vispancu:5307: tad yat kiñcit kartu-manās tat kuruṣva /
GK22vispancu:5308: na hi devatā-vacanam anyathā bhaviṣyatīti niścayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5310: so 'pi rathakāro mūrkhas tasyās tad-vacanam ākarṇya pulakāñcita-tanuḥ śayyādhastalān niṣkramya tām uvāca-sādhu pativrate /
GK22vispancu:5312: ahaṃ durjana-vacana-śaṅkita-hṛdayas tvat-parīkṣā-nimittaṃ grāmāntara-vyājaṃ kṛtvā khaṭvādhas-tale nibhṛtaṃ līnaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5316: yad āyur buddhi-kṛte'pamṛtyu-vināśārthaṃ catvam evaṃ kṛtavatī /
GK22vispancu:5318: sva-skandhe tām āropya tām api devadattam uvāca-bho mahānubhāva /
GK22vispancu:5321: tat tvam api mām āliṅgya mat-skandhe samāroha iti jalpann anicchantam api devadattam āliṅgya balāt svakīya-skandhe āropitavān /
GK22vispancu:5322: tataś ca nṛtyaṃ kṛtvā-he brahma-vrata-dharāṇāṃ dhurīṇa /
GK22vispancu:5323: tvayāpi mayy upakṛtam ity ādy uktvā skandhād uttārya yatra yatra svajana-gṛha-dvārādiṣu babhrāma tatra tatra tayor ubhayor api tad-guṇa-varṇanam akarot /
GK22vispancu:5325: tat sarvathā mūlotkhātā vayaṃ vinaṣṭāḥ smaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5331: aprājñān mantriṇaḥ prāpya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā //Panc_3.198//
GK22vispancu:5332: tatas tad-vaco 'nādṛtya sarve te sthirajīvinam utkṣipya sva-durgam ānetum ārabdhāḥ /
GK22vispancu:5335: yat kāraṇam icchāmi dīptaṃ vahnim anupraveṣṭum /
GK22vispancu:5338: so 'bravīt-ahaṃ tāvad yuṣmad-artham imām āpadaṃ meghavarṇena prāpitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5339: tad icchāmi teṣāṃ vaira-yātanārtham ulūkatvam iti /
GK22vispancu:5340: tac ca śrutvā rājanīti-kuśalo raktākṣaḥ prāha-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:5342: tāvad ulūka-yoni-gato 'pi svakīyām eva vāyasa-yoniṃ bahu manyase /
GK22vispancu:5344: sūryaṃ bhartāram utsṛjya parjanyaṃ mārutaṃ girim /
GK22vispancu:5350: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne śālaṅkāyano nāma tapodhano jāhnavyāṃ snānārthaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5351: tasya ca sūryopasthānaṃ kurvatas tatra pradeśe mūṣikā kācit kharatara-nakhāgra-puṭena śyenena gṛhītā /
GK22vispancu:5352: dṛṣṭvā sa muniḥ karuṇārdra-hṛdayo muñca muñceti kurvāṇas tasyopari pāṣāṇa-khaṇḍaṃ prākṣipat /
GK22vispancu:5353: so 'pi pāṣāṇa-khaṇḍa-prahāra-vyākulendriyo bhraṣṭa-mūṣiko bhūmau nipapāta mūṣikāpi bhaya-trastā kartavyam ajānantī rakṣa rakṣeti jalpantī muni-caraṇāntikam upāviśat /
GK22vispancu:5356: na yuktam anuṣṭhitaṃ bhavatā yad ahaṃ pāṣāṇena tāḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5360: iti bruvāṇaṃ śyenaṃ provāca saḥ-bho vihaṅgādhama /
GK22vispancu:5369: iha hi sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ vidhinā sṛṣṭiṃ kurvatāhāro 'pi vinirmitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5370: tato yathā bhavatām annaṃ tathāsmākaṃ mūṣikādayo vihitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:5371: tat svāhāra-kāṅkṣiṇaṃ māṃ kiṃ dūṣayasi ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5372: yady asya vihitaṃ bhojyaṃ na tat tasya praduṣyati /
GK22vispancu:5373: abhakṣye bahu-doṣaḥ syāt tasmāt kāryo na vyatyayaḥ //Panc_3.200//
GK22vispancu:5374: bhakṣyaṃ yathā dvijātīnāṃ madyapānāṃ yathā haviḥ /
GK22vispancu:5375: abhakṣyaṃ bhakṣyatām eti tathānyeṣām api dvija //Panc_3.201//
GK22vispancu:5376: bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣyatāṃ śreya abhakṣyaṃ tu mahad agham /
GK22vispancu:5377: tat kathaṃ māṃ vṛthācāra tvaṃ daṇḍayitum arhasi //Panc_3.202//
GK22vispancu:5378: aparaṃ munīnāṃ na caiṣa dharmo yatas tair dṛṣṭaṃ śrutam aśrutam alaulyatvam aśatrutvaṃ praśasyate / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5379: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca sama-loṣṭāśma-kāñcanaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5381: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu sama-buddhir viśiṣyate //Panc_3.203//
GK22vispancu:5383: yogī yuñjīta satataṃ satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ //Panc_3.204/
GK22vispancu:5384: tat tvam anena karmaṇā bhraṣṭa-tapāḥ sañjātaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5385: muñca muñca pataty eko mā muñceti dvitīyakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5390: kasmiṃścid nadī-taṭa ekata-dvita-tritābhidhānās trayo 'pi bhrātaro munayas tapaḥ kurvanti /
GK22vispancu:5391: teṣāṃ ca tapaḥ-prabhāvād ākāśasthā dhauta-potikā nirālambā jalārdrā bhū-sparśana-bhayena snāna-samaye tiṣṭhanti /
GK22vispancu:5392: athānye-dyur mamaiva kācin maṇḍūkikā kenāpi gṛdhreṇa balena nītā /
GK22vispancu:5393: atha tāṃ gṛhītā vilokya teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhena karuṇārdra-hṛdayena bhavateva vyāhṛtaṃ-muñca muñceti /
GK22vispancu:5395: tāṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dvitīyena tad-bhayārtena mā muñcety abhihitaṃ yāvat tasyāpi papāta /
GK22vispancu:5396: tatas tṛtīyo dvayor api dhauta-potikāṃ bhūmau patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva / ***********************************************************************
GK22vispancu:5397: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-muñca muñca pataty eka ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:5398: tac chrutvā munir vihasyāha-bho mūrkha vihaṅgama /
GK22vispancu:5400: yataḥ kṛta-yuge pāpālāpato 'pi pāpaṃ jāyate tena dhauta-potike patite aśiṣṭālāpena na sad-apavacana-doṣataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5403: tat karma kṛtaṃ vinā pāpaṃ na lagati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5405: kalau tu pāpa-saṃyukte yaḥ karoti sa lipyate //Panc_3.206//
GK22vispancu:5407: āsanāc chayanād yānāt saṃgateś cāpi bhojanāt /
GK22vispancu:5412: atha gate śyene mūṣikayā sa munir abhihitaḥ-bhagavan /
GK22vispancu:5414: no ced anyo duṣṭa-pakṣī māṃ vyāpādayiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:5415: tad ahaṃ tatraivāśrame tvad-dattānnāhāra-muṣṭyā kālaṃ neṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5416: so 'pi dākṣiṇyavān sa-karuṇo vyacintayat-kathaṃ mayā mūṣikā haste dhṛtvā neyā jana-hāsya-kāriṇī /
GK22vispancu:5419: tathānuṣṭhite kanyā-sahitaṃ munim avalokya patnī papraccha-bhagavan /
GK22vispancu:5421: sa āha-eṣā mūṣikā śyena-bhayāc charaṇārthinī kanyā-rūpeṇa tava gṛham ānītā /
GK22vispancu:5427: janitā copanetā ca yas tu vidyāṃ prayacchati /
GK22vispancu:5432: tathānuṣṭhite sā kanyā śukla-pakṣa-candra-kalikeva nityaṃ vṛddhiṃ prāpnoti /
GK22vispancu:5433: sāpi tasya muneḥ śuśrūṣāṃ kurvatī sapatnīkasya yauvanam āśv ayāt /
GK22vispancu:5434: atha tāṃ yauvanonmukhīm avalokya śālaṅkāyanaḥ sva-patnīm uvāca-priye /
GK22vispancu:5436: anarhā sa sāmprataṃ mad-gṛha-vāsasya / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5437: anūḍhā mandire yasya rajaḥ prāpnoti kanyakā /
GK22vispancu:5438: patanti pitaras tasya svarga-sthā api tair guṇaiḥ //Panc_3.209//
GK22vispancu:5439: varaṃ varayate kanyā mātā vittaṃ pitā śrutam /
GK22vispancu:5440: bāndhavāḥ kulam icchanti miṣṭānnam itare janāḥ //Panc_3.210//
GK22vispancu:5442: yāvan na lajjate kanyā yāvat krīḍati pāṃsunā /
GK22vispancu:5443: yāvat tiṣṭhati go-mārge tāvat kanyāṃ vivāhayet //Panc_3.211//
GK22vispancu:5444: mātā caiva pitā caiva jyeṣṭha-bhrātā tathaiva ca /
GK22vispancu:5445: trayas te narakaṃ yānti dṛṣṭvā kanyāṃ rajasvalām //Panc_3.212//
GK22vispancu:5446: kulaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca sanāthatāṃ ca
GK22vispancu:5447: vidyāṃ ca vittaṃ ca vapur vayaś ca /
GK22vispancu:5448: etān guṇān saptān sapta parīkṣya deyā
GK22vispancu:5450: tad yad yasyā rocate tad bhagavantaṃ ādityam ākārya tasmai prayacchāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5451: aniṣṭaḥ kanyakāyā yo varo rūpānvito 'pi yaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5452: yadi syāt tasya no deyā kanyā śreyo 'bhivāñchatā //Panc_3.214//
GK22vispancu:5459: yady eṣā tvāṃ vṛṇoti tarhy udvahasva tām iti /
GK22vispancu:5462: kiṃ tava rocata eṣa bhagavāṃs trailokya-dīpaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5466: asmād api ya utkṛṣṭataraḥ sa āhūyatām /
GK22vispancu:5467: atha tasyās tad-vacanam ākarṇya bhāsvaro 'pi tāṃ mūṣikāṃ viditvā niḥspṛhas tam uvāca-bhagavan /
GK22vispancu:5468: asti mamāpy adhiko megho yenācchāditasya me nāmāi na jñāyate ?
GK22vispancu:5469: atha muninā megham apy āhūya kanyābhihitā-eṣa te rocate ?
GK22vispancu:5471: tad asmād anyasya kasyacit pradhānasya māṃ prayaccha /
GK22vispancu:5477: āha ca-putrike kim eṣa vāyus te vivāhāya uttamaḥ pratibhāti ?
GK22vispancu:5482: sa āha-matto 'py adhiko 'sti parvato yena saṃstabhya balavān apy ahaṃ dhriye /
GK22vispancu:5483: atha muniḥ parvatam āhūya kanyāyā adarśayat-putrike /
GK22vispancu:5492: tad ākarṇya munir mūṣakam āhūya tasyā adarśayat-putrike /
GK22vispancu:5493: eṣa te pratibhāti mūṣaka-rājo yena yathocitam anuṣṭhīyate /
GK22vispancu:5494: sāpi taṃ dṛṣṭvā sva-jātīya eṣa iti manyamānā pulakodbhūṣita-śarīrā provāca-tāta /
GK22vispancu:5495: māṃ mūṣikāṃ kṛtvāsmai prayaccha yena svajāti-vihitaṃ gṛha-dharmam anutiṣṭhāmi /
GK22vispancu:5496: tac chrutvā tena strī-dharma-vicakṣaṇena tāṃ mūṣikāṃ kṛtvā mūṣakāya pradattā / ***********************************************************************
GK22vispancu:5498: atha raktākṣa-vacanam anādṛtya taiḥ sva-vaṃśa-vināśāya sa sva-durgam upanītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5502: tad yadi tasya vacanam acariṣyann ete,
GK22vispancu:5504: atha durga-dvāraṃ prāpyārimardano 'bravīt-bho bho hitaiṣiṇo 'sya sthirajīvino yathā-samīhitaṃ sthānaṃ prayacchata /
GK22vispancu:5505: tac ca śrutvā sthirajīvī vyacintayat-mayā tāvad eteṣāṃ vadhopāyaś cintanīyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5507: yato madīyam iṅgitādikaṃ vicārayantas te'pi sāvadhānā bhaviṣyanti /
GK22vispancu:5511: param aham api nītijñas te'hitaś ca /
GK22vispancu:5512: yadyapy anuraktaḥ śucis tathāpi durga-madhye āvāso nārhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5513: tad ahaṃ atraiva durga-dvāra-sthaḥ pratyahaṃ bhavat-pāda-padma-rajaḥ pavitrī-kṛta-tanuḥ sevāṃ kariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5514: tatheti pratipanne pratidinam ulūka-pati-sevakās te prakāmam āhāraṃ kṛtvolūka-rājādeśāt prakṛṣṭa-māṃsāhāraṃ sthirajīvine prayacchanti /
GK22vispancu:5515: atha katipayair evāhobhir mayūra iva sa balavān saṃvṛttaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5516: atha raktākṣaḥ sthirajīvinaṃ poṣyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa-vismayo mantri-janaṃ rājānaṃ ca praty āha-aho mūrkho 'yaṃ mantri-jano bhavāṃś cety evam aham avagacchāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5517: pūrvaṃ tāvad ahaṃ mūrkho dvitīyaḥ paśu-bandhakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5518: tato rājā ca mantrī ca sarvaṃ vai mūrkha-maṇḍalam //Panc_3.216//
GK22vispancu:5524: tatra ca sindhuka-nāmā ko 'pi pakṣī prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:5526: atha kadācit tam uddiśya vyādhaḥ ko 'pi samāyayau /
GK22vispancu:5527: sa ca pakṣī tad-agrata eva purīṣam utsasarja /
GK22vispancu:5528: atha pāta-sama-kālam eva tat-suvarṇībhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyādho vismayam agamat-aho mama śiśu-kālād ārabhya śakuni-bandha-vyasanino 'śīti-varṣāṇi samabhūvan,
GK22vispancu:5529: na ca kadācit pakṣi-purīṣe suvarṇaṃ dṛṣṭam iti vicintya tatra vṛkṣe pāśaṃ babandha /
GK22vispancu:5530: athāsāv api pakṣī mūrkhas tatraiva viśvasta-citto yathā-pūrvam upaviṣṭas tat-kālam eva pāśena baddhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5531: vyādhas tu taṃ pāśād unmucya pañjarake saṃsthāpya nijāvāsaṃ nītavān /
GK22vispancu:5532: atha cintayāmāsa-kim anena sāpāyena pakṣiṇāhaṃ kariṣyāmi ?
GK22vispancu:5534: 'py amum īdṛśaṃ jñātvā rājñe nivedayiṣyati tan nūnaṃ prāṇa-saṃśayo me bhavet /
GK22vispancu:5535: ataḥ svayam eva pakṣiṇaṃ rājñe nivedayāmi /
GK22vispancu:5537: atha rājāpi taṃ pakṣiṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikasita-nayana-vadana-kamalaḥ parāṃ tuṣṭim upagataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5544: iti mantri-vacanād rājñā mocito 'sau pakṣy unnata-dvāra-toraṇe samupaviśya suvarṇa-mayīṃ
GK22vispancu:5545: viṣṭhāṃ vidhāya-pūrvaṃ tāvad ahaṃ mūrkhaḥ iti ślokaṃ paṭhitvā yathā-sukham ākāśa-mārgeṇa prāyāt / ***********************************************************************
GK22vispancu:5546: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-pūrvaṃ tāvad ahaṃ mūrkhaḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:5547: atha te punar api pratikūla-daivatayā hitam api raktākṣa-vacanam anādṛtya bhūyas taṃ prabhūta-māṃsādi-vividhāhāreṇa poṣayāmāsuḥ /
GK22vispancu:5548: atha raktākṣaḥ sva-vargam āhūya rahaḥ provāca-aho /
GK22vispancu:5550: tad upadiṣṭaṃ mayā yat kula-kramāgataḥ sacivo 'bhidhatte /
GK22vispancu:5551: tad vayam anyat parvata-durgaṃ samprati samāśrayāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5554: sa śocate yo na karoty anāgatam /
GK22vispancu:5556: bilasya vācā na kadāpi hi śrutā //Panc_3.217//
GK22vispancu:5561: kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe kharanakharo nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:5562: sa kadācid itaś cetaś ca paribhraman kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭho na kiñcid api sattvam āsasāda /
GK22vispancu:5563: tataś cāstam anasamaye mahatīṃ giri-guhām āsādya praviṣṭaś cintayāmāsa-nūnam etasyāṃ guhāyāṃ rātrau kenāpi sattvenāgantavyam /
GK22vispancu:5565: etasminn antare tat-svāmī dadhipuccho nāma śṛgālaḥ samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5566: sa ca yāvat paśyati tāvat siṃha-pada-paddhatir guhāyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
GK22vispancu:5572: evaṃ vicintya dvārasthaḥ phūtkartum ārabdhaḥ-aho bila /
GK22vispancu:5574: ity uktvā tūṣṇīṃbhūya bhūyo 'pi tathaiva pratyabhāṣata-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:5575: kiṃ na smarasi yan mayā tvayā saha samayaḥ kṛto 'sti ?
GK22vispancu:5576: yan mayā bāhyāt samāgatena tvaṃ vaktavyaḥ,
GK22vispancu:5578: tad yadi māṃ nāhvayasi tato 'haṃ dvitīyaṃ bilaṃ yāsyāmi /
GK22vispancu:5579: atha tac chrutvā siṃhaś cintitavān-nūnam eṣā guhāsya samāgatasya sadā samāhvānaṃ karoti /
GK22vispancu:5580: param adya mad-bhayān na kiṃcid brūte /
GK22vispancu:5583: pravartante na vāṇī ca vepathuś cādhiko bhavet //Panc_3.218//
GK22vispancu:5584: tad aham asyāhvānaṃ karomi yena tad-anusāreṇa praviṣṭo 'yaṃ me bhojyatāṃ yāsyati /
GK22vispancu:5586: atha siṃha-śabdena sā guhā pratirava-sampūrṇā anyān api dūra-sthān araṇya-jīvāṃs trāsayāmāsa /
GK22vispancu:5587: śṛgālo 'pi palāyamāna imaṃ ślokam apaṭhat-anāgataṃ yaḥ kurute sa śobhate ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:5588: tad evaṃ matvā yuṣmābhir mayā saha gantavyam iti /
GK22vispancu:5590: atha raktākṣe gate sthirajīvy atihṛṣṭa-manā vyacintayat-aho /
GK22vispancu:5592: yad raktāṃśo gataḥ sa dīrghadarśī ete ca mūḍha-manasaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5595: na dīrgha-darśino yasya mantriṇaḥ syur mahīpateḥ /
GK22vispancu:5596: kramāyātā dhruvaṃ tasya na cirāt syāt parikṣayaḥ //Panc_3.219//
GK22vispancu:5598: mantri-rūpā hi ripavaḥ sambhāvyās te vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
GK22vispancu:5599: ye santaṃ nayam utsṛjya sevante pratilomataḥ //Panc_3.220//
GK22vispancu:5600: evaṃ vicintya sva-kulāya ekaikāṃ vana-kāṣṭhikāṃ guhā-pradīpanārthaṃ dine dine prakṣipati /
GK22vispancu:5601: na ca te mūrkhā ulūkā vijānanti,
GK22vispancu:5602: yad eṣa kulāyam asmad-dāhāya vṛddhiṃ nayati /
GK22vispancu:5604: amitraṃ kurute mitraṃ mitraṃ dveṣṭi hinasti ca /
GK22vispancu:5605: śubhaṃ vetty aśubhaṃ pāpaṃ bhadraṃ daiva-hato naraḥ //Panc_3.221//
GK22vispancu:5608: andhatāṃ prāpteṣūlūkeṣu satsu sthirajīvī śīghram ṛṣyamūkaṃ gatvā meghavarṇam āha-svāmin /
GK22vispancu:5610: tat saparivāraḥ sametyaikaikā vana-kāṣṭhikāṃ jvalantī gṛhītvā guhā-dvāre'smat-kulāye prakṣipa yena sarve śatravaḥ kumbhīpāka-naraka-prāyeṇa duḥkhena mriyante /
GK22vispancu:5616: yataḥ kadācit tasya ripo kaścit praṇidhir mamehāgamanaṃ nivedayiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:5620: tat kṛtyaṃ devatās tasya kopād vighnanty asaṃśayam //Panc_3.222//
GK22vispancu:5622: yasya yasya hi kāryasya phalitasya viśeṣataḥ /

GK22vispancu:5625: athāsau tad-vacanam ākarṇya sa-parijana ekaikāṃ jvalantīṃ vana-kāṣṭhikāṃ cañcv-agreṇa
GK22vispancu:5627: tataḥ sarve te divāndhā raktākṣa-vākyāni smaranto dvārasyāvṛtatvād aniḥsaranto guhā-madhye kumbhīpāka-nyāyam āpannā mṛtāś ca /
GK22vispancu:5628: evaṃ śatrūn niḥśeṣatāṃ nītvā bhūyo 'pi meghavarṇas tad eva nyagrodha-pādapa-durgaṃ jagāma /
GK22vispancu:5629: tataḥ siṃhāsana-stho bhūtvā sabhā-madhye pramudita-manāḥ sthirajīvinam apṛcchat-tāta /
GK22vispancu:5630: kathaṃ tvayā śatru-madhye gatena etāvat-paryantaṃ kālo nītaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5636: āgāmi-phala-vāñchayā kaṣṭam api sevako na jānāti /
GK22vispancu:5639: sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ yatra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //Panc_3.225//
GK22vispancu:5640: upanata-bhaye yo yo mārgo hitārtha-karo bhavet- sa sa nipuṇayā buddhyā sevyo mahān kṛpaṇo 'pi vā /
GK22vispancu:5641: karikara-nibhau jyāghātā kau mahāstra-viśāradau valaya-racitau strīvad bāhū kṛtau na kirīṭinā //Panc_3.226//
GK22vispancu:5643: vastavyaṃ khalu vākya-vajra-viṣame kṣudre'pi pāpe jane /
GK22vispancu:5646: yad vā tad vā viṣama-patitaḥ sādhu vā garhitaṃ vā
GK22vispancu:5650: siddhiṃ prārthayatā janena viduṣā tejo nigṛhya svakaṃ
GK22vispancu:5653: kiṃ kliṣṭaḥ suciraṃ virāṭa-bhavane śrīmān na dharmātmajaḥ //Panc_3.229//
GK22vispancu:5657: kāntyā śrīr iva yātra sāpi vidaśāṃ kāla-kramād āgatā /
GK22vispancu:5659: draupadyā nanu matsya-rāja-bhavane dhṛṣṭaṃ na kiṃ candanam //Panc_3.231//
GK22vispancu:5661: asi-dhārā-vratam idaṃ manye yad ariṇā saha saṃvāsaḥ /

GK22vispancu:5665: na ca mahāprajñam aneka-śāstreṣv apratima-buddhiṃ raktākṣaṃ vinā dhīmān /
GK22vispancu:5666: yat-kāraṇaṃ tena madīyaṃ yathāvasthitaṃ cittaṃ jñātam /
GK22vispancu:5667: ye punar anye mantriṇas te mahā-mūrkhā mantri-mātra-vyapadeśopajīvino 'tattva-kuśalā,
GK22vispancu:5668: yair idam api na jñātam / yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:5674: ātmānam ādṛto rakṣet pramādād dhi vinaśyati //Panc_3.234//
GK22vispancu:5678: kaṃ śrīr na darpayati kaṃ na nihanti mṛtyuḥ

GK22vispancu:5685: tan mayā sākṣād evānubhūtam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5686: apamānaṃ puraskṛtya mānaṃ kṛtvā tu pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5687: svārtham abhyuddharet prājñaḥ kārya-dhvaṃso hi mūrkhatā //Panc_3.237//
GK22vispancu:5688: skandhenāpi vahec chatruṃ kālam āsādya buddhimān /
GK22vispancu:5694: asti varuṇādri-samīpa ekasmin pradeśe pariṇata-vayā manda-viṣo nāma kṛṣṇa-sarpaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5695: sa evaṃ citte sañcintitavān-kathaṃ nāma mayā sukhopāya-vṛttyā vartitavyam iti /
GK22vispancu:5696: tato bahu-maṇḍūkaṃ hradam upagamya dhṛti-parītam ivātmānaṃ darśitavān /
GK22vispancu:5697: atha tathā sthite saudaka-prānta-gatenaikena maṇḍūkena pṛṣṭaḥ-māma /
GK22vispancu:5698: kim adya yathā-pūrvam āhārārthaṃ na viharasi /
GK22vispancu:5701: yat kāraṇam adya rātrau pradoṣa eva mayāhārārthaṃ viharamāṇena dṛṣṭa eko maṇḍūkaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5703: so 'pi māṃ dṛṣṭvā mṛtyu-bhayena svādhyāya-prasaktānāṃ brāhmaṇānām antaram apakrānto na vibhāvito mayā kvāpi gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5704: tat-sādṛśya-mohita-cittena mayā kasyacid brāhmaṇasya sūnor hrada-taṭa-jalāntaḥ-stho 'ṅguṣṭho daṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5706: atha tasya pitrā duḥkhitenāhaṃ śapto yathā-durātman /
GK22vispancu:5708: tad anena doṣeṇa tvaṃ maṇḍūkānāṃ vāhanaṃ bhaviṣyasi,
GK22vispancu:5712: tatas taiḥ prahṛṣṭa-manobhiḥ sarvair eva gatvā jala-pāda-nāmno dardura-rājasya vijñaptam /
GK22vispancu:5713: athāsāv api mantri-parivṛto 'tyadbhutam idam iti manyamāno sa-sambhramaṃ hradād uttīrya manda-viṣasya phaṇinaḥ phaṇā-pradeśam adhirūḍhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5715: kiṃ bahunā, uparita-sthānam aprāptavantas tasyānupadaṃ dhāvanti /
GK22vispancu:5716: mandaviṣo 'pi teṣāṃ tuṣṭy-artham aneka-prakārān gati-viśeṣān adarśayat /
GK22vispancu:5718: na tathā kariṇā yānaṃ turageṇa rathena vā /
GK22vispancu:5719: nara-yānena vā yānaṃ yathā mandaviṣeṇa me //Panc_3.239//
GK22vispancu:5720: athānyedyur manda-viṣaś chadmanā mandaṃ mandaṃ visarpati /
GK22vispancu:5724: mandaviṣo 'bravīt-deva adyāhāra-vaikalyān na me voḍhuṃ śaktir asti /
GK22vispancu:5727: tac chrutvā praharṣita-sarva-gātro mandaviṣaḥ sa-sambhramam abravīt-mamāyam eva vipra-śāpo 'sti /
GK22vispancu:5729: tato 'sau nairantaryeṇa maṇḍūkān bhakṣayan katipayair evāhobhir balavān saṃvṛttaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5732: kiyantaṃ kālam akṣīṇā bhaveyuḥ khāditā mama //Panc_3.240//
GK22vispancu:5733: jala-pādo 'pi mandaviṣeṇa kṛta-kavaca-navyāmohita-cittaḥ kim api nāvabudhyate /
GK22vispancu:5734: atrāntare'nyo mahākāyaḥ kṛṣṇa-sarpas tam uddeśaṃ samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5735: taṃ ca maṇḍūkair vāhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismaya-gatam /
GK22vispancu:5737: yad asmākam aśanaṃ taiḥ kathaṃ vāhyase /
GK22vispancu:5740: sarvam etad vijānāmi yathā vāhyo 'smi darduraiḥ /
GK22vispancu:5741: kiñcit kālaṃ pratīkṣe'haṃ ghṛtāndho brāhmaṇo yathā //Panc_3.241//
GK22vispancu:5746: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne yajñadatto nāma brāhmaṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5747: tasya bhāryā puṃścaly anyāsakta-manā ajasraṃ viṭāyasa-khaṇḍa-ghṛtān ghṛta-pūrān kṛtvā bhartuś caurikayā prayacchati /
GK22vispancu:5752: sā cotpanna-pratibhā kṛtaka-vacanair bhartāram abravīt-asty atra nātidūre bhagavatyā devyā āyatanam /
GK22vispancu:5753: tatrāham upoṣitā satī baliṃ bhakṣya-viśeṣāṃś cāpūrvān nayāmi /
GK22vispancu:5754: atha tat paśyatā gṛhītvā tat sakalaṃ devyāyatanābhimukhī pratasthe /
GK22vispancu:5755: yat kāraṇaṃ devyā niveditenānena madīyo bhartaivaṃ maṃsyate yat mama brāhmaṇī bhagavatyāḥ
GK22vispancu:5756: kṛte nadyām avatīrya yāvat snānaṃ karoti tāvat tad bhartāpi mārgāntareṇāgatya devyāḥ
GK22vispancu:5758: atha sā brāhmaṇī snātvā devy-āyatanam āgatya snānānulepana-mālya-dhūpa-bali-kriyādikaṃ kṛtvā devīṃ praṇamya vyajijñapat-bhagavati /
GK22vispancu:5760: tac chrutvā svara-bhedena devī-pṛṣṭha-sthito brāhmaṇo jagāda-yadi tvam ajasraṃ ghṛta-pūrādi-bhakṣyaṃ tasmai bhartre prayacchasi,
GK22vispancu:5762: sā tu bandhakī kṛtaka-vacana-vañcita-mānasā tasmai brāhmaṇāya tad eva nityaṃ pradadau /
GK22vispancu:5765: tac chrutvā cintitam anayā-devyāḥ prasādo 'yaṃ prāpta iti /
GK22vispancu:5766: atha tasyā hṛdaya-vallabho viṭas tat-sakāśam-andhībhūto 'yaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ kiṃ mama kariṣyatīti niḥśaṅkaṃ pratidinam abhyeti /
GK22vispancu:5767: athānyedyus taṃ praviśantam abhyāśa-gataṃ dṛṣṭvā keśair gṛhītvā laguḍa-pārṣṇi-prabhṛti-prahārais tāvad atāḍayat yāvad asau pañcatvam āpa /
GK22vispancu:5769: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-skandhenāpi vahec chatrum (238) ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:5770: atha rājan / yathā mandaviṣeṇa buddhi-balena maṇḍūkā nihatās tathā mayāpi sarve vairiṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5772: vane prajvalito vahnir dahan mūlāni rakṣati /
GK22vispancu:5776: ye mahātmāno bhavanti te mahā-sattvā āpad-gatā api prārabdhaṃ na tyajanti /
GK22vispancu:5779: na muñcanti yad ārabdhaṃ kṛcchre'pi vyasanodaye //Panc_3.243//
GK22vispancu:5785: tat kṛtaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ mama rājyaṃ śatrūn niḥśeṣatāṃ nayatā tvayā /
GK22vispancu:5788: ṛṇa-śeṣaṃ cāgni-śeṣaṃ ca śatru-śeṣaṃ tathaiva ca /
GK22vispancu:5789: vyādhi-śeṣaṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ kṛtvā prājño na sīdati //Panc_3.245//
GK22vispancu:5793: tan na kevalaṃ śauryaṃ kṛtyaṃ sādhayati,
GK22vispancu:5794: kintu prajñayā yat kriyate tad eva vijayāya bhavati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5795: śastrair hatā na hi hatā ripavo bhavanti
GK22vispancu:5798: prajñā kulaṃ ca vibhavaś ca yaśaś ca hanti //Panc_3.246//
GK22vispancu:5799: tad evaṃ prajñā-puruṣakārābhyāṃ yuktasyāyatnena kārya-siddhayaḥ sambhavanti / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5801: svayam upanayann arthān mantro na gacchati viplavam /
GK22vispancu:5802: sphurati saphalas tarkaś cittaṃ samunnatim aśnute
GK22vispancu:5803: bhavati ca ratiḥ ślāghye kṛtye narasya bhaviṣyataḥ //Panc_3.247//
GK22vispancu:5804: tathā ca naya-tyāga-śaurya-sampanne puruṣe rājyam iti / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5805: tyāgini śūre viduṣi ca saṃsarga-rucir jano guṇī bhavati /
GK22vispancu:5806: guṇavati dhanaṃ dhanāc chrīḥ śrīmaty ājñā tato rājyam //Panc_3.248//
GK22vispancu:5807: meghavarṇa āha-nūnaṃ sadyaḥ-phalāni nīti-śāstrāṇi yat tvayānukṛtyenānupraviśyāri-mardanaḥ saparijano niḥśeṣitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5815: yad anantara-jāle kriyā-rahitam asukha-sādhyaṃ vā bhavati /
GK22vispancu:5821: na ca laghuṣv api kartavyeṣu dhīmadbhir anādaraḥ kartavyaḥ / yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:5826: tad adya jitārer mad-vibhor yathā-pūrvaṃ nidrā-lābho bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:5828: niḥsarpe baddha-sarpe vā bhavane suṣyate sukham /
GK22vispancu:5829: sadā dṛṣṭa-bhujaṅge tu nidrā duḥkhena labhyate //Panc_3.252//
GK22vispancu:5836: tad idam adhunā nihata-kaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ prajā-pālana-tatparo bhūtvā putra-pautrādi-krameṇācala-cchatrāsana-śrīḥ ciraṃ bhuṅkṣva / api ca-
GK22vispancu:5837: prajā na rañjayed yas tu rājā rakṣādibhir guṇaiḥ /
GK22vispancu:5843: na ca tvayā prāpta-rājyo 'ham iti matvā śrī-madenātmā vyasayitavyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5844: yat kāraṇam-calā hi rājño vibhūtayaḥ vaṃśārohaṇavad rājya-lakṣmī-durārohā,
GK22vispancu:5861: na ca kaścid anadhigamanīyo nāmāsty āpadām / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5862: rāmasya vrajanaṃ vane nivasanaṃ pāṇḍoḥ sutānāṃ vane
GK22vispancu:5863: vṛṣṇīnāṃ nidhanaṃ nalasya nṛpate rājyāt paribhraṃśanam /
GK22vispancu:5865: sarve kāla-vaśāj jano 'tra sahate kaḥ kaṃ paritrāyate //Panc_3.257//
GK22vispancu:5866: kva sa daśarathaḥ svarge bhūtvā mahendra-suhṛd gataḥ

GK22vispancu:5868: kva sa karatalāj jāto vainyaḥ kva sūrya-tanur manuḥ
GK22vispancu:5870: māndhātā kva gatas triloka-vijayī rājā kva satyavrataḥ
GK22vispancu:5871: devānāṃ nṛpatir gataḥ kva nahuṣaḥ sac-chāstravān keśavaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5873: kālenaiva mahātmanā tv anukṛtāḥ kālena nirvāsitāḥ //Panc_3.259//
GK22vispancu:5875: sa ca nṛpatis te sacivās tāḥ pramadās tāni kānana-vanāni /
GK22vispancu:5876: sa ca te ca tāś ca tāni ca kṛtānta-dṛṣṭāni naṣṭāni //Panc_3.260//
GK22vispancu:5877: evaṃ matta-kari-karṇa-cañcalāṃ rājya-lakṣmīm avāpya nyāyaika-niṣṭho bhūtvopabhuṅkṣva /
GK22vispancu:5882: athedam ārabhate labdha-praṇāśaṃ nāma caturthaṃ tantram /
GK22vispancu:5884: samutpanneṣu kāryeṣu buddhir yasya na hīyate /
GK22vispancu:5885: sa eva durgaṃ tarati jalastho vānaro yathā //Panc_4.1//
GK22vispancu:5889: asti kasmiṃścit samudropakaṇṭhe mahān jambū-pādapaḥ sadā-phalaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5890: tatra ca raktamukho nāma vānaraḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:5891: tatra ca tasya taror adhaḥ kadācit karālamukho nāma makaraḥ samudra-salilān niṣkramya sukomala-bālukā-sanāthe tīropānte nyaviśata /
GK22vispancu:5894: tad bhakṣayatu mayā dattāny amṛta-tulyāni jambū-phalāni / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5895: priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyo mūrkho vā yadi paṇḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5897: na pṛcchec caraṇaṃ gotraṃ na ca vidyāṃ kulaṃ na ca /
GK22vispancu:5898: atithiṃ vaiśvadevānte śrāddhe ca manur abravīt //Panc_4.3//
GK22vispancu:5900: atithiṃ pūjayed yas tu sa yāti paramāṃ gatim //Panc_4.4//
GK22vispancu:5902: gacchanti pitaras tasya vimukhāḥ saha daivataiḥ //Panc_4.5//
GK22vispancu:5904: so 'pi tāni bhakṣayitvā tena saha ciraṃ goṣṭhī-sukham anubhūya bhūyo 'pi sva-bhavanam agāt /
GK22vispancu:5905: evaṃ nityam eva tau vānara-makarau jambū-cchāyā-sthitau vividha-śāstra-goṣṭhyā kālaṃ nayantau sukhena tiṣṭhataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5906: so 'pi makaro bhakṣita-śeṣāṇi jambū-phalāni gṛhaṃ gatvā sva-patnyai prayacchati /
GK22vispancu:5916: yena tad bhakṣayitvā jarā-maraṇa-rahitā tvayā saha bhogān bhunajmi /
GK22vispancu:5923: ekaṃ prasūyate mātā dvitīyaṃ vāk prasūyate /
GK22vispancu:5924: vāg-jātam adhikaṃ procuḥ sodaryād api bāndhavāt //Panc_4.6//
GK22vispancu:5925: atha makary āha-tvayā kadācid api mama vacanaṃ nānyathā kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:5927: yatas tasyā anurāgataḥ sakalam api dinaṃ tatra gamayasi /
GK22vispancu:5928: tat tvaṃ jñāto mayā samyak / yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:5929: sāhlādaṃ vacanaṃ prayacchati na me no vāñchitaṃ kiñcana
GK22vispancu:5930: prāyaḥ procchvasiṣi drutaṃ hutavaha-jvālā samaṃ rātriṣu /
GK22vispancu:5932: tat te dhūrta hṛdi sthitā priyatamā kācin mamevāparā //Panc_4.7//
GK22vispancu:5933: so 'pi patnyāḥ pādopasaṅgrahaṃ kṛtvāṅkopari nidhāya tasyāḥ kopa-koṭim āpannāyāḥ sudīnam uvāca-
GK22vispancu:5935: tvaṃ prāṇa-vallabhe kasmāt kopane kopam eṣyasi //Panc_4.8//
GK22vispancu:5941: aparaṃ sā yadi tava vallabhā na bhavati,
GK22vispancu:5942: tat kiṃ mayā bhaṇito 'pi tāṃ na vyāpādayasi /
GK22vispancu:5943: atha yadi sa vānaras tat kas tena saha tava snehaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:5947: evaṃ tasyās tan niścayaṃ jñātvā cintā-vyākulita-hṛdayaḥ sa provāca-athavā sādhv idam ucyate-
GK22vispancu:5949: eko grahas tu mīnānāṃ nīlī-madya-payos tathā //Panc_4.10//
GK22vispancu:5953: vānaro 'pi cirād āyāntaṃ taṃ sodvegam avalokya provāca-bho mitra /
GK22vispancu:5958: ahaṃ tava bhrātṛ-jāyayā niṣṭhuratarair vākyair abhihitaḥ-bhoḥ kṛtaghna /
GK22vispancu:5961: na ca tasya punaḥ pratyupakāraṃ gṛha-darśana-mātreṇāpi karoṣi /
GK22vispancu:5962: tat te prāyaścittam api nāsti / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:5963: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca caure bhagna-vrate śaṭhe /
GK22vispancu:5964: niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ //Panc_4.11//
GK22vispancu:5965: tat tvaṃ mama devaraṃ gṛhītvādya pratyupakārārthaṃ gṛham ānaya /
GK22vispancu:5966: no cet tvayā saha me para-loke darśanam iti /
GK22vispancu:5967: tad ahaṃ tayaivaṃ proktas tava sakāśam āgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:5968: tad adya tayā saha tvad-arthe kalahāyato mameyatī velā vilagnā /
GK22vispancu:5970: tava bhrātṛ-patnī racita-catuṣkā praguṇita-vastra-maṇi-māṇikyādy-ucitābharaṇā dvāra-deśa-baddha-vandana-mālā sotkaṇṭhā tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:5974: ātmanaḥ sammukhaṃ nityaṃ ya ākarṣati lolupaḥ //Panc_4.12//
GK22vispancu:5978: paraṃ vayaṃ vanacarāḥ yuṣmadīyaṃ ca jalānte gṛham /
GK22vispancu:5980: tasmāt tām api me bhrātṛ-patnīm atrānaya yena praṇamya tasyā āśīrvādaṃ gṛhṇāmi /
GK22vispancu:5982: asti samudrāntare suramye pulina-pradeśe'smad-gṛham æ tan mama pṛṣṭham ārūdhaḥ sukhenākṛta-bhayo gaccha /
GK22vispancu:5987: tathānuṣṭhite'gādhe jaladhau gacchantaṃ marakam ālokya bhaya-trasta-manā vānaraḥ provāca-bhrātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5990: tad ākarṇya makaraś cintayāmāsa-asāv agādhaṃ jalaṃ prāpto me vaśaḥ sañjātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:5991: mat-pṛṣṭha-gatas tila-mātram api calituṃ na śaknoti /
GK22vispancu:5995: tvaṃ mayā vadhāya samānīto bhāryā-vākyena viśvāsya /
GK22vispancu:5998: kiṃ mayā tasyās tavāpi cāpakṛtaṃ yena me vadhopāyaś cintitaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6000: tasyās tāvat tava hṛdayasyāmṛtamaya-phala-rasāsvādana-mṛṣṭasya bhakṣaṇe dohadaḥ sañjātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6003: yady evaṃ tat kiṃ tvayā mama tatraiva na vyāhṛtam ?
GK22vispancu:6004: yena sva-hṛdayaṃ jambū-koṭare sadaiva mayā suguptaṃ kṛtam /
GK22vispancu:6008: yady evaṃ tad arpaya me hṛdayam /
GK22vispancu:6009: yena sā duṣṭa-patnī tad bhakṣayitvānaśanād utthiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6010: ahaṃ tvāṃ tam eva jambū-pādapaṃ prāpayāmi /
GK22vispancu:6012: vānaro 'pi katham api jalpita-vividha-devatopacāra-pūjas tīram āsāditavān /
GK22vispancu:6013: tataś ca dīrghatara-caṅkramaṇena tam eva jambū-pādapam ārūḍhaś cintayāmāsa-aho /
GK22vispancu:6016: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste'pi na viśvaset /
GK22vispancu:6017: viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati //Panc_4.14//
GK22vispancu:6018: tan mamaitad adya punar janma-dinam iva sañjātam /
GK22vispancu:6020: arpaya tad dhṛdayaṃ yathā te bhrātṛ-patnī bhakṣayitvānaśanād uttiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6021: atha vihasya nirbhartsayan vānaras tam āha-dhig dhiṅ mūrkha viśvāsa-ghātaka /
GK22vispancu:6023: tad āśu gamyatāṃ jambū-vṛkṣasyādhastān na bhūyo 'pi tvayātrāgantavyam /
GK22vispancu:6025: sakṛd duṣṭaṃ ca yo mitraṃ punaḥ sandhātum icchati /
GK22vispancu:6026: sa mṛtyum upagṛhṇāti garbham aśvatarī yathā //Panc_4.15//
GK22vispancu:6029: tad yady asau punar api kathañcid viśvāsaṃ gacchati,
GK22vispancu:6033: tasyā na kiñcit tava hṛdayena prayojanam /
GK22vispancu:6046: kasmiṃścit kūpe gaṅgadatto nāma maṇḍūka-rājaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:6047: sa kadācid dāyādair udvejito 'raghaṭṭa-ghaṭīm āruhya niṣkrāntaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6048: atha tena cintitam-yat kathaṃ tesāṃ dāyādānāṃ mayā pratyapakāraḥ kartavyaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6049: āpadi yenāpakṛtaṃ yena ca hasitaṃ daśāsu viṣamāsu /
GK22vispancu:6050: apakṛtya tayor ubhayoḥ punar api jātaṃ naraṃ manye //Panc_4.17//
GK22vispancu:6051: evaṃ cintayan bile praviśantaṃ kṛṣṇasarpam apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:6052: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo 'py acintayat-yad enaṃ tatra kūpe nītvā sakala-dāyādānām ucchedaṃ karomi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6054: sva-kāryāya yato na syāt kācit pīḍātra tat-kṣaye //Panc_4.18//
GK22vispancu:6056: śatrum unmūlayet prājñas tīkṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇena śatruṇā /
GK22vispancu:6058: evaṃ sa vibhāvya bila-dvāraṃ gatvā tam āhūtavān-ehy ehi priya-darśana / ehi /
GK22vispancu:6059: tac chrutvā sarpaś cintayāmāsa-ya evaṃ mām āhvayati /
GK22vispancu:6062: anyena kenāpi saha mama martya-loke sandhānaṃ nāsti /
GK22vispancu:6063: tad atraiva durge sthitas tāvad vedmi ko 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6064: yasya na jāyate śīlaṃ na kulaṃ na ca saṃśrayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6065: na tena saṅgatiṃ kuryād ity uvāca bṛhaspatiḥ //Panc_4.20//
GK22vispancu:6066: kadācitko 'pi mantravādy auṣadha-caturo vā mām āhūya bandhane kṣipati /
GK22vispancu:6067: athavā kaścit puruṣo vairam āśritya kasyacid bhakṣaṇārthe mām āhvayati /
GK22vispancu:6069: sa āha-ahaṃ gaṅgadatto nāma maṇḍūkādhipatis tvat-sakāśe maitry-artham abhyāgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6071: aśraddheyam etat yat-tṛṇānāṃ vahninā saha saṅgamaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6072: yo yasya jāyate vadhyaḥ sa svapne'pi kathañcana /
GK22vispancu:6073: na tat-samīpam abhyeti tat kim evaṃ prajalpasi //Panc_4.21//
GK22vispancu:6077: paraṃ para-paribhavāt prāpto 'haṃ te sakāśam / uktaṃ ca-

GK22vispancu:6079: api śatruṃ praṇamyāpi rakṣet prāṇāndhanāni ca //Panc_4.22//
GK22vispancu:6082: so 'py āha-kva te āśrayo vāpyāṃ kūpe taḍāge hrade vā /
GK22vispancu:6090: yac chakyaṃ grasituṃ yasya grastaṃ pariṇamec ca yat /
GK22vispancu:6091: hitaṃ ca pariṇāme yat tad ādyaṃ bhūtim icchatā //Panc_4.23//
GK22vispancu:6094: ahaṃ sukhopāyena tatra tava praveśaṃ kārayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6095: tathā tasya madhye jalopānte ramyataraṃ koṭaram asti /
GK22vispancu:6096: tatra sthitas tvaṃ līlayā dāyādān vyāpādayiṣyasi /
GK22vispancu:6097: tac chrutvā sarpo vyacintayat-ahaṃ tāvat pariṇata-vayāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6099: tat sukhāvaho jīvanopāyo 'yam anena kulāṅgāreṇa darśitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6100: tad gatvā tān maṇḍūkān bhakṣayāmi iti /
GK22vispancu:6103: sa hi sarva-sukhopāyāṃ vṛttim āracayed budhaḥ //Panc_4.24//
GK22vispancu:6109: sthānaṃ ca darśayiṣyāmi ta eva bhakṣaṇīyāḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:6110: sarpa āha-sāmprataṃ tvaṃ me mitraṃ jātam /
GK22vispancu:6113: evam uktvā bilān niṣkramya tam āliṅgya ca tenaiva saha prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6114: atha kūpam āsādyāra-ghaṭṭa-ghaṭikā-mārgeṇa sarpas tenātmanā svālayaṃ nītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6117: tat sāmpratam anenaiva ghaṭikā-yantra-mārgeṇa gamyatām iti /
GK22vispancu:6122: tasmād atra-sthasya me maṇḍūkam ekaikaṃ sva-vargīyaṃ prayaccha /
GK22vispancu:6123: no cet sarvān api bhakṣayiṣyāmi iti /
GK22vispancu:6124: tac chrutvā gaṅgadatto vyākula-manā vyācintayat-aho kim etan mayā kṛtaṃ sarpam ānayatā /
GK22vispancu:6125: tad yadi niṣedhayiṣyāmi tat sarvān api bhakṣayiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:6128: sa karoti na sandehaḥ svayaṃ hi viṣa-bhakṣaṇam //Panc_4.25//
GK22vispancu:6129: tat prayacchāmy asyaikaikaṃ pratidinaṃ suhṛdam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6139: ardhena kurute kāryaṃ sarva-nāśo hi dustaraḥ //Panc_4.28//
GK22vispancu:6140: na svalpasya kṛte bhūri nāśayen matimān naraḥ /
GK22vispancu:6141: etad eva hi pāṇḍityaṃ yat svalpād bhūri-rakṣaṇam //Panc_4.29//
GK22vispancu:6143: so 'pi taṃ bhakṣayitvā tasya parokṣe'nyān api bhakṣayati /
GK22vispancu:6145: yathā hi malinair vastrair yatra tatropaviśyate /
GK22vispancu:6146: evaṃ calita-vittas tu vitta-śeṣaṃ na rakṣati //Panc_4.30//
GK22vispancu:6147: athānya-dine tenāparān maṇḍūkān bhakṣayitvā gaṅgadatta-suto yamunādatto bhakṣitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6148: taṃ bhakṣitaṃ matvā gaṅgadattas tāra-svareṇa dhig dhik pralāpa-paraḥ kathañcid api na virarāma /
GK22vispancu:6151: sva-pakṣasya kṣaye jāte ko nas trātā bhaviṣyati //Panc_4.31//
GK22vispancu:6152: tad adyāpi vicintyatām ātmano niṣkramaṇam asya vadhopāyaś ca /
GK22vispancu:6153: atha gacchatā kālena sakalam api kavalitaṃ maṇḍūka-kulam /
GK22vispancu:6158: tad dīyatāṃ me kiñcid bhojanaṃ yato 'haṃ tvayātrānītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6160: na tvayātra viṣaye mayāvasthitena kāpi cintā kāryā /
GK22vispancu:6161: tad yadi māṃ preṣayati tato 'nya-kūpa-sthān api maṇḍūkān viśvāsyātrānayāmi /
GK22vispancu:6162: sa āha-mama tāvat tvam abhakṣyo bhrātṛ-sthāne /
GK22vispancu:6163: tad yady evaṃ karoṣi tat sāmprataṃ pitṛ-sthāne bhavasi /
GK22vispancu:6165: so 'pi tad ākarṇyāra-ghaṭṭa-ghaṭikām āśritya vividha-devatopakalpita-pūjopayācitas tat-kūpād viniṣkrāntaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6167: atha cirād anāgate gaṅgadatte priyadarśano 'nya-koṭara-nivāsinīṃ godhām uvāca-bhadre /
GK22vispancu:6170: tad gatvā tat-sakāśaṃ kutracij jalāśaye'nviṣya mama sandeśaṃ kathaya /
GK22vispancu:6171: yenāgamyatām ekākināpi bhavatā drutataraṃ yady anye maṇḍūkā nāgacchanti /
GK22vispancu:6172: ahaṃ tvayā vinā nātra vastuṃ śaknomi /
GK22vispancu:6173: tathā yady ahaṃ tava viruddham ācarāmi tat sukṛtam antare mayā vidhṛtam /
GK22vispancu:6174: godhāpi tad-vacanād gaṅgadattaṃ drutataram anviṣyāha-bhadra gaṅgadatta /
GK22vispancu:6175: sa tava suhṛt-priyadarśanas tava mārgaṃ samīkṣamāṇas tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6177: aparaṃ ca tena tava virūpa-karaṇe sukṛtam antare dhṛtam /
GK22vispancu:6186: aham api gaṅgadatta iva tvad-gṛhe na kathañcid api yāsyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6191: dṛṣṭvāpāyo 'pi svayam eva tatra gatvātmānaṃ vyāpādayāmi /
GK22vispancu:6192: āgataś ca gataś caiva gatvā yaḥ punar āgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6201: kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe karāla-kesaro nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:6202: tasya ca dhūsarako nāma śṛgālaḥ sadaivānuyāyī paricārako 'sti /
GK22vispancu:6203: atha kadācit tasya hastinā saha yudhyamānasya śarīre gurutarāḥ prahārāḥ sañjātāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6204: yaiḥ padam ekam api calituṃ na śaknoti /
GK22vispancu:6205: tasyācalanāc ca dhūsarakaḥ kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭho daurbalyaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6208: padāt padam api calituṃ na śaknomi /
GK22vispancu:6213: tad ākarṇya śṛgālo 'nveṣayan kañcit samīpa-vartinaṃ grāmam āsāditavān /
GK22vispancu:6214: tatra lambakarṇo nāma gardabhas taḍāgopānte pravirala-dūrvāṅkurān kṛcchrād āsvādayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6218: tat kathaya kim evaṃ durbalatāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6226: yady evaṃ tad asti marakata-sadṛśa-śaṣpa-prāyo nadī-sanātho ramaṇīyataraḥ pradeśaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6227: tatrāgatya mayā saha subhāṣita-goṣṭhī-sukham anubhavaṃs tiṣṭha /
GK22vispancu:6235: tatrāsti na kaścid aparasya tatra praveśaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6236: paramam anenaiva doṣeṇa rajaka-kadarthitās tatra tisro rāsabhyo 'nāthāḥ santi /
GK22vispancu:6237: tāś ca puṣṭim āpannā yauvanotkaṭā idaṃ mām ūcuḥ-yadi tvam asmākaṃ satyo mātulas tadā kaṃcid grāmāntaraṃ gatvāsmad-yogyaṃ kaścit patim ānaya
GK22vispancu:6239: atha śṛgāla-vacanāni śrutvā kāma-pīḍitāṅgas tam avocat-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:6242: nāmṛtaṃ na viṣaṃ kiñcid ekāṃ muktvā nitambinīm /
GK22vispancu:6243: yasyāḥ saṅgena jīvyeta mriyate ca viyogataḥ //Panc_4.34//
GK22vispancu:6245: yāsāṃ nāmnāpi kāmaḥ syāt saṅgamaṃ darśanaṃ vinā /
GK22vispancu:6246: tāsāṃ dṛk-saṅgamaṃ prāpya yan na dravati kautukam //Panc_4.35//
GK22vispancu:6248: siṃho 'pi vyathākulitas taṃ dṛṣṭvā yāvat samuttiṣṭhati tāvad rāsabhaḥ palāyitum ārabdhavān /
GK22vispancu:6249: atha tasya palāyamānasya siṃhena tala-prahāro dattaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6250: sa ca manda-bhāgyasya vyavasāya iva vyarthatāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6253: yad gardabho 'pi tava purato balād gacchati /
GK22vispancu:6254: tat kathaṃ gajena saha yuddhaṃ kariṣyasi ?
GK22vispancu:6260: śṛgāla āha-adyāpy eka-vāraṃ tavāntike tam āneṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6263: yo māṃ pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā gataḥ sa punaḥ katham atrāgamiṣyati ?
GK22vispancu:6264: tad anyat kim api sattvam anviṣyatām /
GK22vispancu:6269: atha śṛgālaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāsabhaḥ prāha-bho bhaginī-suta /
GK22vispancu:6272: tat kathaya kiṃ tat sattvaṃ yasyātiraudra-vajra-sadṛśa-kara-prahārād ahaṃ muktaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6274: rāsabhī tvām āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā sānurāgam āliṅgituṃ samutthitā /
GK22vispancu:6276: sā punar na śaktā tvāṃ vinā sthātum /
GK22vispancu:6277: tayā tu naśatas te'valambanārthaṃ hastaḥ kṣiptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6281: etad vadati-yal lambakarṇo yadi me bhartā na bhavati tad aham agnau jalaṃ vā praviśāmi /
GK22vispancu:6282: punas tasya viyogaṃ soḍhuṃ na śaknomi iti /
GK22vispancu:6285: aparaṃ bhagavān kāma-kopaṃ tavopari kariṣyati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6287: te mūḍhāḥ pravihāya yānti kudhiyo mithyā-phalānveṣiṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6288: te tenaiva nihatya nirdayataraṃ nagnīkṛtā muṇḍitāḥ
GK22vispancu:6289: kecid rakta-paṭīkṛtāś ca jaṭilāḥ kāpālikāś cāpare //Panc_4.36//
GK22vispancu:6290: athāsau tad-vacanaṃ śraddheyatayā śrutvā bhūyo 'pi tena saha prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6292: jānann api naro daivāt prakaroti vigarhitam /
GK22vispancu:6293: karma kiṃ kasyacil loke garhitaṃ rocate katham //Panc_4.37//
GK22vispancu:6294: atrāntare sajjita-krameṇa siṃhena sa lambakarṇo vyāpāditaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6295: tatas taṃ hatvā śṛgālaṃ rakṣakaṃ nirūpya svayaṃ snānārthaṃ nadyāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6297: atrāntare siṃho yāvat snātvā kṛte devārcanaḥ pratarpita-pitṛ-gaṇaḥ samāyāti tāvat karṇa-hṛdaya-rahito rāsabhas tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6298: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kopa-parītātmā siṃhaḥ śṛgālam āha-pāpa /
GK22vispancu:6305: atha tvad-vacanaṃ śraddheyaṃ matvā siṃhas tenaiva saṃvibhajya niḥśaṅkita-manās taṃ bhakṣitavān / ***********************************************************************
GK22vispancu:6306: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-āgataś ca gataś caiva iti /
GK22vispancu:6311: svārtham utsṛjya yo dambhī satyaṃ brūte sumanda-dhīḥ /
GK22vispancu:6312: sa svārthād bhraśyate nūnaṃ yudhiṣṭhira ivāparaḥ //Panc_4.38//
GK22vispancu:6318: sa kadācit pramādād ardha-magna-kharpara-tīkṣṇāgrasyopari mahatā vegena dhāvan patitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6319: tataḥ khapara-koṭyā pāṭita-lalāī̀oo rudhira-plāvita-tanuḥ kṛcchrād utthāya svāśrayaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6320: tataś cāpathya-sevanāt sa prahāras tasya karālatāṃ gataḥ kṛcchreṇa nīrogatāṃ nītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6321: atha kadācid durbhikṣa-pīḍite deśe ca kumbhakāraḥ kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭhaḥ kaiścid rāja-sevakaiḥ saha deśāntaraṃ gatvā kasyāpi rājñaḥ sevako babhūva
GK22vispancu:6322: so 'pi rājā tasya lalāṭe vikarālaṃ prahāra-kṣataṃ dṛṣṭvā cintayāmāsa,
GK22vispancu:6325: atas taṃ samānādibhiḥ sarveṣāṃ rāja-putrāṇāṃ madhye viśeṣa-prasādena paśyati sma /
GK22vispancu:6326: te'pi rāja-putrās tasya taṃ prasādātirekaṃ paśyantaṃ paramerṣyā-dharmaṃ vahanto rāja-bhayān na kiñcid ūcuḥ /
GK22vispancu:6327: athānyasminn ahani tasya bhūpater vīra-sambhāvanāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ vigrahe samupasthite prakalpyamāneṣu gajeṣu saṃnahyamāneṣu vājiṣu yodheṣu
GK22vispancu:6328: praguṇīkriyamāṇeṣu tena bhūbhujā sa kumbhakāraḥ prastāvānugataṃ pṛṣṭo nirjane-bho rāja-putra /
GK22vispancu:6329: kiṃ te nāma ? kā ca jātiḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6330: kasmin saṅgrāme prahāro 'yaṃ te lalāṭe lagnaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6334: atha kadācin madya-pānaṃ kṛtvā nirgataḥ pradhāvan kharparopari patitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6335: tasya prahāra-vikāro 'yaṃ me lalāṭe evaṃ vikarālatāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6336: tad ākarṇya rājā sa-vrīḍam āha-aho vañcito 'haṃ rājāputrānukāriṇānena kulālena /
GK22vispancu:6342: śūdraś ca kṛta-vighnaś ca darśanīyo 'si putraka /
GK22vispancu:6343: yasmin kule tvam utpanno gajas tatra na hanyate //Panc_4.39//
GK22vispancu:6350: siṃho 'pi nityam eva mṛgān vyāpādya siṃhyai dadāti /
GK22vispancu:6351: athānyasmin ahani tena kim api nāsāditam /
GK22vispancu:6352: yena bhramato 'pi tasya ravir astaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6353: atha tena sva-gṛham āgacchatā śṛgāla-śiśuḥ prāptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6354: sa ca bālako 'yam ity avadhārya yatnena daṃṣṭrāmadhya-gataṃ kṛtvā siṃhyā jīvantam eva samarpitavān /
GK22vispancu:6358: mayādyainaṃ śṛgāla-śiśuṃ parityajya na kiñcit sattvam āsāditam /
GK22vispancu:6359: sa ca mayā bālo 'yam iti matvā na vyāpādito viśeṣāt svajātīyaś ca / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6362: idānīṃ tvam enaṃ bhakṣayitvā pathyaṃ kuru /
GK22vispancu:6365: tvayā bālako 'yam iti vicintya na hataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6366: tat katham enam ahaṃ svodarārthe vināśayāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6368: na ca kṛtyaṃ parityājyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //Panc_4.41//
GK22vispancu:6370: ity evam uktvā tam api svastana-kṣīreṇa parāṃ puṣṭim anayat /
GK22vispancu:6371: evaṃ te trayo 'pi śiśavaḥ parasparam ajñāta-jāti-viśeṣā ekācāra-vihārā bālya-samayaṃ nirvāhayanti /
GK22vispancu:6372: atha kadācit tatra vane bhramann araṇya-gajaḥ samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6373: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau siṃha-sutau dvāv api kupitānanau taṃ prati pracalitau yāvat tāvat tena śṛgāla-sutenābhihitam-aho /
GK22vispancu:6380: sotsāhaṃ jāyate sainyaṃ bhagne bhaṅgam avāpnuyāt //Panc_4.42//
GK22vispancu:6382: ata eva vāñchanti bhūpā yodhān mahābalān /
GK22vispancu:6383: śūrān vīrān kṛtotsāhān varjayanti ca kātarān //Panc_4.43//
GK22vispancu:6384: atha tau dvāv api gṛhaṃ prāpya pitror agrato jyeṣṭha-bhrātṛ-ceṣṭitam ūcatuḥ-yathā gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrato 'pi naṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6385: so 'pi tad ākarṇya kopāviṣṭa-manāḥ prasphuritādhara-pallavas tāmralocanas triśikhāṃ
GK22vispancu:6386: bhrukuṭiṃ kṛtvā tau nirbhartsayan paruṣatara-vacanāny uvāca-tataḥ siṃhyai kānte nītvā
GK22vispancu:6390: athāsau prabhūta-kopāviṣṭas tām uvāca-kim aham etābhyāṃ śauryeṇa rūpeṇa vidyābhyāsena kauśalena vā hīnaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:6393: tad ākarṇya siṃhī tasya jīvitam icchanty antar vihasya prāha-tat samyak śṛṇu /
GK22vispancu:6396: tad yāvad etau mat-putrau śiśutvāt tvāṃ śṛgālaṃ na jānītaḥ,
GK22vispancu:6397: tāvad drutataraṃ gatvā svajātīyānāṃ madhye bhava /
GK22vispancu:6398: no ced ābhyāṃ hato mṛtyu-pathaṃ sameṣyasi /
GK22vispancu:6399: so 'pi tad-vacanaṃ śrutvā bhaya-vyākula-manāḥ śanaiḥ śanair apasṛtya sva-jātyā militaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6400: tasmāt tvaṃ api yāvad ete rāja-putrās tvāṃ kulālaṃ najānanti,
GK22vispancu:6402: no ced eteṣāṃ sakāśād viḍambanāṃ prāpya mariṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:6404: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-svārtham utsṛjya yo dambhī (38) iti /
GK22vispancu:6406: yat tvayā striyo 'rtha etat-kāryam anuṣṭhātum ārabdham /
GK22vispancu:6407: na hi strīṇāṃ kathañcid viśvāsam upagacchet / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6408: yad-arthe sva-kulaṃ tyaktaṃ jīvitārdhaṃ ca hāritam /
GK22vispancu:6409: sā māṃ tyajati niḥsnehā kaḥ strīṇāṃ viśvasen naraḥ //Panc_4.44//
GK22vispancu:6416: so 'pi pratidinaṃ kuṭumbena saha kalahaṃ kurvāṇā na viśrāmyati /
GK22vispancu:6417: so 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ kalaham asahamāno bhāryā-vātsalyāt sva-kuṭumbaṃ parityajya brāhmaṇyā saha viprakṛṣṭaṃ deśāntaraṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6421: athāsau tad-vacanānantaraṃ yāvad-udakaṃ gṛhītvā samāgacchati tāvat tāṃ mṛtām apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:6422: ativallabhatayā viṣādaṃ kurvan yāvad vilapati tāvad ākāśe vācaṃ śṛṇoti /
GK22vispancu:6423: yathā hi-yadi brāhmaṇa tvaṃ svakīya-jīvitasyārdhaṃ dadāsi tatas te jīvati brāhmaṇī /
GK22vispancu:6424: tac chrutvā brāhmaṇena śucībhūya tisṛbhir vācobhiḥ svajīvitārdhaṃ dattam /
GK22vispancu:6425: vāk-samam eva ca brāhmaṇī jīvitā sā /
GK22vispancu:6426: atha tau jalaṃ pītvā vana-phalāni bhakṣayitvā gantum ārabdhau /
GK22vispancu:6427: tataḥ krameṇa kasyacin nagarasya pradeśe puṣpa-vāṭikāṃ praviśya brāhmaṇo bhāryām abhihitavān-bhadre,
GK22vispancu:6428: yāvad ahaṃ bhojanaṃ gṛhītvā samāgacchāmi tāvad atra tvayā sthātavyam /
GK22vispancu:6430: atha tasyāṃ puṣpa-vāṭikāyāṃ paṅgura ara-ghaṭṭaṃ khelayan divya-girā gītam udgirati /
GK22vispancu:6431: tac ca śrutvā kusumeṣuṇārditā brāhmaṇyā tat-sakāśaṃ gatvābhihitam-bhadra /
GK22vispancu:6436: avaśyaṃ tvayā saha mayā saṅgamaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6438: suratānantaraṃ sābravīt-itaḥ-prabhṛti yāvaj-jīvaṃ mayātmā bhavate dattaḥ /

GK22vispancu:6769: tāvan nadī mahān matsyaḥ salilān niṣkramya bahiḥ sthita āste /
GK22vispancu:6770: evaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sā māṃsa-piṇḍaṃ samutsṛjya taṃ matsyaṃ pratyupādravat /
GK22vispancu:6772: atrāntaram ākāśād avatīrya ko 'pi gṛdhras taṃ māṃsa-piṇḍam ādāya punaḥ kham utpatāta /
GK22vispancu:6775: sā śṛgālikā vyartha-śramā gṛdhram avalokayantī tayā nagnikayā sa-smitam abhihitā-
GK22vispancu:6778: mitraṃ hy amitratāṃ yātam aparaṃ me priyā mitrā /
GK22vispancu:6779: gṛham anyena ca vyāptaṃ kim adyāpi bhaviṣyati //Panc_4.71//
GK22vispancu:6781: kṣate prahārā nipatanty abhīkṣṇam anna-kṣaye vardhati jāṭharāgniḥ /
GK22vispancu:6782: āpatsu vairāṇi samudbhavanti vāme vidhau sarvam idaṃ narāṇām //Panc_4.72//
GK22vispancu:6785: kiṃ vā sāmnaiva sambodhya gṛhān niḥsārayāmi ?
GK22vispancu:6786: kiṃ vā bhedaṃ dānaṃ vā karomi ?
GK22vispancu:6787: athavāmum eva vānara-mitraṃ pṛcchāmi ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6788: yaḥ pṛṣṭvā kurute kāryaṃ praṣṭavyān sva-hitān gurūn /
GK22vispancu:6789: na tasya jāyate vighnaḥ kasmiṃścid api karmaṇi //Panc_4.73//
GK22vispancu:6790: evaṃ sampradhārya bhūyo 'pi tam eva jambū-vṛkṣam ārūḍhaṃ kapim apṛcchat-bho mitra /
GK22vispancu:6792: tat samprati gṛham api me balavattareṇa makareṇa ruddham /
GK22vispancu:6797: mayā niṣiddho 'pi kiṃ bhūyo mām anusarasi /
GK22vispancu:6800: sāparādhasya me pūrva-sneham anusmṛtya hitopadeśaṃ dehi /
GK22vispancu:6802: yad bhāryā-vākyena bhavatāhaṃ samudre prakṣiptuṃ nītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6804: yadyapi bhāryā sarva-lokād api vallabhā bhavati,
GK22vispancu:6805: tathāpi na mitrāṇi bāndhavāś ca bhāryā-vākyena samudre prakṣipyante /
GK22vispancu:6807: mūḍhatvena nāśas tava mayā prāg eva nivedita āsīt, yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:6808: satāṃ vacanam ādiṣṭaṃ madena na karoti yaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6809: sa vināśam avāpnoti ghaṇṭoṣṭra iva satvaram //Panc_4.74//
GK22vispancu:6814: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne ujjvalako nāma rathakāraḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:6817: yataḥ sarvo 'pi janaḥ sva-karmaṇaiva ratas tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6819: yataḥ sarva-lokānāṃ cirantanāś caturbhūmikā gṛhāḥ santi /
GK22vispancu:6823: yāvat kiñcid vanaṃ gacchati tāvad gahvarākāra-vana-gahana-madhye sūryāstam anavelāyāṃ sva-yūthād bhraṣṭāṃ prasava-vedanayā pīḍyamānām uṣṭrīm apaśyat /
GK22vispancu:6824: sa ca dāseraka-yuktām uṣṭrīṃ gṛhītvā sva-sthānābhimukhaḥ prasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6825: gṛham āsādya rajjuṃ gṛhītvā tām uṣṭrikāṃ babandha /
GK22vispancu:6826: tataś ca tīkṣṇaṃ paraśum ādāya tasyāḥ pallavānayanārthaṃ parvataika-deśe gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6827: tatra ca nūtanāni komalāni bahūni pallavāni cchittvā śirasi samāropya tasyāgre nicikṣepa /
GK22vispancu:6828: tayā ca tāni śanaiḥ śanair bhakṣitāni /
GK22vispancu:6829: paścāt pallava-bhakṣaṇa-prabhāvād aharniśaṃ pīvara-tanur uṣṭrī sañjātā /
GK22vispancu:6831: tataḥ sa nityam eva dugdhaṃ gṛhītvā sva-kuṭumbaṃ paripālayati /
GK22vispancu:6832: atha rathakāreṇa vallabhatvād dāseraka-grīvāyāṃ mahatī ghaṇṭā pratibaddhā /
GK22vispancu:6835: yāvan mamaitasmād evoṣṭrāparipālanād asya kuṭumbasya bhavyaṃ sañjātam /
GK22vispancu:6837: evaṃ vicintya gṛham āgatya priyām āha-bhadre /
GK22vispancu:6839: tava sammatiś cet kuto 'pi dhanikāt kiñcid dravyam ādāya mayā gurjara-deśe gantavyaṃ kalabha-grahaṇāya /
GK22vispancu:6841: yāvad aham aparām uṣṭrīṃ nītvā samāgacchāmi /
GK22vispancu:6842: tataś ca gurjara-deśaṃ gatvoṣṭrīṃ gṛhītvā sva-gṛham āgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6843: kiṃ bahunā ? tena tathā kṛtaṃ yathā tasya pracurā uṣṭrāḥ karabhāś ca sammilitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6844: tatas tena mahad uṣṭra-yūthaṃ kṛtvā rakṣā-puruṣo dhṛtaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6845: tasya prativarṣaṃ vṛttyā karabham ekaṃ prayacchati /
GK22vispancu:6846: prativarṣam anyac cāharniśaṃ dugdha-pānaṃ tasya nirūpitam /
GK22vispancu:6847: evaṃ rathakāro 'pi nityam evoṣṭrī-karabha-vyāpāraṃ kurvan sukhena tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:6849: komala-vallīr yathecchayā bhakṣayitvā mahati sarasi pānīyaṃ pītvā sāyantana-samaye mandaṃ mandaṃ līlayā gṛham āgacchanti /
GK22vispancu:6850: sa ca pūrva-dāserako madātirekāt pṛṣṭha āgatya milati /
GK22vispancu:6852: manda-matir ayaṃ dāserako yathā yūthād bhraṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭhe sthitvā ghaṇṭāṃ vādayann āgacchati /
GK22vispancu:6855: atha tasya tad-vanaṃ gāhamānasya kaścit siṃho ghaṇṭā-ravam ākarṇya samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6858: ekas tu punaḥ pṛṣṭhe krīḍāṃ kurvan vallarīś caran yāvat tiṣṭhati,
GK22vispancu:6859: tāvad anye dāserakāḥ pānīyaṃ pītvā sva-gṛhe gatāḥ /
GK22vispancu:6861: tāvan na kañcin mārgaṃ paśyati vetti ca /
GK22vispancu:6862: yūthād bhraṣṭo mandaṃ mandaṃ bṛhac-chabdaṃ kurvan yāvat kiyad-dūraṃ gacchati,
GK22vispancu:6863: tāvat tac-chabdānusārī siṃho 'pi kramaṃ kṛtvā nibhṛto 'yaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6869: parasminn iha loke ca vyasanaṃ nopapadyate //Panc_4.75//
GK22vispancu:6870: tata sarvathā kṛtaghnasyāpi me kuru prasādam upadeśa-pradānena / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6871: upakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sādhutve tasya ko guṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6872: apakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sa sādhuḥ sadbhir ucyate //Panc_4.76//
GK22vispancu:6874: yady evaṃ tarhi tatra gatvā tena saha yuddhaṃ kuru / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:6875: hatas tvaṃ prāpsyasi svargaṃ jīvan gṛham atho yaśaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6883: āsīt kasmiṃścid deśe mahā-caturako nāma śṛgālaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6884: tena kadācid araṇye svayaṃ mṛto gajaḥ samāsāditaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6886: paraṃ kaṭhināṃ tvacaṃ bhettuṃ na śaknoti /
GK22vispancu:6887: athātrāvasara itaś cetaś ca vicaran kaścit siṃhas tatraiva pradeśe samāyayau /
GK22vispancu:6888: atha siṃhaṃ samāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā sa kṣiti-tala-vinyasta-mauli-maṇḍalaḥ saṃyojita-kara-yugalaḥ sa-vinayam uvāca-svāmin /
GK22vispancu:6889: tvadīyo 'haṃ lāguḍikaḥ sthitas tvad-arthe gajam imaṃ rakṣāmi /
GK22vispancu:6892: nāham anyena hataṃ sattvaṃ kadācid api bhakṣayāmi /
GK22vispancu:6894: tac chrutvā śṛgālaḥ sānandam āha-yuktam idaṃ svāmino nija-bhṛtyeṣu /
GK22vispancu:6896: antyāvastho 'pi mahān svāmi-guṇān na jahāti śuddhatayā /
GK22vispancu:6898: atha siṃhe gate kaścid vyāghraḥ samāyayau /
GK22vispancu:6903: na khalu bhedaṃ vinā sādhyo bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:6905: na yatra śakyate kartuṃ sāma dānam athāpi vā /
GK22vispancu:6906: bhedas tatra prayoktavyo yataḥ sa vaśa-kārakaḥ //Panc_4.80//
GK22vispancu:6911: evaṃ sampradhārya tasyābhimukho bhūtvā garvād unnata-kandharaḥ sa-sambhramam uvāca-māma /
GK22vispancu:6914: sa ca mām etad rakṣaṇaṃ niyujya nadyāṃ snānārthaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6915: tena ca gacchatā mama samādiṣṭam-yadi kaścid iha vyāghraḥ samāyāti,
GK22vispancu:6917: yena vanam idaṃ mayā nirvyāghraṃ kartavyam /
GK22vispancu:6918: yataḥ pūrvaṃ vyāghreṇaikena mayā vyāpādito gajaḥ śūnye bhakṣayitvocchiṣṭatāṃ nītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6920: tac chrutvā vyāghraḥ santrastam āha-bho bhāgineya /
GK22vispancu:6922: tvayā tasyātra cirāyāyātasyāpi madīyā kāpi vārtā nākhyeyā /
GK22vispancu:6924: atha gate vyāghre tatra kaścid dvīpī samāyātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6926: tad asya pārśvād asya gajasya yathā carma-cchedo bhavati tathā karomi /
GK22vispancu:6927: evaṃ niścitya tam apy uvāca-bho bhaginī-suta /
GK22vispancu:6933: paraṃ tathāpi yāvat siṃho na samāyāti,
GK22vispancu:6934: tāvad asya gajasya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā tṛptiṃ kṛtvā drutataraṃ vraja /
GK22vispancu:6935: sa āha-māma, tad evaṃ tan na kāryaṃ me māṃsāśanena,
GK22vispancu:6937: uktaṃ ca-yac chakyaṃ grasitaṃ yasya grastaṃ pariṇamec ca yat (23) ity ādi /
GK22vispancu:6938: tat sarvathā tad eva bhujyate yad eva pariṇamati /
GK22vispancu:6943: tathānuṣṭhite dīvpinā bhinnāṃ tvacaṃ vijñāya jambūkenābhihitam-bho bhaginī-suta /
GK22vispancu:6947: atha yāvad asau tad-bheda-kṛta-dvāreṇa kiñcin māṃsaṃ bhakṣayati,
GK22vispancu:6949: atha tam ātma-tulya-parākramaṃ dṛṣṭvā-uttamaṃ praṇipātena śūraṃ bhedena yojayet (78)
GK22vispancu:6950: iti ślokaṃ paṭhan tad-abhimukha-kṛta-prayāṇaḥ sva-daṃṣṭrābhis taṃ vidārya diśo bhāgaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ sukhena cira-kālaṃ hasti-māṃsaṃ bubhuje /
GK22vispancu:6951: evaṃ tvam api taṃ ripuṃ sva-jātīyaṃ yuddhena paribhūya diśo-bhāgaṃ kuru /
GK22vispancu:6952: no cet paścād baddha-mūlād asmāt tvam api vināśam avāpsyasi /
GK22vispancu:6954: sambhāvyaṃ goṣu sampannaṃ sambhāvyaṃ brāhmaṇe tapaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6955: sambhāvyaṃ strīṣu cāpalyaṃ sambhāvyaṃ jātito bhayam //Panc_4.82//
GK22vispancu:6958: eko doṣo videśasya svajātir yad virudhyate //Panc_4.83//
GK22vispancu:6963: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne citrāṅgo nāma sārameyaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6966: atha citrāṅgaḥ kṣutkṣāma-kaṇṭhas tad-bhayād deśāntaraṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6967: tatra ca kasmiṃścit pure kasyacid gṛha-medhino gṛhiṇyāḥ prasādena pratidinaṃ gṛhaṃ praviśya vividhānnāni bhakṣayan parāṃ tṛptiṃ gacchati /
GK22vispancu:6968: paraṃ tad-gṛhād bahir niṣkrānto 'nyair madoddhata-sārameyaiḥ sarva-dikṣu parivṛtya sarvāṅgaṃ daṃṣṭrābhir vidāryate /
GK22vispancu:6970: varaṃ sva-deśo yatra durbhikṣe'pi sukhena sthīyate /
GK22vispancu:6972: tad evaṃ sva-nagaraṃ vrajāmi ity avadhārya sva-sthānaṃ prati jagāma /
GK22vispancu:6973: athāsau deśāntarāt samāyātaḥ sarvair api svajanaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ-bhoś citrāṅga /
GK22vispancu:6982: so 'pi makaras tad-upadeśaṃ śrutvā kṛta-maraṇa-niścayo vānaram anujñāpya svāśrayaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:6983: tatra ca tena sva-gṛha-praviṣṭenātatāyinā saha vigrahaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍha-sattvāvaṣṭambhanāc ca taṃ vyāpādya svāśrayaṃ ca labdhvā sukhena cira-kālam atiṣṭhat /
GK22vispancu:6985: akṛtvā pauruṣaṃ yā śrīḥ kiṃ tayālasa-bhāgyayā /
GK22vispancu:6995: tan nareṇa na kartavyaṃ nāpitenātra yat kṛtam //Panc_5.1//
GK22vispancu:6996: tad yathānuśrūyate-asti dākṣiṇātye janapade pāṭaliputraṃ nāma nagaram /
GK22vispancu:6997: tatra maṇibhadro nāma śreṣṭhī prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:6998: tasya ca dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣa-karmāṇi kurvato vidhi-vaśād dhana-kṣayaḥ sañjātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:6999: tato vibhava-kṣayād apamāna-paramparayā paraṃ viṣādaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7000: athānyadā rātrau suptiś cintitavān-aho dhig iyaṃ daridratā / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7001: śīlaṃ śaucaṃ kṣāntir dākṣiṇyaṃ madhuratā kule janma /
GK22vispancu:7002: na virājanti hi sarve vitta-vihīnasya pusuṣasya //Panc_5.2//
GK22vispancu:7003: māno vā darpo vā vijñānaṃ vibhramaḥ subuddhir vā /
GK22vispancu:7004: sarvaṃ praṇaśyati samaṃ vitta-vihīno yadā puruṣaḥ //Panc_5.3//
GK22vispancu:7007: naśyati vipulamater api buddhiḥ puruṣasya manda-vibhavasya /
GK22vispancu:7010: suṣkam iva saraḥ śmaśānam iva raudram /
GK22vispancu:7013: na vibhāvyante laghavo vitta-vihīnāḥ puro 'pi nivasantaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7014: satataṃ jāta-vinaṣṭāḥ payasām iva budbudāḥ payasi //Panc_5.7//
GK22vispancu:7016: āḍhye kalpa-tarāv iva nityaṃ rajyanti jana-nivahāḥ //Panc_5.8//
GK22vispancu:7018: yasya yadā vibhavaḥ syāt tasya tadā dāsatāṃ yānti //Panc_5.9//
GK22vispancu:7019: laghur ayam āha na lokaḥ kāmaṃ garjantam api patiṃ payasām /
GK22vispancu:7020: sarvam alajjākaram iha yad yat kurvanti paripūrṇāḥ //Panc_5.10//
GK22vispancu:7021: evaṃ sampradhārya bhūyo 'py acintayat-tad aham anaśanaṃ kṛtvā prāṇān utsṛjāmi /
GK22vispancu:7024: atha tasya svapne padmanidhiḥ kṣapaṇaka-rūpo darśanaṃ dattvā provāca-bhoḥ śreṣṭhin /
GK22vispancu:7027: tad anenaiva rūpeṇa prātas tvad-gṛham āgamiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:7030: atha prātaḥ prabuddhaḥ san svapnaṃ smaraṃś cintā-cakram ārūḍhas tiṣṭhati-aho satyo 'yaṃ svapnaḥ kiṃ vā asatyo bhaviṣyati, na jñāyate /
GK22vispancu:7032: yato 'ham ahar-niśaṃ kevalaṃ vittam eva cintayāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7035: etasminn antare tasya bhāryayā kaścin nāpitaḥ pāda-prakṣālanāyāhūtaḥ atrāntare ca yathā-nirdiṣṭaḥ kṣapaṇakaḥ sahasā prādurbabhūva /
GK22vispancu:7036: atha sa tam ālokya prahṛṣṭa-manā yathāsanna-kāṣṭha-daṇḍena taṃ śirasy atāḍayat /
GK22vispancu:7037: so 'pi suvarṇa-mayo bhūtvā tat-kṣaṇāt bhūmau nipatitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7038: atha taṃ sa śreṣṭhī nibhṛtaṃ sva-gṛha-madhye kṛtvā nāpitaṃ santoṣya provāca-tad etad dhanaṃ vastrāṇi ca mayā dattāni gṛhāṇa /
GK22vispancu:7041: nāpito 'pi sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā vyacintayat-nūnam ete sarve'pi nagnakāḥ śirasi tāḍitāḥ kāñcana-mayā bhavanti /
GK22vispancu:7042: tad aham api prātaḥ prabhūtān āhūya laguḍaiḥ śirasi hanmi,
GK22vispancu:7045: atha prabhāte'bhyutthāya bṛhal laguḍam ekaṃ praguṇīkṛtya,
GK22vispancu:7047: jānubhyām avaniṃ gatvā vaktra-dvāra-nyastottarīyāñcalas tāra-svareṇemaṃ ślokam apaṭhat-
GK22vispancu:7051: sā jihvā yā jinaṃ stauti tac-cittaṃ yaj jine ratam /
GK22vispancu:7052: tau eva tu karau ślāghyau yau tat-pūjā-karau karau //Panc_5.13//
GK22vispancu:7054: dhyāna-vyājam upetya cintayasi kām unmīlya cakṣuḥ kṣaṇaṃ
GK22vispancu:7055: paśyānaṅga-śarāturaṃ janam imaṃ trātāpi no rakṣasi /
GK22vispancu:7057: serṣyaṃ māra-vadhūbhir ity abhihito bauddho jinaḥ pātu vaḥ //Panc_5.14//
GK22vispancu:7059: tataḥ pradhāna-kṣapaṇakaṇam āsādya kṣiti-nihita-jānu-caraṇaḥ-namo 'stu vande ity uccārya,
GK22vispancu:7061: sapraśrayam idam āha-bhagavan adya viharaṇa-kriyā samasta-muni-sametenāsmad-gṛhe kartavyā /
GK22vispancu:7065: sāmprataṃ punaḥ pustakācchādana-yogyāni karpaṭāni bahu-mūlyāni praguṇīkṛtāni /
GK22vispancu:7066: tathā pustakānāṃ lekhanārthaṃ lekhakānāṃ ca vittaṃ sañcitam āste tat sarvathā kālocitaṃ kāryam /
GK22vispancu:7068: tatra ca gatvā khadira-mayaṃ laguḍaṃ sajjīkṛtya kapāṭa-yugalaṃ dvāri samādhāya sārdha-praharaika-samaye
GK22vispancu:7069: bhūyo 'pi vihāra-dvāram āśritya sarvān bhakti-yuktān api paricita-śrāvakān parityajya
GK22vispancu:7073: so 'pi sambādhyate loke tṛṣṇayā paśya kautukam //Panc_5.15//
