GK22vispancu:7452: ataś ca varaṃ buddhir na sā vidyā yad bhavatoktaṃ tatreyaṃ me matir yat na ekāntena buddhir api pramāṇam /
GK22vispancu:7459: sādhu mātula gītena mayā prokto 'pi na sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7465: kasmiṃścd adhiṣṭhāne uddhato nāma gardabhaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7466: sa sadaiva rajaka-gṛhe bhārodvahanaṃ kṛtvā rātrau svecchayā paryaṭati /
GK22vispancu:7467: tataḥ pratyūṣe bandhana-bhayāt svayam eva rajaka-gṛham āyāti /
GK22vispancu:7469: atha tasya rātrau kṣetrāṇi paryaṭataḥ kadācic chṛgālena saha maitrī sañjātā sa ca pīvaratvād vṛtti-bhaṅgaṃ kṛtvā karkaṭikā-kṣetre śṛgāla-sahitaḥ praviśati /
GK22vispancu:7472: atha kadācit tena madoddhatena rāsabhena kṣetra-madhya-sthitena śṛgāo 'bhihitaḥ-bhoḥ bhaginī-sūta /
GK22vispancu:7479: nibhṛtaiś ca caura-jārair atra sthātavyam / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7480: kāṃsī vivarjayec cauryaṃ nidrāluś cet sa puṃścalīm /
GK22vispancu:7481: jihvā-laulyaṃ ca rujākrānto jīvitaṃ yo 'tra vāñchati //Panc_5.50//
GK22vispancu:7484: tad atra kṣetre rakṣā-puruṣāḥ susuptāḥ santi /
GK22vispancu:7485: te utthāya vadhaṃ bandhanaṃ vā kariṣyanti /
GK22vispancu:7488: tac chrutvā rābhasa āha-bhoḥ vanāśrayatvāt tvaṃ gīta-rasaṃ na vetsi,
GK22vispancu:7499: sapta svarās trayo grāmā mūrcchatāś caikatriṃśatiḥ /
GK22vispancu:7500: tānās tv ekonapaūcāśat tisro mātrā layās trayaḥ //Panc_5.52//
GK22vispancu:7501: sthāna-trayaṃ yatīnāṃ ca ṣaḍ-asyāni rasā nava /
GK22vispancu:7502: rāgā ṣaṭ-triṃśatir bhāvāś catvāriṃśat tataḥ smṛtāḥ //Panc_5.53//
GK22vispancu:7503: pañcāśīty-adhikaṃ hy etad gītāṅgānāṃ śataṃ smṛtam /
GK22vispancu:7504: svayam eva purā proktaṃ bharatena śruteḥ param //Panc_5.54//
GK22vispancu:7505: nānyad gītāt priyaṃ loke devānām api dṛśyate /
GK22vispancu:7507: tat kathaṃ bhaginī-suta mām anabhijñaṃ vadan nivārayati ?
GK22vispancu:7509: yady evaṃ yāvad vṛtter dvāra-sthitaḥ kṣetrapālam avalokayāmi,
GK22vispancu:7511: tathānuṣṭhite rāsabha-raṭanam ākarṇya kṣetrapaḥ krodhāt dantān dharṣayan pradhāvitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7512: yāvad rāsabho dṛṣṭas tāval laguḍa-prahārais tathā hato,
GK22vispancu:7514: tataś ca sac-chidram ulūkhalaṃ tasya gale baddhvā kṣetrapālaḥ prasuptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7515: rāsabho 'pi svajāti-svabhāvād gata-vedanaḥ kṣaṇenābhyutthitaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7517: muhūrtāt paratau na syāt prahāra-janitā vyathā //Panc_5.56//
GK22vispancu:7518: tata tam evolūkhalam ādāya vṛttiṃ cūrṇayitvā palāyitum ārabdhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7519: atrāntare śṛgālo 'pi dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā sa-smitam āha-
GK22vispancu:7520: sādhu mātula gītena mayā prokto 'pi na sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7522: tad bhavān api mayā vāryamāṇo 'pi na sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7526: yasya nāsti svayaṃ prajñā mitroktaṃ na karoti yaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7527: sa eva nidhanaṃ yāti yathā manthara-kolikaḥ //Panc_5.58//
GK22vispancu:7532: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne mantharako nāma kaulikaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7533: tasya kadācit paṭa-karmāṇi kurvataḥ sarva-paṭa-karma-kāṣṭhāni bhagnāni /
GK22vispancu:7534: tataḥ sa kuṭhāram ādāya vane kāṣṭhārthaṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7535: sa ca samudra-taṭe yāvad bhraman prayātaḥ tāvat tatra śiṃśapā-pādapas tena dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7537: tad anenaiva kartitena prabhūtāni paṭa-karmopakaraṇāni bhaviṣyanti /
GK22vispancu:7539: atha tatra vṛkṣe kaścit vyantaraḥ samāśritya āsīt /
GK22vispancu:7546: dāru-sāmagrīṃ vinā me kuṭumbaṃ bubhukṣayā pīḍyate /
GK22vispancu:7553: kaulika āha-yady eva tad ahaṃ sva-gṛhaṃ gatvā sva-mitraṃ sva-bhāryāṃ ca pṛṣṭvā āgamiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:7555: atha tatheti vyantareṇa pratijñāte sa kaulikaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sva-gṛhaṃ prati nivṛtto yāvad agre gacchati,
GK22vispancu:7565: yena tvaṃ rājā bhavasi ahaṃ tvan-mantrī /
GK22vispancu:7566: dvāv apīha sukham anubhūya para-loka-sukham anubhavāvaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7567: rājā dāna-paro nityam iha kīrtim avāpya ca /
GK22vispancu:7568: tat prabhāvāt punaḥ svargaṃ spardhate tridaśaiḥ saha //Panc_5.59//
GK22vispancu:7569: kaulika āha-asty etat tathāpi gṛhiṇīṃ pṛcchāmi /
GK22vispancu:7571: śāstra-viruddham etat yat striyā saha mantraḥ /
GK22vispancu:7572: yatas tāḥ svalpa-matayo bhavanti / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7574: bhūṣaṇādyaṃ ca nārīṇāṃ na tābhir mantrayet sudhīḥ //Panc_5.60//
GK22vispancu:7575: yatra strī yatra kitavo bālo yatra praśāsitā /
GK22vispancu:7576: tad gṛhaṃ kṣayam āyāti bhārgavo hīdam abravīt //Panc_5.61//
GK22vispancu:7577: tāvat syāt suprasannāsyas tāvad guru-jane rataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7578: puruṣo yoṣitāṃ yāvan na śṛṇoti vaco rahaḥ //Panc_5.62//
GK22vispancu:7579: etāḥ svārtha-parā nāryaḥ kevalaṃ sva-sukhe ratāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7580: na tāsāṃ vallabhaḥ ko 'pi suto 'pi sva-sukhaṃ vinā //Panc_5.63//
GK22vispancu:7583: aparaṃ tām apṛṣṭvāhaṃ na kiñcit karomi /
GK22vispancu:7584: evaṃ tam abhidhāya satvaraṃ gatvā tām uvāca-priye /
GK22vispancu:7589: eṣa tāvan mama mitraṃ nāpito vatady evaṃ yat-rājyaṃ prārthayasva /
GK22vispancu:7592: tan na kāryaṃ tad vacaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7593: cāraṇair vandibhir nīcair nāpitair bālakair api /
GK22vispancu:7594: na mantraṃ maitmān kuryāt sārdhaṃ bhikṣubhir eva ca //Panc_5.64//
GK22vispancu:7595: aparaṃ mahatī kleśa-paramparaiṣā rājya-sthitiḥ sandhi-vigraha-yānāsana-saṃśraya-dvaidhībhāvādibhiḥ kadācit puruṣasya sukhaṃ na prayacchatīti / yataḥ-
GK22vispancu:7596: yadaiva rājye kriyate'bhiṣekas tadaiva yāti vyasaneṣu buddhiḥ /
GK22vispancu:7599: rāmasya vrajanaṃ vane nivasanaṃ pāṇḍoḥ sutānāṃ vane
GK22vispancu:7600: vṛṣṇīnāṃ nidhanaṃ nalasya nṛpate rājyāt paribhraṃśanam /
GK22vispancu:7602: dṛṣṭvā rājya-kṛte viḍambana-gataṃ tasmān na tad vāñchayet //Panc_5.66//
GK22vispancu:7603: yad-arthaṃ bhrātaraḥ putrā api vāñchanti ye nijāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7604: vadhaḥ rājya-kṛtāṃ rājñāṃ tad rājyaṃ dūratas tyajet //Panc_5.67//
GK22vispancu:7607: sāha-tvaṃ tāvad ekaṃ paṭaṃ nityam eva niṣpādayasi /
GK22vispancu:7609: idānīṃ tvam ātmano 'nyad bāhu-yugalaṃ dvitīyaṃ śiraś ca yācasva,
GK22vispancu:7610: yena paṭa-dvayaṃ sampādayasi purataḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca /
GK22vispancu:7611: ekasya mūlyena gṛḥe yathā-pūrvaṃ vyayaṃ sampādayiṣyasi,
GK22vispancu:7613: evaṃ saukhyena svajāti-madhye ślāghyamānasya kālo yāsyati,
GK22vispancu:7615: so 'pi tad ākarṇya prahṛṣṭaḥ prāha-sādhu pativrate /
GK22vispancu:7621: yadi mamepsitaṃ prayacchasi tat dehi me dvitīyaṃ bāhu-yugalaṃ śiraś ca /
GK22vispancu:7622: evam abhihite tat-kṣaṇād eva sa dviśirāś caturbāhuś ca sañjātaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7623: tato hṛṣṭa-manā yāvad gṛham āgacchati tāval-lokaiḥ rākṣaso 'yam iti mānyamānair laguḍa-pāṣāṇa-prahārais tāḍito mṛtaś ca /
GK22vispancu:7624: ato 'haṃ bravīmi-yasya nāsti svayaṃ prajñā iti /
GK22vispancu:7627: sarvo 'pi jano 'śraddeyām āśāpiśācikāṃ prāpya hāsya-padavīṃ yāti /
GK22vispancu:7630: sa eva pāṇḍuraḥ śete soma-śarma-pitā yathā //Panc_5.68//
GK22vispancu:7635: kasmiṃścin nagare kaścit svabhāva-kṛpaṇo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7636: tasya bhikṣārjitaiḥ saktubhir bhukta-śeṣaiḥ kalaśaḥ sampūritaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7637: taṃ ca ghaṭaṃ nāgadante'valambya tasyādhastāt khaṭvāṃ nidhāya satatam eka-dṛṣṭyā tam avalokayati /
GK22vispancu:7638: atha kadācid rātrau suptaś cintayāmāsa-yat paripūrṇo 'yaṃ ghaṭas tāvat saktubhir vartate /
GK22vispancu:7642: tataḥ ṣāṇ-māsikam āprasava-vaśāt tābhyāṃ yūthaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7649: tataḥ kaścid brāhmaṇo mama gṛham āgatya prāpta-vayaskāṃ rūpāḍhyāṃ kanyāṃ mahyaṃ dāsyati /
GK22vispancu:7652: tatas tasmin jānu-calana-yogye sañjāte'haṃ pustakaṃ gṛhītvāśva-śālāyāḥ pṛṣṭha-deśe upaviṣṭas tad-avadhārayiṣyāmi /
GK22vispancu:7653: atrāntare somaśarmā māṃ dṛṣṭvā janany-utsaṅgāj jānu-calana-paro 'śva-khurāsanna-vartī mat-samīpam āgamiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7657: evaṃ tena dhyāna-sthitena tathaiva pāda-prahāro datto yathā sa ghaṭo bhagnaḥ,
GK22vispancu:7662: yataḥ sarvo 'pi lobhena viḍambito bādhyate ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7669: kasmiṃścin nagare candro nāma bhūpatiḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7670: tasya putrā vānara-krīḍā-ratā vānara-yūthaṃ nityam evāneka-bhojana-bhakṣyādibhiḥ puṣṭiṃ nayanti sma /
GK22vispancu:7671: atha vānarādhipo yaḥ sa auśanasa-bārhaspatya-cāṇakya-mata-vit tad-anuṣṭhātā ca tat-sarvān apy adhyāpayati sma /
GK22vispancu:7672: atha tasmin rāja-gṛhe laghu-kumāra-vāhana-yogyaṃ meṣa-yūtham asti /
GK22vispancu:7673: tan-madhyād eko jihvā-laulyād ahar-niśaṃ niḥśaṅkaṃ mahānase praviśya yat paśyati tat sarvaṃ bhakṣayati /
GK22vispancu:7674: te ca sūpakar yat kiñcit kāṣṭhaṃ mṛṇ-mayaṃ bhājanaṃ kāṃsya-pātraṃ tāmra-pātraṃ vā paśyanti tenāśu tāḍayanti /
GK22vispancu:7675: so 'pi vānara-yūthapas tad dṛṣṭvā vyacintayat-aho meṣa-sūpakāra-kalaho 'yaṃ vānarāṇāṃ kṣayāya bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7678: tad yadi vastuno 'bhāvāt kadācid ulmukena tāḍayiṣyanti,
GK22vispancu:7680: tad dahyamānaḥ punar aśva-kuṭyāṃ samīpa-vartinyāṃ pravekṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7683: śālihotreṇa punar etad uktaṃ yat-vānara-vasayāśvānāṃ vahni-dāha-doṣaḥ praśāmyati /
GK22vispancu:7684: tan nūnam etena bhāvyam atra niścayaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7685: evaṃ niścitya sarvān vānarān āhūya rahasi provāca, yat-
GK22vispancu:7688: tasmāt syāt kalaho yatra gṛhe nityam akāraṇaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7692: tan na yāvat sarveṣāṃ saṅkṣayo bhavati,
GK22vispancu:7693: tāvad evaitad rāja-gṛhaṃ santyajya vanaṃ gacchāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7694: atha tat tasya vacanam aśraddheyaṃ śrutvā madoddhatā vānarāḥ prahasya procuḥ-bho bhavato vṛddha-bhāvād buddhi-vaikalyaṃ sañjātaṃ,
GK22vispancu:7696: vadanaṃ daśanair hīnaṃ lālā sravati nityaśaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7697: na matiḥ sphurati kvāpi bāle vṛddhe viśeṣataḥ //Panc_5.73//
GK22vispancu:7698: na vayaṃ svarga-samānopabhogān nānā-vidhān bhakṣya-viśeṣān rāja-putraiḥ sva-dattān amṛta-kalpān parityajya tatrāṭavyāṃ kaṣāya-kaṭu-tikta-kṣāra-rūkṣa-phalāni bhakṣayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7699: tac chrutvāśru-kaluṣāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ kṛtvā sa provāca-re re mūrkhāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7700: yūyam etasya sukhasya pariṇāmaṃ na jānītha /
GK22vispancu:7701: kiṃ pāka-rasāsvādana-prāyam etat sukhaṃ pariṇāme viṣavad bhaviṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7705: dhanyās te ye na paśyanti deśa-bhaṅgaṃ kula-kṣayam //Panc_5.74//
GK22vispancu:7706: evam abhidhāya sarvāṃs tān parityajya sa yūthādhipo 'ṭavyāṃ gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7707: atha tasmin gate'nyasmin ahani sa meṣo mahānase praviṣṭo,
GK22vispancu:7708: yāvat sūpakāreṇa nānyat kiñcit samāsāditaṃ tāvad ardha-jvalita-kāṣṭhena tāḍyamāno jājvalyamana-śarīraḥ śabdāyamāno 'śva-kuṭyāṃ pratyāsanna-vartinyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7709: tatra tṛṇa-prācurya-yuktāyāṃ kṣitau tasya praluṭhataḥ sarvatrāpi vahni-jvālās tathā samutthitā yathā kecid aśvāḥ sphuṭita-locanāḥ pañcatvaṃ gatāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7710: kecid bandhanāni troṭayitvā ardha-dagdha-śarīrā itaś cetaś ca hreṣāyamāṇā dhāvamānā sarvam api jana-samūham ākulīcakruḥ /
GK22vispancu:7711: atrāntare rājā saviṣādaḥ śālihotrajñān vaidyān āhūya provāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:7714: proktam atra viṣaye bhagavatā śālihotreṇa, yat-
GK22vispancu:7716: aśvānāṃ nāśam abhyeti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā //Panc_5.75//
GK22vispancu:7720: kiṃ bahunā, sarve'pi te vānarā vividhāyudha-laguḍa-pāṣāṇādibhir vyāpāditāḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:7721: atha so 'pi vānara-yūthapas taṃ putra-pautra-bhrātṛ-suta-bhāgineyādi-saṅkṣayaṃ jñātvā viṣādam upagataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7723: acintayac ca-katham ahaṃ tasya nṛpāpasadayānṛṇatā-kṛtyenāpakṛtyaṃ kariṣyāmi / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7725: bhayād vā yadi vā kāmāt sa jñeyaḥ puruṣādhamaḥ //Panc_5.76//
GK22vispancu:7726: atha tena vṛddha-vānareṇa kutracit pipāsākulena bhramatā padminī-khaṇḍa-maṇḍitaṃ saraḥ samāsāditam /
GK22vispancu:7727: tad yāvat sūkṣmekṣikayāvalokayati tāvad vanacara-manuṣyāṇāṃ pada-paṅkti-pradeśo 'sti na niṣkramaṇam /
GK22vispancu:7728: tataś cintitam-nūnam atra ākrānte duṣṭa-grāheṇa bhāvyam /
GK22vispancu:7730: tathānuṣṭhite tan-madhyād rākṣaso niṣkramya ratna-mālā-vibhūṣita-kaṇṭhas tam uvāca-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:7731: atra yaḥ salile praveśaṃ karoti sa me bhakṣyaḥ iti /
GK22vispancu:7732: tan nāsti dhūrtataras tvat-samo 'nyo yaḥ pānīyam anena vidhinā pibati /
GK22vispancu:7739: vānara āha-asti me kenacid bhūpatinā sahātyantaṃ vairam /
GK22vispancu:7741: tat parivāram api taṃ bhūpatiṃ vākya-prapañcena lobhayitvātra sarasi praveśayāmi /
GK22vispancu:7742: so 'pi śraddheyaṃ vacas tasya śrutvā ratna-mālāṃ dattvā prāha-bho mitra /
GK22vispancu:7743: yat samucitaṃ bhavati tat kartavyam iti /
GK22vispancu:7744: vānaro 'pi ratna-mālā-vibhūṣita-kaṇṭho vṛkṣa-prāsādeṣu paribhraman janair dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7749: vānaraḥ prāha-asti kutracid araṇye guptataraṃ mahat saro dhanada-nirmitam /
GK22vispancu:7750: tatra sūrye'rdhodite ravi-vāre yaḥ kaścin nimajjati,
GK22vispancu:7758: eṣa pratyakṣatayā mat-kaṇṭha-sthitayā ratna-mālayā pratyayas te /
GK22vispancu:7759: tad yadi ratna-mālayā prayojanaṃ tan mayā saha kam api preṣaya,
GK22vispancu:7761: tac chrutvā nṛpatir āha-yady evaṃ tad ahaṃ sa-parijanaḥ svayam eṣyāmi,
GK22vispancu:7764: tathānuṣṭhite bhūpatinā saha ratna-mālā-lobhena sarve kalatra-bhṛtyāḥ prasthitāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7765: vānaro 'pi rājñā dolādhirūḍhena svotsaṅge āropitaḥ sukhena prīti-pūrvam ānīyate /
GK22vispancu:7767: tṛṣṇe devi namas tubhyaṃ yayā vittānvitā api /
GK22vispancu:7770: icchati śatī sahasraṃ sahasrī lakṣam īhate /
GK22vispancu:7771: lakṣādhipas tathā rājyaṃ rājyasthaḥ svargam īhate //Panc_5.78//
GK22vispancu:7772: jīryante jīryataḥ keśāḥ dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7774: atha tat-saraḥ samāsādya vānaraḥ pratyūṣa-samaye rājānam uvāca-deva /
GK22vispancu:7775: atrārdhodite sūrye'ntaḥ-praviṣṭānāṃ siddhir bhavati tat sarvo 'pi jana ekadaiva praviśatu /
GK22vispancu:7779: atha praviṣṭās te lokāḥ sarve bhakṣitā rākṣasena /
GK22vispancu:7780: atha teṣu ciramāṇeṣu rājā vānaram āha-bho yūthādhipa kim iti cirāyate me parijanaḥ ?
GK22vispancu:7781: tac chrutvā vānaraḥ satvaraṃ vṛkṣam āruhya rājānam uvāca-bho duṣṭa-narapate /
GK22vispancu:7785: tvaṃ svāmīti matvā nātra praveśitaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7787: na tatra doṣaṃ paśyāmi yo duṣṭe duṣṭam ācaret //Panc_5.80//
GK22vispancu:7788: tat tvayā mama kula-kṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ mayā punas tava iti /
GK22vispancu:7789: athaitad ākarṇya rājā kopāviṣṭaḥ padātir ekākī yathāyāta-mārgeṇa niṣkrāntaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7790: atha tasmin bhūpatau gate rākṣasa-spṛṣṭo jalān niṣkramya sānandam idam āha-
GK22vispancu:7791: hataḥ śatruḥ kṛtaṃ mitraṃ ratna-mālā na hāritā /
GK22vispancu:7792: nālena pibatā toyaṃ bhavatā sādhu vānara //Panc_5.81//
GK22vispancu:7794: evam uktvā bhūyo 'pi sa cakradharam āha-bho mitra /
GK22vispancu:7799: tan mām evaṃvidhaṃ tyaktvā kva yāsyasi ? uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7800: yas tyaktvā sāpadaṃ mitraṃ yāti niṣṭhuratāṃ vahan /
GK22vispancu:7801: kṛtaghnas tena pāpena narake yāty asaṃśayam //Panc_5.82//
GK22vispancu:7803: satyam etad yadi gamya-sthāne śaktir bhavati /
GK22vispancu:7805: nāsti kasyāpi tvām unmocayituṃ śaktiḥ aparaṃ yathā yathā cakra-bhrama-vedanayā tava
GK22vispancu:7806: mukha-vikāraṃ paśyāmi tathā tathāham etaj jānāmi yat drāg gacchāmi mā kaścin mamāpy
GK22vispancu:7809: vikālena gṛhīto 'si yaḥ paraiti sa jīvati //Panc_5.83//
GK22vispancu:7814: kasmiṃścin nagare bhadraseno nāma rājā prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7818: paraṃ kṛta-rakṣopadhānāṃ tāṃ hartuṃ na śaknoti /
GK22vispancu:7819: sāpi tat-samaye rakṣaḥ-sānnidhyajām avasthām anubhavati kampādibhiḥ /
GK22vispancu:7820: ekam atikrāmati kāle kadācit sa rākṣaso madhya-niśāyāṃ gṛha-koṇe sthitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7822: paśyaiṣa vikālaḥ samaye nityam eva māṃ kadarthayati /
GK22vispancu:7824: tac chrutvā rākṣaso 'pi vyacintayat-nūnaṃ yathāhaṃ tathānyo 'pi kaścid vikāla-nāmāsyā haraṇāya nityam evāgacchati /
GK22vispancu:7825: paraṃ so 'py enāṃ hartuṃ na śaknoti /
GK22vispancu:7829: tathānuṣṭhite niśītha-samaye rāja-gṛhe kaścid aśva-cauraḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7830: sa ca sarvān aśvān avalokya taṃ rākṣasam aśvatamaṃ vijñāyādhirūḍhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7831: atrāntare rākṣasaś cintayāmāsa-nūnam eṣa vikāla-nāmā māṃ cauraṃ matvā kopān nihantum āgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7833: evaṃ cintayan so 'pi tena khalīnaṃ mukhe nidhāya kaśāghātena tāḍitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7835: cauro 'pi dūraṃ gatvā khalīnākarṣaṇena taṃ sthiraṃ kartum ārabdhavān /
GK22vispancu:7837: atha taṃ tathāgaṇita-khalīnākarṣaṇaṃ matvā cauraś cintayāmāsa-aho naivaṃ-vidhā vājino bhavanty agaṇita-khalīnāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7839: yadyapi kañcit pāṃsulaṃ bhūmi-deśam avalokayāmi tad ātmānaṃ tatra pātayāmi /
GK22vispancu:7841: evaṃ cintayata iṣṭa-devatāṃ smaratas tasya so 'śvo baṭa-vṛkṣasya tale niṣkrāntaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7843: tato dvāv api tau pṛthag-bhūtau paramānanda-bhājau jīvita-viṣaye labdha-pratyāśau sampannau /
GK22vispancu:7844: atha tatra baṭe kaścid rākṣasa-suhṛd vānaraḥ sthita āsīt /
GK22vispancu:7845: tena rākṣasaṃ trastam ālokya vyāhṛtam-bho mitra /
GK22vispancu:7850: cauro 'pi taṃ vānarāhūtaṃ jñātvā kopāt tasya lāṅgulaṃ lambamānaṃ mukhe nidhāya carvitavān /
GK22vispancu:7851: vānaro 'pi taṃ rākṣasābhyadhikaṃ manyamāno bhayān na kiñcid uktavān /
GK22vispancu:7853: rākṣaso 'pi taṃ tathā-bhūtam avalokya ślokam enam apaṭhat-
GK22vispancu:7855: vikālena gṛhīto 'si yaḥ paraiti sa jīvati //Panc_5.84//
GK22vispancu:7857: tat preṣaya māṃ yena gṛhaṃ gacchāmi /
GK22vispancu:7858: tvaṃ punar anubhuṅkṣvātra sthita eva lobha-vṛkṣa-phalam /
GK22vispancu:7860: daiva-vaśāt sampadyate nṛṇāṃ śubhāśubham / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7867: trayo 'py anyāyataḥ siddhāḥ saṃmukhe karmaṇi sthite //Panc_5.86//
GK22vispancu:7872: asty atra dharā-tala uttarā-pathe madhu-puraṃ nāma nagaram /
GK22vispancu:7874: tasya kadācid viṣaya-sukham anubhavatas tristanī kanyā babhūva /
GK22vispancu:7875: atha tāṃ trastanīṃ jātāṃ śrutvā sa rājā kañcukinaḥ provāca,
GK22vispancu:7876: yad-bhos tyajyatām iyaṃ trastanī gatvā dūre'raṇye yathā kaścin na jānāti /
GK22vispancu:7877: tac chrutvā kañcukinaḥ procuḥ-mahārāja jñāyate yad aniṣṭa-kāriṇī tristanī kanyā bhavati /
GK22vispancu:7880: yaḥ satataṃ paripṛcchati śṛṇoti sandhārayaty aniśam /
GK22vispancu:7889: deva / kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe caṇḍakarmā nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:7890: ekadā tena bhramatāṭavyāṃ kaścid brāhmaṇaḥ samāsāditaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7891: tatas tasya skandham āruhya provāca-bho agresaro gamyatām /
GK22vispancu:7893: atha tasya kamalodara-komalau pādau dṛṣṭvā brāhmaṇo rākṣasam apṛcchat-bhoḥ /
GK22vispancu:7898: tatas tac chrutvātmano mokṣopāyaṃ cintayaṃs tat-saraḥ prāptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7900: yāvad ahaṃ snānaṃ kṛtvā devatārcana-vidhiṃ vidhāyāgacchāmi tāvat tvayātaḥ sthānād anyatra na gantavyam /
GK22vispancu:7901: tathānuṣṭhite divjaś cintayāmāsa-nūnaṃ devatārcana-vidher ūrdhvaṃ mām eṣa bhakṣayiṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7903: yenaiṣa ārdra-pādo na mama pṛṣṭham eṣyati /
GK22vispancu:7904: tathānuṣṭhite rākṣaso vrata-bhaṅga-bhayāt tasya pṛṣṭhaṃ na gataḥ /
GK22vispancu:7906: atha tebhyas tac chrutvā-rājā dvijān āhūya provāca-bho brāhmaṇāḥ /
GK22vispancu:7908: tat kiṃ tasyāḥ pratividhānam asti, na vā ?
GK22vispancu:7909: hīnāṅgī vādhikāṅgī vā yā bhavet kanyakā nṛṇām /
GK22vispancu:7910: bhartuḥ syāt sā vināśāya sva-śīla-nidhanāya ca //Panc_5.89//
GK22vispancu:7911: yā punas tristanī kanyā yāti locana-gocaram /
GK22vispancu:7912: pitaraṃ nāśaty eva sā drutaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //Panc_5.90//
GK22vispancu:7918: atha teṣāṃ tad-vacanam ākarṇya sa rājā paṭaha-śabdena sarvatra ghoṣaṇām ājñāpayāmāsa-aho /
GK22vispancu:7919: tristanīṃ rājakanyāṃ yaḥ kaścid udvāhayati sa suvarṇa-lakṣam āpnoti deśa-tyāgaṃ ca /
GK22vispancu:7920: evaṃ tasyām āghoṣaṇāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ mahān kālo vyatītaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7922: sāpi yauvanonmukhī sañjātā sugupta-sthāna-sthitā yatnena rakṣyamāṇā tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:7923: atra tatraiva nagare kaścid andhas tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:7927: yadi katham api daivāt kanyā labhyate /
GK22vispancu:7930: atha yadi tasya doṣato mṛtyur bhavati /
GK22vispancu:7931: tadā dāridryopāttasyāsya kleśasya paryanto bhavati / uktaṃ ca-
GK22vispancu:7941: tatas tai rāja-puruṣair gatvā rājñe niveditam-deva /
GK22vispancu:7945: andho vā vadhiro vātha kuṣṭī vāpy antyajo 'pi vā /
GK22vispancu:7946: parigṛhṇātu tāṃ kanyāṃ sa-lakṣāṃ syād videśagaḥ //Panc_5.92//
GK22vispancu:7947: atha rājādeśāt tai rāja-puruṣais taṃ nadī-tīre nītvā suvarṇa-lakṣeṇa samaṃ vivāha-vidhinā tristanīṃ tasmai dattvā,
GK22vispancu:7951: tathānuṣṭhite videśam āsādya kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kaivarta-darśite trayo 'pi mūlyena gṛhaṃ prāptāḥ sukhena kālaṃ nayanti sma /
GK22vispancu:7954: evaṃ gacchatā kālena tristanyā kubjakena saha vikṛtiḥ samapadyata /
GK22vispancu:7956: yadi syāc chrī-talo vahniś candramā dahanātmakaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7957: susvādaḥ sāgaraḥ strīṇāṃ tat-satīs tvaṃ prajāyate //Panc_5.93//
GK22vispancu:7963: anyadā kubjakena paribhramatā mṛtaḥ kṛṣṇasarpaḥ prāptaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7964: taṃ gṛhītvā prahṛṣṭa-manā gṛham abhyetya tām āha-subhage /
GK22vispancu:7966: tad enaṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtvā prabhūta-śuṇṭhy-ādibhiḥ saṃskāryāsmai vikala-netrāya matsyāmiṣaṃ bhaṇitvā prayaccha yena drāg vinaśyati /
GK22vispancu:7969: sāpi pradīpte vahnau kṛṣṇa-sarpaṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtvā takra-sthālyām ādhāya gṛha-vyāpārākulā taṃ vikalākṣaṃ sa-praśrayam uvāca-ārya-putra /
GK22vispancu:7972: te ca matsyā vahnau pāvanāya tiṣṭhanti /
GK22vispancu:7974: tāvat tvaṃ darvīm ādāya kṣaṇam ekaṃ tān pracālaya /
GK22vispancu:7975: so 'pi tad ākarṇya hṛṣṭa-manāḥ sṛkkaṇī parilihan drutam utthāya darvīm ādāya pramathitum ārabdhaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7976: atha tasya matsyān mathnato viṣa-garbha-bāṣpeṇa saṃspṛṣṭaṃ nīla-paṭalaṃ cakṣurbhyām agalat /
GK22vispancu:7977: asāv apy andhas taṃ bahu-guṇaṃ manyamāno viśeṣān netrābhyāṃ bāṣpa-grahaṇam akarot /
GK22vispancu:7983: tat tāvad vijānāmi samyak tristanyāś ceṣṭitam /
GK22vispancu:7986: evaṃ vicintya svākāraṃ gūhayann andhavat karma karoti yathā purā /
GK22vispancu:7987: atrāntare kubjaḥ samāgatya niḥśaṅkatayāliṅgana-cumbanādibhis tristanīṃ sevitum upacakrame /
GK22vispancu:7988: so 'py andhas tam avalokayann api yāvan na kiñcic chastraṃ paśyati,
GK22vispancu:7989: tāvat kopa-vyākula-manāḥ pūrvavac chayanaṃ gatvā kubjaṃ caraṇābhyāṃ saṅgṛhya sāmarthyāt sva-mastakopari bhrāmayitvā tristanīṃ hṛdaye vyatāḍayat
GK22vispancu:7990: atha kubja-prahāreṇa tasyās tṛtīyaḥ stana urasi praviṣṭaḥ /
GK22vispancu:7991: tathā balān mastakopari bhramaṇena kubjaḥ prāñjalatāṃ gataḥ / ***********************************************************************

GK22vispancu:8015: tato vihasya prathama-vaktreṇābhihitam-āvayos tāvad ekam udaram /
GK22vispancu:8019: evam abhidhāya tena śeṣaṃ bhāruṇḍyāḥ pradattam /
GK22vispancu:8021: dvitīyaṃ mukhaṃ tad-dinād eva prabhṛti sodvegaṃ sa-viṣādaṃ ca tiṣṭhati /

GK22vispancu:8038: eko na gacched adhvānaṃ naikaḥ supteṣu jāgṛyāt //Panc_5.95//
GK22vispancu:8046: kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne brahmadatta-nāmā brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma /
GK22vispancu:8047: sa ca prayojana-vaśād grāmaṃ prasthitaḥ sva-mātrābhihitaḥ, yad-vatsa /
GK22vispancu:8053: atha tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā samīpastha-vāpyāḥ sakāśāt karkaṭam ādāya mātrābhihitaṃ-vatsa,
GK22vispancu:8057: so 'pi mātur vacanād ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ na saṅgṛhya karpūra-puṭikā-madhye nidhāya,
GK22vispancu:8059: atha gacchan grīṣmoṣmaṇā santaptaḥ kañcin mārgasthaṃ vṛkṣam āsādya,
GK22vispancu:8061: atrāntare vṛkṣa-koṭarān nirgatya sarpas tat-samīpam āgataḥ /
GK22vispancu:8063: so 'pi karkaṭas tatraiva sthitaḥ san sarpa-prāṇān apāharata /
GK22vispancu:8065: tāvat samīpe mṛta-kṛṣṇa-sarpo nija-pārśve karpūra-puṭikopari sthitas tiṣṭhati /
GK22vispancu:8068: satyam abhihitaṃ mama mātrā yat puruṣeṇa ko 'pi sahāyaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK22vispancu:8070: yato mayā śraddhā-pūrita-cetasā tad-vacanam anuṣṭhitaṃ tenāhaṃ karkaṭena sarva-vyāpādanād rakṣitaḥ /
GK22vispancu:8072: kṣīṇaḥ śrayati śaśī ravim ṛddho vardhayati payasāṃ nātham /
GK22vispancu:8073: anye vipadi sahāyā dhanināṃ śriyam anubhavanty anye //Panc_5.97//
GK22vispancu:8074: mantre tīrthe dvije deve daivajñe bheṣaje gurau /
